35a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod par mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa bdun par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sa der yang mtshan ma nye bar zhi bar mi
35a3(rgyud): mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa brgyad par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sa der yang skye ba'i mtshan mar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa dgu par 'jug
35a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /sa der yang mngon par shes pa drug gi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa bcu par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / rtsa ba'i sems
35a5(rgyud): yongs su bsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par
35a6(rgyud): gyur ba'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par
35a7(rgyud): dag pa gang yin pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ gser yang dag par bzhus sbyangs brdungs te dri ma med par bya ba'ang gser gyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag pa
35b1(rgyud): gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir gser gyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa'i dbang gis gser med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu rnyog ma can
35b2(rgyud): y ongs su dngas te dri ma med par bya ba'ang chu'i rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas yongs su dag pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir chu med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung
35b3(rgyud): ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku'ang nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par gyur pas sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba yongs su bsal nas bag chags lhag ma med par bya ba dang /
35b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/
35b5(rgyud): nam mkha' la du ba dang / sprin dang / rdul dang / khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs pa dag gal te yongs su dang bar gyur na nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag par 'gyur
35b6(rgyud): b as nam mkha' med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku'ang sdug bsngal mang po thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang ngo
35b7(rgyud): bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de lus dang /
36a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mthong ba las rmi lam sad nas chu bo dang / chu rol dang /
36a2(rgyud): pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang sems med do zhes byar mi rung ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
36a3(rgyud): y ongs su zad nas blo rnam par dag par gyur kyang med do zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i
36a4(rgyud): phyir rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med ces byar mi rung ngo / /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi sku gang yin pa de
36a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do/ /las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston
36a6(rgyud): par mdzad do/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la brten nas ni glog 'byung la/
36a7(rgyud): glog la brten nas ni 'od 'byung ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku la brten pa'i phyir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas ni
36b1(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do/ /shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pas ni longs spyod rdzogs
36b2(rgyud): pa'i sku ston par mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do/ /de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi
36b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad do/ /de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas
36b4(rgyud): de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig /'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston
36b5(rgyud): p a chen po yin no zhes de ltar nges par mngon par yid ches pa'i gang zag des ni shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong
36b6(rgyud): du chud par gyur pas/ rigs kyi bu/ don de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams yongs su bsal bar gyur na chos de dag la mtshan
36b7(rgyud): nyid gnyis med par khong du chud cing rnam par rtog pa'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la de bzhin nyid de mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med
37a1(rgyud): @#/ /cing yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'i phyir 'di ltar de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
37a2(rgyud): nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid
37a3(rgyud): dang | chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su sdud
37a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid dang /
37a5(rgyud): yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas de ni yang dag pa nyid du sangs
37a6(rgyud): rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de
37a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas khams gsum las nges par byung nas
37b1(rgyud): yang dag pa'i spyod yul yongs su tshol bas kyang khong du mi chud cing mthong bar mi nus pas so/ /de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rig cing mi mthong
37b2(rgyud): bas so so'i skye bo thams cad the tshom dang / som nyi bskyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par rtog par byed pas yongs su 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri
37b3(rgyud): bong rgya mtsho la rkyal bar byed kyang gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
37b4(rgyud): kyang de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par mi rtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar yang chos thams cad la
37b5(rgyud): mnga' chen po brnyes shing shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / rang gi spyod yul du gyur cing gzhan dang yang thun
37b6(rgyud): m ong du ma gyur pa'i phyir de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa nas nyid kyi sku srog la phangs pa mi mnga' bar dka' ba
37b7(rgyud): spyad pas dpe zla med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rab tu dben pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dam pa
38a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di brnyes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid rig cing mthong pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa/
38a2(rgyud): che'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ gnyid kyang med/ bkres pa dang / skom pa'ang med de/ rtag par ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ sems rnam par g.yeng zhing g.yo ba'ang
38a3(rgyud): med do/ /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang ci
38a4(rgyud): gsung yang rung ste thams cad phan 'dogs par 'gyur bas gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi grol ba'ang med do/ /gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / mi
38a5(rgyud): ma rungs pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur te chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
38a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams la lung du mi bstan pa'i dngos po mi mnga' yang spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa'ang mi mnga'/ 'khor ba dang / mya
38a7(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyang mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang ci'ang rung ste ma nges pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam
38b1(rgyud): bzhi po thams cad du ye shes kyi yongs su ma bzung ba mi mnga'o/ /chos thams cad la byams pa dang / thugs rjes yongs su ma zin pa mi mnga' bas sems can thams cad
38b2(rgyud): la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phan mi 'dogs pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas mngon par yid
38b3(rgyud): ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / mi ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par lha dang /
38b4(rgyud): mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur bas ma rabs dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur la/ rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos
38b5(rgyud): mnyan cing len par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos zab mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs
38b6(rgyud): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bstan par 'gyur bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi
38b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shin tu zab pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di lan gcig rna bas thos par gyur na gang zag de ni de bzhin gshegs
39a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos mi smod pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyes pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa
39a2(rgyud): ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel zhing yangs pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can
39a3(rgyud): ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams mngon par bsgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / tshangs
39a4(rgyud): pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te gus
39a5(rgyud): pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang rung ba dag tu 'di
39a6(rgyud): ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bzhi
39a7(rgyud): gang zhe na/ dang po ni rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams btsan zhing dar bas phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams ma mchis pa dang / blo nad dang bral zhing tshe ring ba dang / bkra shis
39b1(rgyud): dang ldan zhing bde skyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o/ /gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / sras dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams 'dum
39b2(rgyud): zhing rtsod pa ma mchis pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang phra ma spangs pas rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul gyi mi rnams
39b3(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos spyod pas bro nad ma mchis shing bde skyid pa dang / glo bur du 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / bsod nams mang po mngon par sgrub pa'o/ /bzhi pa ni dus
39b4(rgyud): gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag 'phrod cing rtag par lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa dang / snying rje mnyam par
39b5(rgyud): gyur pas gnod pa mi bgyid cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa ma mchis pa dang / skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi zhing thams cad kyis byang chub kyi
39b6(rgyud): spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba ste 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel
39b7(rgyud): ba'i slad du 'di ltar mdo sde yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjes su 'brang zhing gang na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
40a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so/ /legs so/ /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te khyod kyi rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po
40a2(rgyud): shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal
40a3(rgyud): po las/ sku gsum rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon
40a4(rgyud): sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur te sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang / mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na
40a5(rgyud): gser gyi rnga bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/ 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i
40a6(rgyud): shing drung na bai DUR+ya'i gdan la bzhugs nas 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba la chos 'chad pa'ang mthong ngo / /bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las
40a7(rgyud): s gra chen po byung ste sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa'ang mdzes pa'i tog gis thos pas thams cad ma lus par yid
40b1(rgyud): la bzung ste dran pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to/ /nam langs pa dang 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongs su bskor te mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs nas
40b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs phyag byas nas
40b3(rgyud): me tog dang / spos dag bkram ste g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
40b4(rgyud): bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi g.yar lam na bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las
40b5(rgyud): sgra chen po byung ste sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su bzung ste dran lags na/ bcom
40b6(rgyud): ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis mdang
40b7(rgyud): sum g.yar lam na/ /gser gyi rnga ni chen po zhig /dbyibs ni shin tu khyad par 'phags/ /kun nas gser 'od khyab par ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pas na/ /snang bas
41a1(rgyud): @#/ /kun tu khyab par bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong / /sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun/ /rin chen ljon shing drung dag tu/ /bai DUR+ya
41a2(rgyud): yi gdan bzhugs te/ /'khor ni brgya stong tshad med snyed/ /gus pas yongs su bskor bar mthong / /de nas bram ze zhig gis ni/ /gser gyi rnga chen brdungs pas na/ /rnga chen
41a3(rgyud): de yi sgra las ni/ /tshigs bcad gya nom 'di skad smras/ /gser 'od rnga las gya nom sgra byung bas/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas/ /ngan song gsum gyi
41a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal mi bzad dang / /mi yi sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa/ /gser gyi rnga sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa thams cad gtan zhi nas/ /dper na
41a5(rgyud): thub dbang bcom ldan ji bzhin du/ /'jigs pa bsal nas bde ba nyid du shog /bcom ldan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /spyod bsags thams cad mkhyen ni bsgrubs
41a6(rgyud): pas na/ /sems can byang chub yan lag ldan mdzad nas/ /mthar ni yon tan rgya mtsho phyogs par mdzad/ /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra 'di ni/ /thos pa kun ni
41a7(rgyud): tshangs dbyangs 'thob par shog / bla med byang chub 'bras bu thob gyur nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag bskor shog /tshe ni bskal pa bsam mi khyab gnas nas/ /
41b1(rgyud): ji bzhin thos bshad skye dgu phan byed shog /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcad nas/ /'dod sdang gti mug la sogs zhi bar shog /sems can gang zhig ngan 'gro
41b2(rgyud): gnas gyur nas/ /me chen rab 'bar lus kun khyab pa dag /rnga sgra dam pa 'di ni thos gyur na/ /sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro shog /thams cad sngon gnas shes
41b3(rgyud): pa grub gyur nas/ /'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong dran par shog /thub pa'i gtso bo yang dag dran gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thos par shog /gser gyi rnga
41b4(rgyud): dbyangs dam pa thob pa'i dbang / /rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas/ /thams cad sdig pa'i las ni yongs spangs te/ /rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' zhig spyod par
41b5(rgyud): shog |lha dang mi yi srog chags thams cad kun/ /gus pas smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag /gser gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur nas/ /bsam pa rnams ni yongs su
41b6(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sems can gang zhig mnar med ltung gyur nas/ /dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te/ /mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar gang gnas pa/ /
41b7(rgyud): thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur/ /lha mi yi dwags dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/ /sdug bsngal bgegs mang mngon du myong gyur ba/ /gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos
42a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyur na/ /sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang gnyis gtso/ /thugs rje
42a2(rgyud): chen po'i thugs kyis ni/ /brtse bas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sems can gang zhig skyabs ma mchis/ /mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa la/ /
42a3(rgyud): skyabs chen dag ni bgyid par shog /bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig /las ngan shin tu lci ba rnams/ /deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni/ /thams cad rtse gcig
42a4(rgyud): rab tu bshags/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas yid ma ches/ /bla ma gnyen bshes ma gus dang / /dge ba mang po ma spyad pas/ /rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am/ /bdag gis
42a5(rgyud): mtho btsun rus rigs dang / /longs spyod dag gis snyems pa dang / /dar la bab pas dregs gyur nas/ /rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am/ /rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed
42a6(rgyud): nas| |ngag gis tshig ngan smras pa dang / /kha na ma tho ma mthong nas/ /rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am/ /rtag tu byis pa'i blo spyad nas/ /ma rig mun pas sems g.yogs dang / /
42a7(rgyud): mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am/ /rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus/ /mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags zhe sdang
42b1(rgyud): dkris pas na/ /de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/ /mi dge grogs po bsten pa dang / /phrag dog ser sna bsam pa dang / /dbul phongs gya gyu spyad pas na/ /de slad sdig rnams
42b2(rgyud): bgyis pa 'am/ /sdig mang dag la mi mos kyang / /'jigs skrag dag dang bcas pa 'am/ /rang dbang dag ni ma mchis pas/ /de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/ /rnam par
42b3(rgyud): g.yeng ba'i bsam pa dang / /khong khro 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / /bkres skom dag gis gdungs pa'i rgyus/ /de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/ /bza' dang btung dang gos dag dang / /
42b4(rgyud): bud med dag la chags sred pa'i/ /nyon mongs mes ni bsregs pas na/ /de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /gus pa'i sems ni ma
42b5(rgyud): skyed pa'i/ /de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/ /de bdag thams cad so sor bshags/ /rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la/ /gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i/ /de 'dra'i
42b6(rgyud): sdig mang gang bgyis pa/ /deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags/ /mi shes dam chos skur pa dang / /pha ma sri zhu ma bgyis pa'i/ /de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/ /deng bdag
42b7(rgyud): thams cad so sor bshags/ /gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang mthu yis ni/ /de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/ /de bdag thams cad so sor bshags/ /
43a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /sangs rgyas grangs med gang dag mchod/ /sems can rnams ni rab drangs nas/ /sdug bsngal
43a2(rgyud): bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog / sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te/ /bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs nas/ /mngon sangs skye dgu
43a3(rgyud): 'dren par shog / bdag gis sems can kun gyi slad/ /bskal pa brgya stong dka' spyad nas/ /shes rab chen po'i stobs kyis ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid
43a4(rgyud): shog / bdag gis srog chags kun gyi slad/ /gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal/ /zab mo'i mdo sde bshad nas ni/ /las ngan rnams ni bsal bar shog /gang zhig
43a5(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong du/ /sdig lci dag ni bgyis pa rnams/ /skad cig gcig tsam mthol bshags nas/ /sdig pa mang po ma lus 'byang / /gser 'od dam pa 'di bzhin du//
43a6(rgyud): de ltar bshags pa bgyis gyur na/ /sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun/ /'di yis dbang gis myur du 'byang / /ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya stong dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab
43a7(rgyud): gzungs rnams dang / /dbang mchog byang chub lam yan lag /rtag tu sgom yang skyo mi 'gyur/ /bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs gnas/ /sa bcu la ni phyin gyur nas/ /sangs
43b1(rgyud): rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te/ /'khor bar 'bab pa sgrol bar shog /bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni/ /shin tu zab mo yon tan mdzod/ /gya nom ye shes bsam dka' ba/ /
43b2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas/ /thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni/ /bdag gi bshags pa
43b3(rgyud): bzhes su gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni/ /las ngan mang po bgyis pas na/ /de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong / /thugs rjes byang bar mdzad par smon/ /bdag gis las
43b4(rgyud): ngan mang bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes/ /spyod lam bzhi po kun tu yang / /dga' ba'i 'du shes yong ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan/ /sems can
43b5(rgyud): 'jigs pa sel mdzad na/ /bdag gi bshags pa bzhes nas ni/ /mya ngan sdug bsngal 'bral bar smon/ /bdag la nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / /rnam smin las ni ci mchis pa/ /thugs
43b6(rgyud): rje chen po'i chab kyis ni/ /rab bkrus byang bar mdzad par smon/ /bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang / /da ltar las ngan bgyis pa rnams/ /rtse gcig sems kyis mthol bshags na/ /
43b7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu byang bar shog /ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams/ /bsdams te slong bar yong mi bgyid/ /gal te 'gal ba mchis na yang / /nam yang 'chab par yongs mi bgyid/ /
44a1(rgyud): @#/ /lus gsum ngag gi rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ /sems can rnams ni 'ching bgyid pas/ /thog ma med nas rgyun mi 'chad/ /spyod pa
44a2(rgyud): 'di gsum dbang gis na/ /mi dge las bcu bgyis gyur pas/ /de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams/ /de dag thams cad so sor bshags/ /bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis
44a3(rgyud): pas| |sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/ /bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag dang / /'jig rten khams
44a4(rgyud): ni gzhan dag na/ /dge ba'i las mang ci bgyis pa/ /deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo / /mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas/ /dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te/ /sa bcu dag la rab
44a5(rgyud): tu gnas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon/ /bdag gis lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/ /
44a6(rgyud): bla med ye shes myur grub shog /deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du/ /sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthol shing bshags/ /byis pa srid gsum rmongs
44a7(rgyud): pa'i bgegs dag dang / /rtag par las ngan lci bar bgyis pa'i bgegs/ /bdag gis log pa'i 'dod pa bsags pa'i bgegs/ /rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i
44b1(rgyud): bgegs/ /'jig rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs/ /byis pa thams cad kun gyi nyon mongs bgegs/ /sems myos rnams g.yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs/ /mi dge
44b2(rgyud): grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs/ /'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs/ /zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs/ /mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs
44b3(rgyud): po'i bgegs/ /bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs/ /deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags/ /deng bdag bde
44b4(rgyud): gshegs kun la skyabs su mchi/ /bla med yon tan mtsho la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa/ /byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol/ /
44b5(rgyud): sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'/ /spyan ni rnam dag bai DUR+ya dang 'dra/ /dpal dang gzi brjid grags dang ldan pa'i gtso/ /thugs rje shes rab nyi mas mun sel ba/ /sangs rgyas
44b6(rgyud): nyi mas 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad/ /shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral/ /thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba/ /sems can nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar mdzad/ /sum
44b7(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan cing / /dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs/ /yon tan bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/ /nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar
45a1(rgyud): @#/ /mdzad/ /kha dog bai DUR+ya 'dra dri med mnga'/ /zla ba nya ltar nam mkha' dag la bzhugs/ /shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs/ /'od zer sna tshogs
45a2(rgyud): dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang dag tu/ /rga dang mya ngan chu yis ded pas na/ /de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis
45a3(rgyud): gtan du bskams/ /deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmad byung gtso/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btud phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku/ /dpe
45a4(rgyud): byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshad shes dka' zhing / /sa chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang / /ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing / /nam
45a5(rgyud): mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te/ /sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa tshad med snyed du rab bsams
45a6(rgyud): kyang | |yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur/ /sa chen 'di 'dra'i ri brag ji snyed pa/ /rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang brtsir rung zhing / /rgya mtsho'i chab ni spu rtses gzhal
45a7(rgyud): rung yang / /sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs/ /sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni/ /bcom ldan grags pa'i chos ni thams cad dang / /mtshan bzang
45b1(rgyud): rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang / /de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur/ /bdag gis dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas/ /myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas/ /yang
45b2(rgyud): dag chos bshad skye dgu phan btags te/ /thams cad sdug bsngal mang las thar bgyid shog /bdud kyi dmag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas/ /bla med dam chos 'khor lo
45b3(rgyud): bskor bar shog / bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas/ /bdud rtsi'i ro yis sems can tshim bgyid shog /'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin/ /pha rol phyin drug
45b4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs bgyid shog / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas/ /nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal bsal bar shog /bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas/ /'das
45b5(rgyud): pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang / /rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te/ /sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par shog /bdag gis dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis/ /rgyal ba tshad
45b6(rgyud): med dag la bsnyen bkur nas/ /mi dge ba yi rgyu kun yongs spangs te/ /yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog /'jig rten thams cad sems can ji snyed pa/ /sdug bsngal
45b7(rgyud): spangs nas bde ba thob par shog / dbang po ma tshang ji snyed mchis pa dag /de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog /sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis/ /lus ni
46a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa/ /thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rab zhi nas/ /dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog /gang gis rgyal chos 'gal
46a2(rgyud): bgyis bsad la thug / sdug bsngal mang gtses mya ngan rab skyes nas/ /de yi sdug bsngal mi bzad myong ba'i tshe/ /mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang / /gang dag gzhu
46a3(rgyud): brdeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang / /gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs/ /mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na/ /lus sems rab gzir bde ba cung zad med/ /de dag
46a4(rgyud): thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang / /sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog /bsad la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas/ /sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan
46a5(rgyud): zad shog / sems can gang zhig bkres skom gdungs gyur pa/ /ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par shog /long bas gzugs mthong 'on pas thos pa dang / /thang pos 'gro
46a6(rgyud): nus lkugs pas smra nus shog / dbul phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas/ /bang mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te/ /thams cad bde mchog dam par brnyed nas//
46a7(rgyud): sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog /lha mi thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi/ /byad bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas/ /bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur
46b1(rgyud): te| |longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog / sems can de dag rol mo bsams pa bzhin/ /sgra mchog mang po mngon du 'byung bar shog /chu 'dod gser gyi me tog
46b2(rgyud): steng 'phyo ba/ /rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog /sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin/ /bza' btung gos dang khri dang stan rnams dang / /gser dngul dang ni rin
46b3(rgyud): chen bai DUR+ya/ /rgyan phreng thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog /sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing / /phan tshun mi mthun mthong bar ma gyur cig /lus kyi byad bzhin thams cad
46b4(rgyud): rab mdzes shing / /so sor byams pa'i sems kyis rtse bgyid shog /'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams/ /yid la bsams tshe thams cad 'byor par shog /nor rnams rnyed pa
46b5(rgyud): phongs pa ma mchis par/ /bgo bshar bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog /bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang / /me tog sna tshegs kha dog gcig min pa/ /nyin re dus gsum
46b6(rgyud): shing las lhung gyur nas/ /yid bzhin longs spyod dga' ba skye bar shog /sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang / /theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo/ /byang
46b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang / /nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog /rtag tu ma rabs dag tu mi skye zhing / /mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang / /dal 'byor mi
47a1(rgyud): @#/ /yi gtso bor skyes gyur te/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog /rtag par phyug po dag gi khyim skyes te/ /nor dang rin chen bang mdzod
47a2(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / /byad bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te/ /tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog /bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas/ /dpa' zhing sems
47a3(rgyud): rno blo gros shin tu che/ /thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas/ /pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog /rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed/ /rin
47a4(rgyud): chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas ni/ /bai DUR+ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar shog /gal te 'das pa dang ni da ltar che/ /srid gsum
47a5(rgyud): 'khor nas las rnams bgyis bas na/ /yid du mi mchi ngan 'gro thob gyur pa/ /thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog /sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni/ /'khor
47a6(rgyud): ba'i zhags pas dam du bcings pa ni/ /shes rab ral gri dag gis bcad stsal te/ /sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog /sems can gang gis 'dzam gling 'di dag
47a7(rgyud): dang | |yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung / /bsod nams rgyun mchog sna tshogs ci bsgrubs pa/ /de dag thams cad kun la yi rang ngo / /bsod nams dngos po dag
47b1(rgyud): la yi rang nas/ /lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyis des/ /las mchog dam pa 'di dag rtag 'phel nas/ /bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon/ /phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan
47b2(rgyud): bsngags pa dang / /bsam pa dwang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pas/ /bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams des/ /bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon/ /rigs kyi bu 'am
47b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo dang / /bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams/ /thal sbyar rtse gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod na/ /skye ba rtag par kun tu tshe rabs dran/ /dbang po tshang zhing
47b4(rgyud): lus ni yongs rdzogs te/ /yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshogs 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs pa mi skye ba thams cad du/ /rtag par lha mi rnams kyis blta bar shog /sangs rgyas gcig dang
47b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcu dag las/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa min/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na/ /'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos par gyur pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan
47b6(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so/ /legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ji ltar
47b7(rgyud): rmi lam du gser gyi rnga po che las byung ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa gang la la zhig gis thos par
48a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyur na bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par 'gyur zhing sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
48a2(rgyud): khyod kyi las mchog 'di dag thams cad ni 'das pa'i dus su bsngags pa brjod cing smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
48a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad rab tu
48a4(rgyud): dga' zhing mngon par yid ches nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs
48a5(rgyud): byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / //gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
48a6(rgyud): yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa la bzhugs te shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / sku'i spu'i bu gnas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs
48a7(rgyud): brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye bas phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi tshad dang / dper byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
48b1(rgyud): zhing rnams 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur ro/ /snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten du 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang /
48b2(rgyud): med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / bla ma dang / nye ba dag la sri zhu ma byas pa dang / mkhan po dang / bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga
48b3(rgyud): rgyal byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag so so nas 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag mi'i gnas su phyin par gyur pas sems can de
48b4(rgyud): dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer gyi mthus thams cad kyis bde ba dang / shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang /
48b5(rgyud): ye shes kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe brgya byin dang / lha'i 'khor thams cad dang / gang gA'i lha mo dang / 'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung
48b6(rgyud): ba mthong ba dang / thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po
48b7(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la
49a1(rgyud): @#/ /bde logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
49a2(rgyud): z hig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas ji ltar phyin ci log tu sems can thams cad yongs su
49a3(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi ba lags/ sngon mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
49a4(rgyud): brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ deng khyod kyis tshad med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgoms nas rnam par dag pa'i rnam par
49a5(rgyud): grol ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis
49a6(rgyud): s dig pa rnam mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
49a7(rgyud): btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te sems rtsa gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas dag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis/ 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
49b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/
49b2(rgyud): chos kyi char chen po phab pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba/ chos kyi dung chen po bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsugs pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/ thams cad sems can
49b3(rgyud): rnams la sman cing bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba/ skye dgu rmongs pa rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du
49b4(rgyud): mdzad par bzhed pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes
49b5(rgyud): rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang / ngag
49b6(rgyud): dang | yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btud de gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas sdig pa'i rjes su 'brangs te sems can rnams dang
49b7(rgyud): lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris shing bcings pas sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang /
50a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge sdig ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mtshams ma
50a2(rgyud): mchis pa ngan sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mtshal phyung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang / dgra bcom
50a3(rgyud): pa bkum pa dang / pha ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang / yid kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis
50a4(rgyud): bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / dge ba'i gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa btab pa dang / bre srang gis bslus pa dang /
50a5(rgyud): yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par gzung ba dang / mi gtsang ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba gzhan dag la stsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag
50a6(rgyud): la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang / mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te yongs su
50a7(rgyud): spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rjes su mi 'brang ba dang / nyan
50b1(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams sems la 'gyod pa skyed pa dang /
50b2(rgyud): bdag pas khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mthong na phrag dog bskyed pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang / phangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma rig
50b3(rgyud): pas bsgribs shing log par lta bas sems rmongs bar gyur pa dang / dge ba'i sgyu ma bskyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la smod
50b4(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das
50b5(rgyud): yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa dag
50b6(rgyud): la deng bdag srog phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol shing bshags so/ /thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do/ /sngar ma
50b7(rgyud): bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do/ /sngar bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/ /ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
51a1(rgyud): @#/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi 'gro ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang / mi khom pa brgyad po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci
51a2(rgyud): mchis pa dang / bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zhu byang nas sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong ba smon to/ /ji ltar
51a3(rgyud): ' das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gis

51b1(rgyud): p hyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing 'chags pa de

51b5(rgyud): n as rnam par dag pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha ba dang bcas pas ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid ches
51b6(rgyud): nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig mes mgo thod bsregs sam/ gos bsregs par gyur na
51b7(rgyud): myur ba kho nar me gsod par byed de/ gal te zhi bar ma gyur na sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sdig pa byas na'ang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas
52a1(rgyud): @#/ /myur ba kho nar yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas nor dang / rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / gzhan
52a2(rgyud): yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po bsgom par 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /cho rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal

52a4(rgyud): kyi bu/ gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang

52b3(rgyud): chub yongs su gnyer ba dang / mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yongs su dag pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mi

52b6(rgyud): d ad pa'i phyir 'di ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed pa ma lus par 'gyur ba'ang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa
52b7(rgyud): de dag deng gdod skye bar 'gyur bsam 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad stong zhing de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
53a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'du byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so/ /

53a3(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas mngon par yid ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur par gang yin pa de
53a4(rgyud): ni sems can med cing ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis
53a5(rgyud): chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur na las kyi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas gtan du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang
53a6(rgyud): dag pa'i dran pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / spyod pa dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad
53a7(rgyud): mkhyen pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
53b1(rgyud): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung / /zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes bskyed/ /byams sems
53b2(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa sbyong / /rigs kyi bu/ shin tu bsal bar bka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom las shin tu lci
53b3(rgyud): ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyi skur pa btab pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / /srid pa gsum la mngon par
53b4(rgyud): zhen nas nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang / las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
53b5(rgyud): rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma thob thams cad bshags par byed pa dang / sems can thams
53b6(rgyud): cad kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rjes
53b7(rgyud): su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
54a1(rgyud): @#/ /'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten na skyes pa dang / bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las
54a2(rgyud): theg pa chen po spyod pa spyod rngo thogs pa'ang mchis/ spyod rngo mi thogs pa'ang mchis na/ ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi
54a3(rgyud): rang bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyin mtshan
54a4(rgyud): d us drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas rjes
54a5(rgyud): su yi rang bar byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa
54a6(rgyud): dang | tshul khrims dang / sems kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par gyur na de
54a7(rgyud): ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mchog tu gya nom
54b1(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /
54b2(rgyud): gzhan yang / da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed pa dag dang / bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas/
54b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar
54b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dag las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang 'di ltar bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin
54b5(rgyud): du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la'ang rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang / da ltar
54b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/ byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs
54b7(rgyud): su zla ba'i phyir bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/ chos kyi rnga brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/
55a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos kyi char phab pa dag gis thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad la bskul zhing yongs su btul bas thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur
55a2(rgyud): nas chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis zad mi shes pa'i bde ba thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
55a3(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / sems can gang gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams da dung phun sum tshogs
55a4(rgyud): par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo / /de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
55a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par
55a6(rgyud): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa des bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i stong
55a7(rgyud): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon par sgrub par gyur la rigs kyi
55b1(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag par gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod
55b2(rgyud): pa dang / rim gro byas pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des 'di ltar snga ma lta bur rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang bskrun na stong gi cha gcig tsam du'ang nye bar
55b3(rgyud): mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de la ni grangs dang bcas shing tshad dang bcas pas bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par mi 'gyur
55b4(rgyud): l a rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni tshad med grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pas de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge
55b5(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur
55b6(rgyud): n as skyes pa'i lus yongs su 'grub par 'dod na'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par byed na gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid
55b7(rgyud): la skyes pa'i lus mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rjes su yi rang
56a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i bsod nams gang lags pa ni 'tshal bar gyur na slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / da ltar
56a2(rgyud): gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa
56a3(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
56a4(rgyud): byang chub yongs su gnyer ba gang yin pa des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i lam bsgom par 'dod na gang zag des nyin mtshan dus drug tu
56a5(rgyud): snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ 'di skad du/ deng bdag phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang
56a6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma bskor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas yongs su mya ngan las
56a7(rgyud): ' da' bar bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la bdag bsam pa thag pa nas spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral zhing
56b1(rgyud): bde bar bgyi ba dang / sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor ba dang / chos kyi char chen po
56b2(rgyud): dbab pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma chen po sbar ba dang / don gyi tshul gsal par mdzad pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'
56b3(rgyud): zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par bskul zhing gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams
56b4(rgyud): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
56b5(rgyud): bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags
56b6(rgyud): pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong
56b7(rgyud): c hen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
57a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te/ de
57a2(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin pa 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun
57a3(rgyud): gyis bkang ste sbyin pa btang ba lta re zhig zhog gi / gal te la la zhig gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs
57a4(rgyud): su bkang ste sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas pa bas bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags so/ /
57a5(rgyud): chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang / gzhan la phan 'dogs par
57a6(rgyud): byed la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin pas so/ /gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa'i
57a7(rgyud): bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' bas so/ /gsum pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongs su dag par byed pa yin la zang zing gi
57b1(rgyud): sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed pas so/ /bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthar thug pa med pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bas so/ /lnga
57b2(rgyud): pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'dod pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so/ /de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ bskul
57b3(rgyud): ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no/ /nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
57b4(rgyud): la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas nga la chos kyi 'khor lo
57b5(rgyud): bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
57b6(rgyud): nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de
57b7(rgyud): la brten nas ngas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos grangs
58a1(rgyud): @#/ /med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ nga lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur yang nga'i yang dag pa'i
58a2(rgyud): chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin no/ /nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas mtshan mchog dam pa sna tshogs dang /
58a3(rgyud): mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas
58a4(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba brgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad la chos thams cad kyis ni chos
58a5(rgyud): kyis sku yongs su sdud par mi byed do/ /chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'gag par 'gyur yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin
58a6(rgyud): pas sems can gyi tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed par mdzad do/ /sems can
58a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'ching ba dgrol bar mdzad kyang dgrol par bya ba ci'ang mi mnga'o/ /sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas yongs su ma smin pa gang yin pa
58b1(rgyud): d e ni yongs su smin par mdzad la yongs su smin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang mngon par 'du mdzad pa'ang mi mnga' g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' bas 'du 'dzi

58b3(rgyud): mdzad pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par 'byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
58b4(rgyud): thams cad dang sku tha dad par gyur ba med par yin te/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta
58b5(rgyud): b u'i chos sku ngas dang brnyes pa yin te de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig

59a5(rgyud): bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thad du rnal 'byor bsgoms nas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa
59a6(rgyud): dang | tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags dag la kha zas changs gcig tsam byin pa dang / dge ba'i tshig gis rtsod pa dag gi bsdums byas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la
59a7(rgyud): skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang / 'gyod tshangs byas pa dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
59b1(rgyud): ji snyed pa de dag deng bdag gis thams cad gcig tu bsdus te 'gyod cing phangs pa med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ngo / /rnam par grol ba'i

59b3(rgyud): p ar dag pas 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams

59b6(rgyud): pa dang / shes rab mthar thug pa med pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
59b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par gyur cig / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin
60a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /gzhan yang / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na

60a4(rgyud): t hams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du byang
60a5(rgyud): chub kyi snying po la gnas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thogs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

60a7(rgyud): gcig la gsal bar rtogs te nam gyi cha smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas zil dngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te bdag dang / sems can thams cad tshe dpag tu med pa
60b1(rgyud): dang | sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od
60b2(rgyud): dang | sangs rgyas 'od brgya ba dang / sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang / sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas
