82b7(rgyud): cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi ba dang / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa bcu pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i
83a1(rgyud): @#/ /mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di dag bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /
83a2(rgyud): stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
83a3(rgyud): phyag btsal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos/ /dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
83a4(rgyud): can yang dag shes stor la/ /bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen gsal spyan/ /chos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang / /yang dag
83a5(rgyud): chos kyi spyan gyis ni/ /thams cad kun gzigs bsam mi khyab/ /chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la/ /chos gcig 'gog par mi mdzad pas/ /mnyam gzigs 'di yi
83a6(rgyud): dbang gis na/ /bla med gnas su byon pa lags/ /'khor ba dag kyang mi 'jigs la/ /mya ngan 'das la mi gnas shing / /mtha' gnyis dag las ma chags pas/ /de slad
83a7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa brnyes/ /dag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs/ /bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas/ /rnam par rtog par mi mdzad slad/ /mchog tu rnam par dag pa brnyes//
83b1(rgyud): bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis/ /yi ge 'bru gcig ma gsungs kyang / /slob ma mang po kun la ni/ /chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sems can thams cad la/ /
83b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang / /sdug bsngal dag gis gzir ba la/ /rtag par yongs su skyob par mdzad/ /sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag /bdag dang bdag med la
83b3(rgyud): sogs dang / /gcig min tha dad min pa dang / /skye med 'gag pa med pa yi/ /de 'dra'i don ni mang po rnams/ /bshad phyir bye brag mchis kyang ni/ /dper na lung stong brag ca ltar//
83b4(rgyud): bcom ldan nyag gcig rab tu mkhyen/ /chos dbyings rtog pa ma mchis pas/ /theg pa tha dad ma mchis kyang / /sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i slad/ /rnam par phye nas
83b5(rgyud): gsum du gsungs/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus
83b6(rgyud): pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa
83b7(rgyud): mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni/ shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ tshig 'bru dang / don
84a1(rgyud): @#/ /yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas/ gang gis yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i gang
84a2(rgyud): zag de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi drin bsab par bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad
84a3(rgyud): smras pas de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de
84a4(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde 'dis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed cing / chos kyi
84a5(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog dang / mdo sde mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir mnyan par bya/ yongs su gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du 'don par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
84a6(rgyud): kyi bu/ sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams
84a7(rgyud): cad kyis ni shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na kha na ma
84b1(rgyud): tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas mthong zhing / sangs rgyas dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon
84b2(rgyud): tan mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams dang yongs su 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rtag par chos gya nom pa thos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo
84b3(rgyud): mchog dam pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sems can gyi
84b4(rgyud): bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / tshig mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs
84b5(rgyud): zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / zla ba yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rmongs pa rnams yongs su btul
84b6(rgyud): nas yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
84b7(rgyud): brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang / rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs
85a1(rgyud): @#/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa
85a2(rgyud): med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa de lta bu thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob
85a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bu la sogs pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85a4(rgyud): chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas/ yang dag pa'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos
85a5(rgyud): kyi de bzhin nyid las g.yo ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par yongs su
85a6(rgyud): smin par byas kyang yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed
85a7(rgyud): kyang tshig las g.yos pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'ong ba'ang med cing / skye 'gag med par mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu dang / rkyen
85b1(rgyud): gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med par bstan ce na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub
85b2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub kyi sa las phyir
85b3(rgyud): mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags tshad med pa snyed ni byang
85b4(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos mchog 'khor ba'i rgyun las bzlog mdzad pa/ /shin tu
85b5(rgyud): zab cing gya nom mthong bar dka'/ /sems can dmus long 'dod pas rab g.yogs nas/ /ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong / /de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig
85b6(rgyud): car stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas gang du gser
85b7(rgyud): 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa'i gnas der bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams der mchis te/ nyan pa'i 'khor bgyis nas 'di
86a1(rgyud): @#/ /ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis shing lus dang / sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba 'thob par bgyid do/ /bdag
86a2(rgyud): cag bsam pa thag pa nas mchod cing rim gro bgyid do/ /nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid par bgyid do/ /de dag gnas pa'i yul der yang phyir rgol ba'i
86a3(rgyud): dgra dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas/ mi rnams rab tu dar zhing rgyas par bgyid do/ /
86a4(rgyud): chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis rtsog par mi bgyid cing mi gtsang bas sbag par mi
86a5(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas rtag par me tog dang / spos dang / lda ldi dang / ba dan dang /
86a6(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par yongs su bsrung zhing rgud pa rnams yongs su spong bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang
86a7(rgyud): po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed kyis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa yongs su sgom par byed na/ de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten du
86b1(rgyud): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba yin no/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste drug
86b2(rgyud): pa'o|| ||gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha dge ba'i lha mo
86b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mdzes pa'i tog gi mtshan mo rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga dam pa las de bzhin gshegs
86b4(rgyud): pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i sgra dang / rkyen gang yin pa de dag ngas khyed la rgya cher yang dag par bshad kyi/
86b5(rgyud): sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid la zungs shig/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rtag par pad+ma'i dpes phyogs bcu dus
86b6(rgyud): gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang yin
86b7(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la/ /deng bdag rtse gcig spyi 'dud phyag bgyis te/ /rgyal
87a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi/ /bla med rnam par dag par thub ba'i gtso/ /sku yi 'od kyis gsal mdzad gser mdog 'dra/ /sgra kun
87a2(rgyud): nang na mchog tu gyur pas na/ /tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzod/ /dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing / /g.yas su 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por
87a3(rgyud): gnas| |tshems dkar gtams pa kha dog dung 'dra zhing / /rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer dag dang ldan/ /rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan/ /ud pal sngon po
87a4(rgyud): 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra/ /ljags kyi mtshan ni yangs shing shin tu mnyen/ /dper na pad+ma le brgan chab chung 'dra/ /smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mnga'/ /
87a5(rgyud): g.yas su 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs/ /shangs kyi dbyibs mtho gser gyi gar bu 'dra/ /'od mnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'/ /'jig rten dri mchog
87a6(rgyud): dam pa thams cad kun/ /sngon tshe gar gnas thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing / /sngo la
87a7(rgyud): rab mnyen g.yas su 'khyil bas na/ kha dog rab mnyam dpe bgyir shin tu dka'/ /bltams ma thag tu 'od mchog mnga' bas na/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
87b1(rgyud): thams cad gsal mdzad cing / /srid gsum sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas/ /de dag thams cad bde ba 'thob par mdzad/ /sems can dud 'gro yi dwags 'gro ba dang /
87b2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun/ /de dag sdug bsngal mang po zhi mdzad pas/ /rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /sku yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas/ /rab sbyangs
87b3(rgyud): gser 'dra gya nom zla ma mchis/ /zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /sgros dmar mdog mdzes bung ba'i 'bras bu mtshungs/ /gshegs stobs spyod lam seng ge'i rgyal
87b4(rgyud): po bzhin/ /sku mdog rab gsal gdugs ni 'char ba 'dra/ /phyag ngar ring ba pus mo 'das pa ni/ /dbyibs ni sA la'i lcug ma 'phyang dang mtshungs/ /'od ni 'dom gang mtha'
87b5(rgyud): yas gsal mdzad pas/ /rab gsal gdugs ni brgya stong ji lta bzhin/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni kun tu khyab pas na/ /rkyen ni ji bzhin skye dgu sad par mdzad/ /rnam dag 'od
87b6(rgyud): zer dra bas zla ma mchis/ /'od kyis 'jig rten brgya stong rgyas mdzad pas/ /phyogs bcu kun gsal mdzad la thogs mi mnga'/ /mun nag thams cad rab tu sel mdzad pa//
87b7(rgyud): bde gshegs byams 'od bde bar ba stsol bas/ /kha dog gya nom gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'od kyi zhing ni brgya stong khyab mdzad pas/ /sems can gang reg thams cad des
88a1(rgyud): @#/ /par 'byung / /bcom ldan sku ni bsod nams tshad med ldan/ /yon tan thams cad kun gyis rab tu brgyan/ /khams gsum ldan pas nyag cig
88a2(rgyud): gtsor gsungs pas/ /'jig rten khyad 'phags dpe zla yod ma mchis/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ji snyed pa/ /grangs ni sa chen rdul phran dag dang mtshungs/ /ma
88a3(rgyud): byon da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i gtso/ /sa chen rdul phran ji bzhin mang po la/ /bdag ni rtse gcig lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas spyi btud skyabs
88a4(rgyud): su mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas rab bsngags nas/ /spos dang me tog sna tshogs kun gyis mchod/ /bdag ni lce ni brgya stong mchis 'gyur te/ /bskal pa tshad med
88a5(rgyud): rab tu bsngags brjod kyang / /bcom ldan yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /mchog tu zab pas shin tu brjod par dka'/ /bdag gi lce ni brgya stong mchis pa yis//
88a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan kun bsngags kyang / /de la cha shas tsam yang rtogs dka' na/ /sangs rgyas mtha' dag yon tan smos ci 'tshal/ /gal te sa chen dang ni
88a7(rgyud): lha rnams nas/ /srid rtse'i bar dag rgya mtsho'i chab gyur kyang / /spu yi rtse mos grangs ni rtogs rung gi/ sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad gzhal bar dka'/ /bdag gis lus
88b1(rgyud): dang ngag yid rtse gcig tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas bsngags brjod pa'i/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bsam dka' ci mchis pa/ /sems can yongs bsngo sangs rgyas myur
88b2(rgyud): 'grub smon/ /rgyal po de yis sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /gzhan yang rang sems smon lam cher btab pa/ /bdag ni ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe/ /tshe rabs bskal pa tshad med
88b3(rgyud): grangs med snyed/ /rmi lam rtag par gser rnga cher mthong nas/ /'gyod tshangs bstan pa'i sgra ni thos par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan pad+ma'i dpes bsngags pas/ /skye med rtogs
88b4(rgyud): nas yang dag sangs rgyas shog/ sangs rgyas brgya lam lan cig 'jig rten 'byung / /bskal pa brgya stong shin tu phrad par dka'/ /rmi lam rtag par gser rnga sgra mchog thos/ /
88b5(rgyud): nyin mtshan ci rigs 'gyod tshangs bgyid par shog/ bdag gis pha rol phyin drug tshogs bsgoms nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las rab drangs te/ /de 'og bla
88b6(rgyud): med mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ /zhing ni rnam dag bsam gyis mi khyab shog/ gser gyi rnga mchog sangs rgyas phul ba dang / /sangs rgyas yang dag yon tan bsngags pa'i rgyus//
88b7(rgyud): bcom ldan shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas/ /bdag la mi mchog 'gyur bar lung bstan shog/ bdag gi bu ni gser klu gser gyi 'od/ /'das pa'i dus tshe dge bshes bgyis
89a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas na| |tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi khyim skyes te/ /lhan cig bla med byang chub lung nod shog/ sems can gang zhig mgon dang skyabs ma mchis//
89a2(rgyud): yun ring 'khor bar sdug bsngal mang myong ba/ /bdag gis ma 'ongs mgon dang skyabs bgyis nas/ /de dag rtag tu bde ba thob par shog/ srid gsum sdug bsngal mang po
89a3(rgyud): nyer zhi nas/ /thams cad yid bzhin bde gnas thob gyur te/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ji lta bzhin/ /ma 'ongs byang chub mngon par bsgrub par shog/ gser
89a4(rgyud): 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i bsod nams 'dis/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gtan skams sdig bral nas/ /las kyi sgrib dang nyon mongs nyer zhi ste/ /bdag gis rnam
89a5(rgyud): dag 'bras bu myur thob shog/ bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho tshad med cing / /rnam dag dri bral zab pas gting ma mchis/ /bdag gis yon tan rgya mtsho 'di thob nas//
89a6(rgyud): bla med byang chub chen po myur 'grub shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa 'di yi mthus/ /bsod nams rnam dag 'od zer 'thob par shog/ rnam dag 'od zer
89a7(rgyud): dam pa thob nas kyang / /shes rab 'od kyis thams cad gsal bgyid shog/ bdag gi lus 'od sangs rgyas mtshungs 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams ye shes dag kyang
89b1(rgyud): de bzhin shog/ 'jig rten kun tu gcig pu gtsor brjod cing / /gzi brjid mthu stobs rang dbang zla med shog/ zag bcas sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'das par shog/ 'dus ma byas
89b2(rgyud): kyi bde mtsho rtag bgrod shog/ de ltar bsod nams mtsho ni rtag 'phel shog/ ma 'ongs ye shes rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shog/ bdag gi zhing na khams gsum yongs 'das
89b3(rgyud): nas| |khyad 'phags yon tan tshad med mtha' med shog/ rkyen dang ldan rnams lhan cig skyes gyur nas/ /thams cad rnam dag ye shes myur grub shog/ mjes pa'i tog
89b4(rgyud): khyod shes par byos/ /rgyal po gser klu bdag po yis/ /smon lam de 'dra gang btab pa/ /de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no/ /gser klu gser 'od zhes bya ba/ /sngon gyi khye'u gnyis
89b5(rgyud): po ni| |dngul tog dngul mtshan nyid yin te/ /nga las lung bstan thob pa yin/ /'khor mang de skad thos pa na/ /thams cad byang chub sems bskyed de/ /de ltar ma 'ongs dus
89b6(rgyud): kyi tshe| |'gyod tshangs 'di spyod smon lam btab/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ pad+ma lta bu'i dpes bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste
89b7(rgyud): bdun pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
90a1(rgyud): @#/ /to| |rigs kyi bu/ gser rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon
90a2(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing bkur sti dang / mchod pa byed 'dod pas gzungs 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
90a3(rgyud): zhe na| gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so/ /de lta bas na gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed
90a4(rgyud): p a gang yin pa de ni bsod nams chen po ldan zhing 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas deng yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba
90a5(rgyud): yin no/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang / gdon mi za bar chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /
90a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags sgrub ba'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/ sngar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de sems rtse gcig tu gus pas
90a7(rgyud): phyag byas nas de'i 'og tu sngags gdon par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
90b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi
90b2(rgyud): 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs
90b3(rgyud): rgyas lha'i rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /steng phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba la phyag
90b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos brtsegs
90b5(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud la
90b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
90b7(rgyud): rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i 'od la phyag
91a1(rgyud): @#/ /'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
91a2(rgyud): rtog pa 'jigs med dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal
91a3(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
91a4(rgyud): sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
91a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
91a6(rgyud): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
91a7(rgyud): chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge
91b1(rgyud): ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na ta yA ya/ tad+yA thA/ ku Ti/ ku Ti ni/ i mi ri to/ ko Sha ni i mi ri Ne/ i rI swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
91b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rab gnas la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzugs
91b3(rgyud): 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro
91b4(rgyud): byed pa dang / gus pas bla mar byed pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byed pa yin pas/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang po rnams kyis kyang gang zag de la bla na med pa yang dag par
91b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /rab gnas/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gos dang / zas
91b6(rgyud): dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams mang po thob par 'gyur bas ji ltar mos pa rnams yid
91b7(rgyud): bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro/ /rab gnas/ gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rtag par
92a1(rgyud): @#/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer kyi ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub
92a2(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma hA bing ga la la sogs pa dang lhan cig gnas par
92a3(rgyud): 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab gnas/ 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i
92a4(rgyud): tshe cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o/ /sngags lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas zla ba yar
92a5(rgyud): gyi ngo'i tshes gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te gos sar pa bgos nas spos bsregs me tog gtor te bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa
92a6(rgyud): byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de sems rtse gcig
92a7(rgyud): t u gus pas phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad
92b1(rgyud): bzlas te lus drang por bsrang nas/ yid la bya zhing smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o/ /nyi ma shar ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zas gtsang ma gcig tu bza' bar bya zhing nyin gcig
92b2(rgyud): la zas gcig bza' bar bya'o/ /zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bar byed na gang zag de bsod nams dang / gzi byin mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
92b3(rgyud): par 'gyur bas ci dang / ci smon pa mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na'ang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing bsam
92b4(rgyud): pa bzhin du 'grub nas kyang rtag par yid la bya zhing brjed par mi bya'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u
92b5(rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang /
92b6(rgyud): mi dang / 'khor mang po rnams la phan gdags shing / de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chud par mdzad par bzhad pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang
92b7(rgyud): bstan pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las/ /yang dag stong pa nyid dag chos bshad pa/ /deng 'dir mdo sde'i rgyal po
93a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di las kyang / /stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad/ /zab mo'i chos ni rgya chen mang po la/ /sems can shes med rig par mi nus pas/
93a2(rgyud): de'i phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na/ /stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir/ /shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen mchog/
93a3(rgyud): dag gis/ /ngas deng 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du/ /bstan pas de dag stong don gsal rtogs 'gyur/ /lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas te/ /rkun po drug gnas phan
93a4(rgyud): tshun yong mi shes/ /yul drug rkun po tha dad dbang po gnas/ /so sor phan tshun mi shes de bzhin no/ /mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la blta/ /rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan
93a5(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad/ /sna yi dbang pos rgyun tu dri yul snom/ /lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong / /lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len/ /yid kyi dbang pos chos rig
93a6(rgyud): skyo mi shes/ /dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang bas/ /so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed/ /rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min/ /dbang po gnas nas mi
93a7(rgyud): dben 'dod pas tshol/ /dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar/ /rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no/ /sems ni kun tshol gnas kyi rjes su 'jug/ dbang rten
93b1(rgyud): yul dmigs dngos pos rnam rig pas/ /rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred/ /chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas/ /rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug pas/ /mkha'
93b2(rgyud): la bya 'phur thogs pa med pa 'dra/ /dbang po rten byed de la ltos nas ni/ /phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus/ /lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med/ /rang bzhin mi brtan
93b3(rgyud): rkyen la ltos nas grub/ /yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas/ /'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jug/ sa chu me rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas/ /rgyu rkyen ji
93b4(rgyud): bzhin tha dad 'bras bu 'thob/ /lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas/ /sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig gnas pa 'dra/ /'byung chen sbrul bzhi rang bzhin tha dad
93b5(rgyud): pas/ /lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yod/ /steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab/ /de dag mthar ni zad pa'i chos su 'gro/ sbrul gdug rnam pa bzhi po de dag
93b6(rgyud): las/ /sa chu sbrul gnyis phan cher thur du 'bying / /me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas na/ /mi mthun 'di dbang nad mang skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dang rnam shes lus
93b7(rgyud): 'di gnas nas ni/ /dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na/ /lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni/ /lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed/ /nad dang phrad nas lus
94a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni shi ba'i 'og/ bshang gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu snang / /rul myags 'bus gces blta bar yong mi mos/ /dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar
94a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar blta bar byos/ /ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad 'dzad pas mi rtag ste/ /thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi
94a3(rgyud): mthu las byung / /'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na/ /yang dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas/ /de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad/ /'di dag stong zhing
94a4(rgyud): yang dag min rig byos/ /ma rig rang bzhin gzod ma nyid kyis med/ /rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las yod pa min/ /dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas/ /de phyir
94a5(rgyud): nga yis ma rig yin par bshad/ /'du byed rnam shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod/ /skye mched drug dang reg tshor rjes su skye/ /sred len srid skye rga shi bskyed pas na/ /mya
94a6(rgyud): ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang / /sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir/ /'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshad dus med/ /rang bzhin yod min ngo bo
94a7(rgyud): nyid stong yang / /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed/ /nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas/ /rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas/ /lnga phung
94b1(rgyud): khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas/ /byang chub yang dag gnas ni btsal ba yin/ /nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye nas/ /gya nom bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin/ /yang dag bdud
94b2(rgyud): rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang / /rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang / /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/ /ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron chen rab
94b3(rgyud): kyang spar/ /ngas ni chos kyis char chen dam pa phab/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu pha ma byas te/ /bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng / /'khor ba'i mtsho las skye dgu
94b4(rgyud): rmongs pa bzlas/ /nga yis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang bcad/ /nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te/ /mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni/ /rab bsil
94b5(rgyud): bdud rtsis de dag tshim byas nas/ /lus dang sems kyi gdung ba zhi bar byas/ /de nas ngas ni bskal pa tshad med snyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gus mchod byas/ /
94b6(rgyud): tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni/ /chos sku bde ba'i gnas ni btsal ba yin/ /gzhan la mig ngang rkang lag rna ba dang / /bu dang chung ma bran btang phangs pa
94b7(rgyud): med/ /nor dang rin chen bdun gyi rgyan phreng dag/ slong ba dag la thams cad yongs su btang / /bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas/ /sa bcu yongs rdzogs yang
95a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag mngon sangs rgyas/ /de phyir nga ni thams cad mkhyen brjod kyang / /sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med/ /gal te stong gsum stong chen
95a2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams/ /sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i dngos rnams dang / /nags tshal ljon shing sA lu til rnams dang / /'od ma la sogs yal ga ji snyed pa/ /'di la sogs
95a3(rgyud): pa'i dngos po bcad btubs te/ /thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas pa dang / /gang nas bsdus spungs tshad ni shes dka' dang / /de bzhin nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi//
95a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag ni thams cad na/ /stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i/ /sa rnams rdul kyi phye mar byas gyur na/ /rdul 'di tshad ni bgrang bar mi
95a5(rgyud): nus pas/ /sems can thams cad shes pa ci yod pa/ /shes pa de kun mi gcig rab byin nas/ /'di ltar de yi shes pa tshad med pas/ /rdul phran de yi grangs ni
95a6(rgyud): shes rung yang / /bcom ldan thub pas skad cig gang mkhyen pa/ /shes ldan de dag lhan cig gzhal bcug na/ /bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs snyed du/ /cung zad
95a7(rgyud): tsam yang brtsi zhing shes mi nus/ /de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab mo 'di lta bu bkas bshad pa thos nas sems can
95b1(rgyud): tshad med pa snyed 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang / dbang po drug dang / yul drug po yang dag pa ma yin pas 'ching ba bskyed par
95b2(rgyud): m ngon par rtogs par gyur nas 'khor ba yongs su spangs te nges par 'byung ba yang dag par sgrub par smon lam btab nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas
95b3(rgyud): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pas spyod par gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu
95b4(rgyud): pa'o/ / //de nas lha'i bu mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'khor mang po'i nang du chos zab mo thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te
95b5(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
95b6(rgyud): 'das kyis don gyi tshul zab mo dag la rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i chos gang lags pa bkas bshad du ci gnang zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag
95b7(rgyud): gis 'jig rten snang mdzad dang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog la ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag spyod/ /zhu na thugs rjes gnang bar smon/ /bcom ldan rigs kyi lha
96a1(rgyud): @#/ /mo la/ /gal te the tshom yod gyur na/ /khyod kyis yid bzhin zhus shig dang / /rnam phye bstan par bya zhes gsungs/ /de nas lha mos bcom ldan
96a2(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/ /byang chub yang dag spyad spyod na/ /bdag dang gzhan la sman slad du/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das spangs
96a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi chos spyod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /
96a4(rgyud): ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos la spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi spyod pa bsgom par bya zhe na/ 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byas
96a5(rgyud): pas chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid phung po lnga yin yang phung po lnga'ang brjod du med la phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chos kyi
96a6(rgyud): dbyings phung po lnga yin par gyur na ni chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur la/ gal te phung po lnga dang tha dad par gyur na ni rtag pa'i lta bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid gnyis dang bral
96a7(rgyud): ba| mtha' gnyis la mngon par ma chags pa/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi
96b1(rgyud): dbyings bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ ji ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byed ce na/ 'di ltar phung po lnga dag ni rgyu dang / rkyen las skye ba ma yin no//
96b2(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te rgyu dang / rkyen las skyes pa zhig yin par gyur na skyes zin pa'i phyir skye'am/ ma skyes pa'i phyir skye/ gal te skyes zin pa zhig skye na ni rgyu dang / rkyen dgos
96b3(rgyud): pa ci zhig yod/ gal te ma skyes pa zhig skye na ni nam yang skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa/ ming med pa/
96b4(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa/ dgag par bya ba ma yin pa/ dpe byar mi rung ba/ rgyu dang / rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnga'i
96b5(rgyud): sgra gang yin pa de ni shing la'ang brten/ ko ba dang / dbyug gu dang / lag pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i phyir sgra 'byung bar 'gyur yang 'di ltar rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni
96b6(rgyud): 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da ltar byung ba'ang stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing las kyang mi 'byung / ko ba las kyang mi 'byung /
96b7(rgyud): dbyug gu dang / lag pa las kyang mi 'byung / dus gsum las kyang mi 'byung bas/ de ni ma skyes pa'o/ /ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'gag
97a1(rgyud): @#/ /par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de ni gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang du'ang 'gro bar mi
97a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rtag par yang ma yin/ chad par yang ma yin no/ /rtag par yang ma yin chad par yang ma yin pa de ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma
97a3(rgyud): yin pas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te 'di gcig pa zhig yin na ni chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta yin na ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyang yang
97a4(rgyud): dag pa'i bden pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi/ de lta ma yin pas de'i
97a5(rgyud): phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /gal te tha dad do zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon
97a6(rgyud): par zhen pa dang bcas pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
97a7(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa dag la yang dag par ngo bo nyid
97b1(rgyud): du mnyam par rtogs pas de'i phyir tha dad pa'ang ma yin te/ de lta bas na phung po lnga po dag ni yod pa ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang / rkyen las ma skyes pa/ rgyu dang / rkyen
97b2(rgyud): med pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin bar rig par bya'o/ /'phags pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir tshig dang / tha snyad kyis rig par mi 'gyur/ ming
97b3(rgyud): med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu med pa/ rkyen med pa/ dpe med pa/ thog ma dang / tha ma med par rab tu dben pa/ gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas de'i phyir
97b4(rgyud): phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par nus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su
97b5(rgyud): gnyer bar 'dod pas don dam pa dang / kun rdzob las gud na yongs su tshol bar byed na de ni shin tu dpag cing bsam pa dka' ba yin te so so'i skye bo dang / 'phags pa'i spyod
97b6(rgyud): yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pas kun rdzob kyang mi spong la/ don dam pa dang yang mi 'bral bar chos kyi dbyings la brten nas byang chub kyi
97b7(rgyud): spyod pa spyad par bya'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
98a1(rgyud): @#/ /gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas sems rtse gcig tu mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan
98a2(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gong du ji skad bka' stsal pa'i byang chub kyi yang dag pa'i don la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la deng bdag gis
98a3(rgyud): bslab par bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos 'khor mang po'i nang du lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di

98a5(rgyud): mos tshangs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa ltar na 'di ni yang dag par shin tu zab pa yin
98a6(rgyud): pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don shes par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin pas shin tu gya nom zhing shes par dka' ba yin no/ /gal te
98a7(rgyud): d eng bdag gis chos 'di la brten nas bde bar gnas par 'thob pa bden te mi rdzun par gyur na dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can tshad med grangs med
98b1(rgyud): mtha' med pa thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te skyes pa'ang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste/ bde ba tshad med pa myong ba dang /

98b3(rgyud): t hams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces de'i tshe rigs kyi lha mos de skad ces smras ma thag tu dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad gser gyi
98b4(rgyud): g yi kha dog tu gyur nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan te skyes pa'ang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste bde ba tshad med pa dag la
98b5(rgyud): longs spyod par gyur pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du ngan 'gro rnams kyang med de/ rin po che'i ljon shing phreng du dkrigs shing rin po
98b6(rgyud): che sna bdun gyi me tog gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par phab/ lha'i rol mo rnams
98b7(rgyud): kyang byas te rigs kyi lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'ang bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas tshangs pa'i lha'i lus su gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos
99a1(rgyud): @#/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ji ltar byang chub kyi spyad pa yongs su spyad par byed/ smras pa/
99a2(rgyud): kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ gal te chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /gal te rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na/ bdag kyang byang
99a3(rgyud): chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /gal te smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /gal te lung pa'i brag cha byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par
99a4(rgyud): byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces
99a5(rgyud): smras so/ /khyod don gang la brten nas tshig 'di smra bar byed/ smras pa/ kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ chos gcig 'ga' tsam yang de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa med
99a6(rgyud): mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgyu dang / rkyen gyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa yin no/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta bu yin par gyur na 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
99a7(rgyud): rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /smras pa/ khyod ci la bsam te 'di skad du smra
99b1(rgyud): par byed/ ci/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad/ byang chub kyang tha dad/ byang chub ma yin pa'ang tha dad/ rnam par grol ba'ang tha dad/
99b2(rgyud): rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'ang tha dad pa zhig yin snyam mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ 'di ltar chos rnams ni mnyam zhing tha dad pa med de chos kyi dbyings 'di la de bzhin nyid tha dad par
99b3(rgyud): gyur pa med pas mngon par zhen par bya ba'i bar zhes bya ba'ang med de 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par gyur pa yin no/ /kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma
99b4(rgyud): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma sgyu ma ston pa la shin tu mkhas pa zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor gseg ma ngang / rtswa dang / shing gi lo ma la sogs pa blangs te phung po
99b5(rgyud): gcig tu spungs nas sgyu rtsal rnams kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta dang / dmag la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /
99b6(rgyud): bang mdzod rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sprul par gyur na sems can gang dag glen zhing gti mug can du gyur pa/ dpyod par mi nus
99b7(rgyud): pa| sgyu ma'i rtsa ba mi shes pa dag gis mthong ngam/ thos par gyur na 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong zhing thos pa'i glang po che dang / rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de
100a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni brdzun pa yin no snyam du sems pas phyis legs par so sor rtog cing sems pa'ang med do/ /

100a3(rgyud): dang / rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma'i dngos po mig slu bar byed pa tsam zhig yod par zad de mi bden pas glang po che la
100a4(rgyud): sogs pa dang / bang mdzod rnams yod do snyam du mi sems pas ming tsam zhig yod par zad kyi/ yang dag pa ni ci'ang med do snyam du sems pas/ /bdag nyid kyis ji ltar
100a5(rgyud): mthong zhing thos pas de dag la'ang yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin par yang mi byed la/ phyis dpyod cing sems pa'i tshe'ang yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /de
100a6(rgyud): bzhin du blo dang ldan pa dag gis kyang chos thams cad la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pas kun rdzob kyi rjes su ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du

100b1(rgyud): tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa dag ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa mi shes pa'i

100b6(rgyud): p as yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ci'ang med do snyam du rig cing khong du chud par gyur kyang 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kun rdzob kyi rjes su gzhan dag yang dag pa'i don rtogs par

101a2(rgyud): phyir kun rdzob kyi ming dang / tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin no/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro

101b3(rgyud): p a'i 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'i

102a1(rgyud): @#/ /bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/ /

102a7(rgyud): chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ dge slong mang po dag ni bsod nams 'di la brten nas ji skad bsten pa
102b1(rgyud): bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pas bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das nas khong du chud cing go bar 'gyur bas 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

102b6(rgyud): bas gang la la zhig gis bskal pa chen po brgya stong du ma'i bar du thabs dang mi ldan par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su spyad pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo

103a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang bsgrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ de'i phyir ngas

103a3(rgyud): dpa'i lam yongs su spyad pa na ji ltar dpa' bo g.yul ngor 'jug pa bzhin du lus dang / srog la phangs pa med par 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di yongs

103a6(rgyud): dag kyang de nyid du nub cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gal te 'jig rten na gnas par gyur na ni bla na
103a7(rgyud): med pa'i chos kyi rin po che rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ gal te mdo sde 'di med par gyur na ni gnas de nyid du nub par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal
103b1(rgyud): bo 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du gdon par bya/ gzhan dag la bstan par bya zhing yi ger 'dri bar bskul nas brtson
103b2(rgyud): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad de lus dang / srog la'ang phangs pa med par rab tu brtson par byed na bsod nams kyi nang na mchog tu 'gyur bas nga'i slob ma rnams kyis de

103b6(rgyud): p o gang lags pa de dag yongs su bsrung zhing spel bar bgyid la gal te bgegs bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag gis yongs su bsal nas dge ba mang po dang
103b7(rgyud): ldan pa dang / kha dog dang / mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / lus dang / sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams
104a1(rgyud): @#/ /bde ba myong bar bgyid do/ /yul gang na gnas pa der mu ge dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / mi ma lags pa dag gis 'tsho zhing gnod pa bgyid
104a2(rgyud): par gyur na bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs nas skye bo rnams bde zhing skyid cing longs spyod rgyas pa dang / glo bur gyi gnod pa rnams ma mchis par
104a3(rgyud): bgyid de/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig 'khor rnams kyi mthu lags so/ /gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la mchod par bgyis na bdag cag kyang
104a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i bsam pas bkur sti dang / mchod par bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po dang /
104a5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnams nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bar la bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis chos zab mo gya nom pa thos nas
104a6(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrungs shing yongs su bskyangs pas bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa mtha' med pa
104a7(rgyud): snyed thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas bcom
104b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste spyi bos blangs par gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid
104b2(rgyud): la brten nas smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / //de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / lha'i
104b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom
104b4(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser
104b5(rgyud): 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtag par dgongs shing gzigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bkur
104b6(rgyud): sti bgyis pa/ lha dang / klu thams cad kyis rtag par mchod pa/ lha'i 'khor rnams kyis rtag par dga' ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis rtag par bsngags pa
104b7(rgyud): brjod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la khyad par du
105a1(rgyud): @#/ /'phags pa'i bde ba stsol ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bgyid
105a2(rgyud): pa| 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad rab tu sel ba/ phas kyi dgra thams cad phyir zlog par bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dus ngan pa'i tshe lo legs par bgyid pa/ rims nad kyi
105a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ltas ngan pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa brgya stong rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser
105a4(rgyud): ' od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bde ba stsol cing bdag cag la'ang sman par bgyid pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
105a5(rgyud): mang po'i nang du rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro 'di thos par gyur
105a6(rgyud): na mthu stobs dang ldan zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang ches lhag cing khyad du 'phags par 'gyur
105a7(rgyud): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhi'ang chos yang dag par mngon par sgrub cing rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan nas chos kyis 'jig rten
105b1(rgyud): 'dul bar bgyid pas bdag cag gis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / grul bum dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
105b2(rgyud): de dag dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba la 'god par bgyid pas sdig pa'i las rnams 'gog cing yongs su sel bar
105b3(rgyud): bgyid do/ /mi'i mdangs 'phrog par bgyid pa'i 'dre srin byams pa dang / snying rje ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thag ring du mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
105b4(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las
105b5(rgyud): yang dag par 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir blta bar bgyid cing yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu dang / rkyen des na bdag
105b6(rgyud): cag rgyal po rnams kyang 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /gzhan yang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul gyi rgyal po gang la la zhig la phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams rtag
105b7(rgyud): par nye bar mchis te gnod par bgyis par gyur tam/ mu ge dang / rims nad mang pos gnod par gyur tam/ ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed byung bar
106a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la
106a2(rgyud): bkur sti dang / mchod pa bgyid pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang la la mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog cing kun chub pa zhig mchis par gyur na bdag cag rgyal
106a3(rgyud): po chen po bzhi de'i thad du mchis te go bar bgyis nas de la bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs par bgyid de/ chos smra ba de'ang bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis go bar bgyis
106a4(rgyud): p a'i mthus yul khams der mchis nas gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar bgyid pas mdo sde 'di'i mthus gnod
106a5(rgyud): pa dang / ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi zhing yongs su sel bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po
106a6(rgyud): gang gi yul du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba yul der mchis par gyur na mdo sde 'di'ang yul der gshegs par rig par bgyi lags so/ /
106a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po de chos smra ba'i thad du mchis nas des chos bstan pa gang lags pa mnyan par bgyi'o/ /thos nas kyang rab tu dga'
106b1(rgyud): bas chos smra ba de la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyis te shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas yongs su bsrungs nas mya ngan dang / gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te
106b2(rgyud): mdo sde 'di'ang yang dag par bstan nas thams cad la phan gdags par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu dang / rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi thams cad sems
106b3(rgyud): rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dang / yul gyi mi thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spongs shing rtag par bde ba la reg par bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
106b4(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis par gyur na de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des
106b5(rgyud): ci dang / ci 'tshal ba sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid par gyur na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis yul gyi bdag po de dang / yul gyi mi thams
106b6(rgyud): cad rab tu bde bar bgyid cing gnod pa rnams thag ring du spong bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
106b7(rgyud): kha ton tu 'don par bgyid pa la mi'i rgyal po des mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyis te bsngags pa brjod par bgyid na bdag cag rgyal po de rgyal po rnams
107a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi nang na mchog tu btsun pa dang / gus pas bla mar bgyis pas yul gyi rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/ /'khor
107a2(rgyud): mang po rnams de skad ces thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen
107a3(rgyud): po bzhis lha dang / mi rnams la blta zhing brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/
107a4(rgyud): bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde la bkur sti dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa
107a5(rgyud): dag la yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su srung bar byed pa gsan pa dang / legs so/ /legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po khyed cag ni 'das
107a6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
107a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan te 'di ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba yin pas khyed cag yun ring po nas sems can
107b1(rgyud): rnams la rtag par phan 'dogs shing byams pa chen po'i sems bskyed nas bde ba sbyin par smon pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na khyed cag da ltar rnam par smin pa mchog la longs spyod pa yin no/ /
107b2(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po/ gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde 'di la bkur sti byas nas mchod pa byed pa zhig yod na khyod kyis nan tan bskyed de yongs su bsrung
107b3(rgyud): nas bde ba thob par bya'o/ /khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis mdo sde 'di yongs su srung bar byed na des
107b4(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur bas khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor gzhan
107b5(rgyud): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe rtag tu rgyal ba'i phan yon 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyed cag mdo sde 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su 'dzin
107b6(rgyud): par byed na mdo sde 'di'i mthus sdug bsngal mang po dang / phyir rgol pa'i dgra dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi zhing yongs su sel bar byed pas de'i
107b7(rgyud): phyir khyod kyis gal te 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par mthong bar 'gyur na rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis
108a1(rgyud): @#/ /yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa bsal te bde ba sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas
108a2(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa
108a3(rgyud): mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yul lam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ri'am/ nags tshal lam/ 'brog dgon pa'i gnas gang yang
108a4(rgyud): r ung ba dag tu yongs su spel zhing gnas par gyur na yul de'i rgyal pos mdo sde 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su bzung ste bsngags pa brjod nas mchod par
108a5(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la yo byad sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngags te gnod cing mi bde ba
108a6(rgyud): dag yongs su spong bar bgyid na rgyu dang / rkyen des bdag cag rgyal po de dang / mi mang po rnams yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba la bkod de mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal rnams
108a7(rgyud): thag ring du spangs nas tshe 'phel ba dang / gzi byin phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yul gyi bdag po des 'khor bzhi po de dag mdo sde 'di yongs su
108b1(rgyud): ' dzin pa mthong nas gus pas yongs su bsrungs te pha ma bzhin du ci 'tshal ba thams cad sbyar te mchod par bgyis na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rtag par yongs su bsrungs
108b2(rgyud): nas sems can mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas de'i slad du bdag cag gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin tshad ma mchis pa dang bcas par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang
108b3(rgyud): du spel ba'i gnas der lus sbas nas yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su srung ba bgyid pas bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di nyid nyan pa'i gang zag dang / rgyal
108b4(rgyud): po la sogs pa la'ang yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid pas gnod pa yongs su bsal nas bde ba la 'god pa dang / phyogs gzhan nas mchis pa'i dgra rnams kyang
108b5(rgyud): slar zlog par bgyid do/ /mi'i rgyal po/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa'i tshe nye 'khor na gnas pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams te yul de dag gzhom
108b6(rgyud): mo snyam du sems par gyur na'ang / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus de'i nye 'khor gyi dgra de la phyir rgol ba'i dgra tha dad pa
108b7(rgyud): gzhan mchis nas gzhom par bgyid cing de'i yul khams su ltas ngan mang po dang / rims nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i che rgyal po des de lta bu mthong ba dang /
109a1(rgyud): @#/ /dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams nas yul der chas te gzhom par bgyid pa na bdag cag kyang de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin gyi 'khor ched
109a2(rgyud): ma mchis shing / mtha' ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas pas so so nas rang gi lus sbas te yongs su bsrungs nas grogs bgyid pas de nyid kyis phyir rgol ba'i dgra de rab tu
109a3(rgyud): dul bar 'gyur bas yul khams der mchi ba'i thugs kyang mi thub na phan tshun dmag dang / mtshon gyis 'thab pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
109a4(rgyud): kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po/ khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde 'di yongs su skyong ba dang / yongs su srung par byed pa legs so/ /
109a5(rgyud): legs so/ /nga sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'das pa na dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
109a6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes nas chos 'di bstan pa yin pas/ mi'i rgyal po/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung
109a7(rgyud): nas bkur sti dang / mchod pa byed na gnod pa rnams pa nye bar zhi nas rab tu bde bar 'gyur/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar
109b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba'i dgra rnams zlog par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa'i rgyal po thams cad la gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i dngos po rnams gtan med
109b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na yod pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis mi'i rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong
109b3(rgyud): po rnams kyang so so nas rang rang gi yul du longs spyod kyi bde ba myong zhing rang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/ nor dang / rin po che dpal 'byor gyis rgyas pa dag la longs spyod par
109b4(rgyud): b yed pas phan tshun 'phrog par mi byed cing sngon gyi rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa dag la longs spyod par byed pas bsam pa ngan pa bskyed nas gzhan gyi yul 'dod pas
109b5(rgyud): 'byor pa yongs su tshol ba med de thams cad 'dod pa chung zhing phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa skye par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
109b6(rgyud): yang med par 'gyur/ yul de dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bla 'og mthun zhing chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa lta bur sems kyis phan
109b7(rgyud): tshun sdug cing bkur bar 'gyur/ rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse bar 'gyur/ byams pa dang / snying rjes phan 'dogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar byed pas rgyu dang / rkyen
110a1(rgyud): @#/ /des na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / mi rnams rgyas shing rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ sa chen po mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ grang
110a2(rgyud): dro ran par 'gyur/ dus tshigs mi mthun pa med par 'gyur/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang sngon gyi gnas las 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med par 'gyur/ rlung
110a3(rgyud): dang / char pa'ang dus bzhin du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur/ ltas ngan rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ nor dang / rin po che rnams 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ sems la ser sna'i
110a4(rgyud): 'jungs pa med cing rtag par sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ mi rnams tshe 'phos par gyur na'ang phal cher mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur/
110a5(rgyud): lha'i 'khor rnams rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di mnyan te yongs su bsrungs
110a6(rgyud): nas gus pas mchod pa byed pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod par 'dod pa dang / gzhan la'ang khyed 'khor dang bcas pa
110a7(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la phan pa dang / bde bar phan 'dogs par 'dod na de'i phyir rgyal po des rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di
110b1(rgyud): mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar byas te yang dag pa'i chos kyi chu bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dam pa 'di thos pa'i dbang gis khyed la sogs pa'i lus dang / sems kyi mthu stobs
110b2(rgyud): 'phel bar byed pas brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / bsod nams dang / gzi byin rnams rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems
110b3(rgyud): rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na de ni yangs shing rgya che ba dang / shin tu dkon pa'i mchod pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
110b4(rgyud): pa la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te gang gis nga la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
110b5(rgyud): mang po rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med
110b6(rgyud): pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas rgyu dang / rkyen des na khyed la sogs pas rgyal po de dang / btsun mo dang / slas dang / 'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas gnod cing nyam
110b7(rgyud): nga ba med par byas te pho brang bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyang rtag tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba la 'god par byed na bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ @#/
111a1(rgyud): /yul de dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ dngos po ngan pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar
111a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe mi'i rgyal po gang la la
111a3(rgyud): zhig 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par mos pa dang / bdag nyid dang / btsun mo dang / rgyal bu nas pho brang nang gis slas la sogs pa'i bar dag dang /
111a4(rgyud): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / pho brang yongs su srung zhing skyob pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dga' ba mchog dam pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i bde ba 'thob
111a5(rgyud): par 'tshal ba dang / tshe 'di nyid la rgyal thabs btsun zhing mtho ba dang / dbang phyug dang ldan zhing dar ba dang / rtag tu 'phel bar 'tshal ba dang / gzhan
111a6(rgyud): yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis shing / mtha' ma mchis pa yongs su sdud pa dang / rang gi yul du phyir rgol ba'i
111a7(rgyud): dgra dang / mya ngan dang / 'khrug pa dang / gdon bgegs kyi dngos po rnams ma mchis par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des bag
111b1(rgyud): ma mchis pas sems g.yeng bar mi bgyi zhing shin tu gus pa bskyed de bsam pa thag pa nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di mnyan cing yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /
111b2(rgyud): chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i tshe sngar rgyal po la gces pa'i pho brang mchog dam pa rab tu brgyan te gsal ba'i phyogs su spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste me tog mchog
111b3(rgyud): dam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor nas seng ge'i khri chos kyi gdan khyad par du 'phags pa btsugs te rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs
111b4(rgyud): kyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ste rin thang ma mchis pa'i spos bsregs nas rol mo rnams bgyi'o/ /rgyal po des de'i tshe yongs su dag par khrus
111b5(rgyud): b gyis te spos kyi byug pas lus bskus nas gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te rgyan phreng rnams kyis brgyan nas stan dma' ba la mchis te mtho ba'i bsam pa mi
111b6(rgyud): bskyed par dbang phyug gi thabs yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/ /nga rgyal rnams spangs te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par
111b7(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba'i mkhan po la ston pa chen po'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / rgyal bu dang / sras dang / 'khor rnams la byams
112a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa dang / brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas rab tu dga' bas phan tshun blta bar bgyi'o/ /shin tu mthun pa'i mdangs kyis tshig 'jam por smra
112a2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyi lus dang / sems la dga' ba chen pos kun tu khyab par bgyi'o/ /deng bdag ni shin tu bsam par dka' zhing khyad par du 'phags pa'i
112a3(rgyud): phan yon chen po yangs zhing rgya che ba 'di lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas mdo sde'i rgyal po de la rab tu mchod par bgyi'o/ /de ltar bsams lags
112a4(rgyud): nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po der mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur na shin tu gus pa chen pos dkon pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
112a5(rgyud): po chen po bzhi dag la bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mi bsu bar mi bya yi/ de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des gos gsar pa bgos nas rgyan dang / phreng
112a6(rgyud): ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan te bdag nyid gdugs dkar po dang / spos dang / me tog thogs nas dmag gi dpung bshams te rol mo rgyas par byas
112a7(rgyud): nas rkang gis grong khyer nas phyir byung ste bkra shis kyi dngos po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir gus pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po de bsu bar bya'o/ /rgyal
112b1(rgyud): po chen po bzhi po dag/ rgyu dang / rkyen gang gi phyir mi'i rgyal po des bdag nyid kyis bkur sti dang / mchod pa de lta bur dgos she na/ mi'i rgyal po de rkang pa bteg cing rkang pa
112b2(rgyud): bzhag pa na gom pa re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla mar byed par 'gyur
112b3(rgyud): zhing gzhan yang bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur bas so/ /gzhan yang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa'i
112b4(rgyud): grangs de snyed du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i longs spyod mchog khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ gom pa re re bor ba'i dbang gis tshe 'di nyid
112b5(rgyud): la'ang bsod nams 'phel bas rang dbang du rgyal po byed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa dang / mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa
112b6(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du lha dang / mis yongs su spyad pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du
112b7(rgyud): rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ tshig gi spobs pa dang ldan pas lha dang / mi kun gyis mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag pa med par
113a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur/ grags pa chen po dang ldan zhing mang po kun gyis yongs su blta bar 'gyur/ lha dang / mi'i nang du khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba
113a2(rgyud): dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ mthu stobs chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ gzi byin chen po'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus kyi mtshan gya nom zhing shin tu mdzes
113a3(rgyud): pas dpe zla med par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi'i ston pa mthong bar gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa mngon par 'grub
113a4(rgyud): cing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ 'di ltar shes par bya ste mi'i rgyal po de dag gis yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa de
113a5(rgyud): lta bu mthong ba'i phyir bdag nyid dpag tshad gcig nas dpag tshad brgya stong du ma'i bar du chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsu bar bya zhing / chos smra ba'i mkhan po la sangs rgyas
113a6(rgyud): kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /slar grong dang / grong khyer du phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag
113a7(rgyud): gi pho brang du gshegs nas bdag gi mchod pa bzhes te bdag la chos ston par mdzad do/ /bdag kyang chos thos pa'i dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
113b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang phrad par gyur pa yin no/ /deng bdag gis ni shin tu yangs
113b2(rgyud): shing rgya che ba mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / rim
113b3(rgyud): gro byas so/ /deng bdag gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rtsa ba nas bton to/ /deng
113b4(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskyed do/ /deng sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
113b5(rgyud): stong tshad med pa snyed 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bton nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bkod do/ /deng tshad med mtha' med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams
113b6(rgyud): kyi phung po rab tu bsags so/ /pho brang nang gi slas dang / skye bo mang po bde ba la bkod nas/ yul rnams rab tu zhi bar byas pas gnod pa dang / dug gdug pa dang /
113b7(rgyud): mi ma rungs pa med cing phyogs gzhan yang 'ongs pa'i dgra rnams nye bar 'ongs nas gnod pa mi byed pa dang / mya ngan dang / nad rnams med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams
114a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ 'di ltar rig par bya ste de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po de dag gis da ltar yang dag par chos la btsun par byas shing bla
114a2(rgyud): mar byas pa dang / mdo sde dam pa 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti
114a3(rgyud): dang / bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / bsod nams mchog gang yin pa de dag thog ma kho nar 'khor
114a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa la yongs su bsngo bar byed na mi'i rgyal po de dag bsod nams chen po'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur bas tshe 'di nyid la dbang chen
114a5(rgyud): po thob nas gzi byin rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang / mtshan mchog rnams kyis rab tu brgyan par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag pa'i
114a6(rgyud): chos kyis tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po
114a7(rgyud): gang la la zhig de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la gus pas bkur sti bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la
114b1(rgyud): bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyis na de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi gdan dang /
114b2(rgyud): nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste me tog mchog dam pa mang po mngon par gtor nas rgyal po chen po bzhi mchis pa'i stan yang bshams te/
114b3(rgyud): bting par gyur na/ bdag cag kyang rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po des kyang bdag cag la phan 'dogs pa'i dge ba'i
114b4(rgyud): rtsa ba ci mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi skal pa gang lags pa bdag cag la'ang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des chos smra ba la chos
114b5(rgyud): bshad par gsol ba btab nas stan la mchis pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gi slad du spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod par bgyi'o/ /
114b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe spos kyi bdug pa de dag skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bdag cag lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang du
114b7(rgyud): phyin te spos kyi gdugs su 'gyur pas bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyang spos kyi dri mchog de tshor bar 'gyur/ spos kyi du ba de'ang gser 'od dang ldan pas bdag
115a1(rgyud): @#/ /cag gnas pa'i khang khyim nas tshangs pa'i gnas dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / lha mo spobs pa chen po dang / lha mo dpal chen
115a2(rgyud): mo dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang /
115a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i du 'khor lnga brgya dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya
115a4(rgyud): mtsho'i gnas thams cad kyang rab tu gsal bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi gzhal med khang du spos kyi
115a5(rgyud): bdug pa des skad cig yud tsam cig la spos kyi gdugs su gyur pa'ang mthong la spos kyi dri'ang tshor bar 'gyur/ 'od zer gyi kha dog gis lha'i gzhal med khang
115a6(rgyud): thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ spos kyi 'od zer des
115a7(rgyud): gzhal med khang de dag 'ba' zhig gsal bar byas nas spos kyi gdugs su gyur te 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa ma yin te/ mi'i rgyal po de dag lag pa pog
115b1(rgyud): p hor bzung ste spos mchog dam pa bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byed pa'i tshe spos kyi du ba de thang cig yud tsam gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
115b2(rgyud): na yod pa'i nyi ma dang / zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
115b3(rgyud): 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byas
115b4(rgyud): nas nam mkha' kun tu gang zhing rgyas pa dang / spos kyi bdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag sprin gyi gdugs su 'gyur te gdugs de'ang gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pas
115b5(rgyud): lha'i khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byed de 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin dang / spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa thams
115b6(rgyud): cad ni gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i gzi byin gyi mthu las gyur pa yin no/ /mi'i rgyal po de dag lag tu spos phor thogs nas/ mdo
115b7(rgyud): s de 'di la mchod par byed pa'i tshe spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ba' zhig tu khyab
116a1(rgyud): @#/ /bar gyur pa ma yin gyi/ skad cig yud tsam gcig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba khrag
116a2(rgyud): k hrig brgya stong tshad med mtha' med pa kun tu khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi nam mkha' kun gyi spos kyi gdugs su gyur nas kun gsal bar byed pa'ang de bzhin
116a3(rgyud): te de'i tshe sangs rgyas mang po de dag spos gya nom pa'i dri gang yin pa de dag kyang rig cing mkhyen/ sprin gyi bla re dang / gser gyi kha dog de dag kyang gzigs nas phyogs
116a4(rgyud): b cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang
116a5(rgyud): p o de dag gis mthun par gzigs shing so sor brtags te gsung mthun par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la skyes bu chen po khyod kyis shin tu zab pa'i mdo sde gya nom
116a6(rgyud): ba 'di rgya cher yongs su spel nas bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bsngags
116a7(rgyud): pa brjod par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu mnyan nas thos pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de'i tshad kyang shin tu mang ba yin na/ yi ger 'dri
116b1(rgyud): ba dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i
116b2(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag/ sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/
116b3(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas so/ /de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs
116b4(rgyud): m ed pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung gcig tu chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i chos
116b5(rgyud): smra ba'i mkhan po de la legs so/ /legs so zhes bsngags pa 'di brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis dga' ba brgya
116b6(rgyud): s tong tshad med pa snyed mngon par bsgrubs te tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas nas 'phags pa mang po las yang dag par 'das te khams gsum las nges par byung
116b7(rgyud): nas gtso bo mchog tu gyur te byang chub kyi shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su brgyan par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
117a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rkyen dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i bdud kyi dmag tshogs
117a2(rgyud): rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams dang / shin tu zab pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu rtogs par
117a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa/ shin tu zab pa/ gya nom pa
117a4(rgyud): rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi rnga chen po mchog tu gyur pa rab tu rdung bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi dung shin tu gya nom pa

117a6(rgyud): bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i 'ching ba tshad med pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur/ sems can bye ba
