117b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang phrad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen

117b3(rgyud): g yi tshe yon tan tshad ma mchis pa 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po gang gis mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di thos par gyur pa de ni

117b7(rgyud): ' phrul rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mthong ba'i tshe bdag cag rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis nas chos nyan pa'i slad du rgyal po de'i pho brang yongs su gtsang zhing mdzes
118a1(rgyud): @#/ /par brgyan pa chos 'chad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha mo spobs pa chen po dang /
118a2(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang
118a3(rgyud): phyug chen po dang / lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa

118a5(rgyud): gi lus mi snang bar bgyis te mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags pa/ chos kyi gdan shin tu mdzes par bgyis pa/ chos bshad pa'i gnas su mchi
118a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams thams cad sems rtse gcig
118a7(rgyud): t u mi'i rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por gyur pa'i rgyus bdud rtsi'i ros bdag
118b1(rgyud): cag tshim par gyur pas de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po de la yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams yongs su bsal te bde ba thob par bgyid do/ /de'i pho brang dang / grong dang /

118b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig rang gi yul du mdo sde 'di bzhugs par gyur kyang / yongs su spel bar yang mi bgyid
118b4(rgyud): la sems kyis kyang spong bar bgyid cing nyan par yang mi mos/ mchod par yang mi mos/ mchod par yang mi bgyid/ bla mar yang mi bgyid/ bsngags pa brjod
118b5(rgyud): pa'ang mi bgyid la 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong bar gyur na'ang bla mar mi bgyid cing mchod pa dang / rim gro'ang mi bgyid na/ bdag cag dang / 'khor
118b6(rgyud): gzhan rnams dang / lha tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos thos par mi 'gyur bas bdud rtsi'i ro la rgyab kyis phyogs shing dam pa'i chos
118b7(rgyud): kyi rgyun yang stor bar 'gyur/ gzi byin dang / mthu stobs kyang ma mchis par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro 'phel bar bgyid cing lha dang / mi rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur/ 'khor
119a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i chu bor bying bar 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i shul dang gol bar 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi
119a2(rgyud): dang / 'khor gzhan rnams dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po mthong bar gyur na yul de yongs su spong bar bgyid la yongs su skyob cing yongs su bsrungs
119a3(rgyud): pa'i sems kyang yongs su ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bdag cag 'ba' zhig rgyal po de spong bar bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen
119a4(rgyud): po tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang yal bar bor nas mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de ltar yal bar bor ba'i dbang gis yul der gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung
119a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing rgyal thabs kyang stor bar 'gyur/ mi'i tshogs thams cad dge ba'i sems ni ma mchis kyi gcig la gcig 'ching ba dang / gsod pa dang / gshe
119a6(rgyud): ba dang / rtsod pa dang / phan tshun phra ma dang / gya gyu bgyid cing nongs pa ma mchis pa la chad pa gcod pa 'ba' zhig sems pas nad dang / rims nad rnams
119a7(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ gza' mjug rings yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdugs gnyis cig car 'char bar 'gyur/ gza' 'jug pa la rgyun chad pa ma
119b1(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur/ gzha' dkar nag gis bkris pa ma lags pa'i mtshan ma ston par 'gyur/ skar mda' ltung zhing sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ khron pa'i nang nas sgra 'byung bar
119b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ char dang / rlung drag po dus ma lags par 'bab cing ldang bar 'gyur/ rtag par mu ge'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur/
119b3(rgyud): phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra mang pos gtses pas yul mi rnams sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa mang po myong bar 'gyur/ /yul gyi sa phyogs kyang yid du mi mchi zhing mngon par dga'
119b4(rgyud): ba ci'ang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa dang / sngon yul skyong ba'i lha dge
119b5(rgyud): ba chen po rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas mchi ba'i tshe ltas ngan pa'i dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i
119b6(rgyud): rgyal po gang la la zhig yul skyong zhing rtag par bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'tshal ba dang / skye bo mang po rnams bde ba la 'god par 'tshal ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba
119b7(rgyud): thams cad tshar bkum nas rang gi yul khams gtan du rgyas shing ngar bar 'tshal ba dang / yang dag pa'i bstan pa 'jig rten du gnas nas sdug bsngal gyis gnod
120a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams nye bar zhi bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ yul gyi bdag po de dag gdon mi 'tshal
120a2(rgyud): bar mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / len pa dang / 'dzin pa dag la yang bsnyen bkur
120a3(rgyud): ba dang / rim gro dang / mchod par bgyid na/ bdag cag dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i lha'i 'khor gzhan rnams chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi
120a4(rgyud): m thus bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur bas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la sman par 'gyur zhing lha gzhan rnams kyang sman yon mchog
120a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom
120a6(rgyud): ldan 'das/ 'di ltar tshangs pa chen pos kyang sems can rnams la rtag par 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos yang dag par bstan/ brgya
120a7(rgyud): byin lha'i dbang pos kyang bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis kyang bstan bcos mang po
120b1(rgyud): bstan to/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong gis bstan bcos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa
120b2(rgyud): snyed bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang / thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs nas lha dang / mi'i tshogs rnams kyi ched du gser 'od
120b3(rgyud): d am pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa bkas bshad pa gang lags pa de ni bstan pa de dag dang bsgrun na ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyis ches khyad par du
120b4(rgyud): 'phags pas dper bgyir yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po ji snyed mchis pa de dag yang dag pa'i chos
120b5(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten btul nas sems can la bde ba'i dngos po stsal ba dang / bdag dang / 'khor rnams yongs bsrungs nas sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa ma mchis par bgyid
120b6(rgyud): pa dang / gzhan yang / phas kyi rgol bas gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba ji snyed pa thams cad thag ring du spong ba dang / yul gyi gdon bgegs
120b7(rgyud): rnams yongs su bsal nas yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul zhing rtsod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa'i slad du'o/ /de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams so so nas rang gi yul du chos
121a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi sgron ma sbar te mtha' yas pas rnams gsal bar bgyis nas lha'i tshogs dang / rang gi 'khor rnams la sman par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
121a2(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na lha dang / yi dwags ci mchis pa thams cad rgyu dang / rkyen 'di'i
121a3(rgyud): dbang gis bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur zhing gzi byin chen po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / 'od kyi snang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can thams
121a4(rgyud): cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed du rtag par shin tu bde
121a5(rgyud): ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa snyed mnyes par bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de de nas bla na med
121a6(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ 'di lta bu'i sman yon tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thugs
121a7(rgyud): rje chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor las yang dag par 'das pa/ mkhyen pa chen po brgya byin pas lhag pa/ dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su spyad pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang
121b1(rgyud): l dan pa'i drang srong las khyad par du 'phags par gyur pas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyi ches lhag par gyur te brjod du ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
121b2(rgyud): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi ched du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa yang dag par bkas bshad nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul gyi bdag
121b3(rgyud): po thams cad dang / mi'i tshogs mang po rnams 'jig rten na chos kyi cho ga dang / yul yongs su skyong zhing mi rnams gdul ba dang / bskul bar bgyi ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa de dag gsal
121b4(rgyud): b ar khong du chud pa las gyur pa lags te mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus thams cad bde ba thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon 'di dag thams cad kyang ston pa
121b5(rgyud): chen po shAkya thub pas byams pa dang / thugs rje'i mthus mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel pa las gyur pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu dang / rkyen de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po
121b6(rgyud): rnams kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di yongs su bzung ste mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yon
121b7(rgyud): tan khyad par du 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis thams cad la sman par bgyid pas de'i slad du mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /
122a1(rgyud): @#/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor gzhan
122a2(rgyud): rnams dang / lha'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa rnams dang / mi'i rgyal po de dag /gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas mchod pa
122a3(rgyud): dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas te bsngags pa brjod pa mthong nas yongs su bsrungs te gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar byed na/ khyed cag rab tu bde ba myong
122a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar byed do/ /gal te 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar byed na des ni lha dang / mi'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi
122a5(rgyud): mdzad pa rgya cher yang dag par byas pa yin pas sems can tshad med pa snyed la phan btags pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de la khyed kyis rtag
122a6(rgyud): par bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab par bya'o/ /'di lta bu'i 'khor bzhi po dag rkyen gzhan gyis phan tshun gnod par mi byed par byos la de dag lus dang / sems rang
122a7(rgyud): t u dben zhing bde bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par spel nas phyi ma'i mtha' ji srid pa'i bar du sems can la phan 'dogs pa la rgyun chad pa med par byos
122b1(rgyud): shig / de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i
122b2(rgyud): gzugs kyi cho ga mchis te/ sems can gang la la zhig yongs su 'dzin par mos na/ yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / bdag gis rtag par
122b3(rgyud): bsrungs pas sems can de sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par
122b4(rgyud): 'gyur lags so/ /gang zhig yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ na mo bai shra ba NA
122b5(rgyud): ya| mahA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru No ru No/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ mahA bi ka ri/ mahA bi ka raM/ mahA kA la/ mahA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha
122b6(rgyud): tu| bdag nyid kyi ming brjod par bya/ mAM sarba satwa nAM tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngags 'di 'don pas skud pa dkar po la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste
122b7(rgyud): lan re mdud pa re re por nas dpung pa la bcings nas de'i don gdon mi 'tshal bar 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /spos mang bo/ 'di lta ste/ gu gul dang / tsan+dan dang / du
123a1(rgyud): @#/ /ru ska dang / ta ka ra'i phog 'di rnams cha mnyam par gcig tu bsres te sug par pog phor thogs nas bog bsregs te mchod par
123a2(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas khang pa dben par sngags bzlas te lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag g.yar drang bar
123a3(rgyud): bgyi lags so/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA d+ha na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rA ya/ A kaR+Sha/ a pa ra dzi ta/ tsaN+De shwa ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa hi
123a4(rgyud): ta tsiN+Ta/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma d+ha na bad+d+ho/ pa ra ye shwa ra/ swa yaM A kaR+Sha swAhA/ sngags 'di lan bdun tshang bar bzlas nas de'i rjes la sngags kyi snying po gdon
123a5(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngar dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag bgyis nas lha'i dbang po rnam thos kyi ming nas 'don par bgyid na/ nor rdzas
123a6(rgyud): rnams stsol zhing sems can rnams ci dang / ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bde bar stsol bar bgyid do/ /de ltar phyag bgyis nas de'i
123a7(rgyud): rjes la rgyal po rnam thos kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po gdon par bgyid na/ yid bzhin gyi bde ba stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas lha'i rgyal
123b1(rgyud): po rnam thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya
123b2(rgyud): thA| si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ san+d+hA ya/ At+ma nAM ni t+yan an+ta r+b+hA tu swAhA/
123b3(rgyud): na mo bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ d+ha na dA ya swAhA/ ma no ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngags lan stong tshang bar bzlas nas de'i rjes la khang pa gtsang ma dag
123b4(rgyud): tu ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te dkyil 'khor chung du zhig bgyis nas zas ci 'byor pas sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bgyi'o/ /rtag par phog
123b5(rgyud): spos dam pa bsregs nas dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /sngags kyi snying po snga ma gdugs mtshan du sems dran pa nye bar bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis thos pa
123b6(rgyud): tsam du zlos shing gzhan gyis rig par mi bgyid na/ de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu sha ni shi zhes bgyi ba/ gzhon nu'i gzugs nye bar bstan te drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad
123b7(rgyud): du| ci'i phyir/ bdag gi pha 'dod ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas lan du/ 'di skad ces/ bdag dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i don du nor 'tshal na/ de bzhin du stsal bar gsol
124a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhes smra bar bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe sha ni shi tshig de thos pa dang / slar pha'i thad du mchis nas phal/ 'di skad du/ dge ba spyod pa'i mi zhig sems
124a2(rgyud): rtse gcig tu dkon mchog gsum mchod de nor gyis phongs pa'i slad du yab la gsol ba 'debs so zhes bgyis pa dang / las/ khyod myur du song la nyin gcig
124a3(rgyud): b zhin du de la kAR+shA pa na brgya brgya byin cig ces mchi bar 'gyur te sngags 'don pas de lta bu'i mtshan ma mthong bar gyur na don 'grub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyis
124a4(rgyud): n as gcig tu khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du bdug spos bsregs te mchis nyal ba'i khri'i drung du spos kyi sbrog ma cig bzhag nas rtag par nam langs pa'i tshe sprog
124a5(rgyud): ma'i nang du nor ci thob pa blta bar bgyi'o/ /rtag par nor thob pa'i tshe de nyid kyi gdugs la spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas kyis dkon mchog gsum la
124a6(rgyud): mchod cing dbul phongs pa rnams la stsal nas bas par bgyi'o/ /bsris te gzhag par mi bgyi'o/ /sems can rnams la byams pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa
124a7(rgyud): bskyed par bgyi'o/ /zhe sdang dang / g.yo sgyu dang / gnod sems kyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /gal te zhe sdang skyes par gyur na dngos grub kyi mthu stor bar
124b1(rgyud): 'gyur bas rtag par sems bsrungs te zhe sdang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / sngags 'dzin pas rtag par lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang / bu dang / bu mo
124b2(rgyud): dang / 'khor rnams rjes su dran par bgyis te sngags brjod nas rtag par dge ba bcu po de dag gi bstangs te lha de dag bsod nams kyi mthu 'phel zhing rgyas pa
124b3(rgyud): dang / dge ba mang po kun 'phel ba dang / byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bar bgyid na lha mang po de dag gis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / thams cad rab
124b4(rgyud): tu dga' bas lhan cig tu nye bar mchis te sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid do/ /gzhan yang / sngags 'dzin pa de tshe ring zhing lo tshad
124b5(rgyud): ma mchis pa snyed du gnas par 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang rtag tu 'bral zhing rtag par gnod pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang / gter
124b6(rgyud): rnams thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa dang / dbang phyug dang / smon pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te blon thabs 'tshal na'ang yid
124b7(rgyud): bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ gcan gzan thams cad kyi skad kyang 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te sngags 'don pa'i tshe bdag gis
125a1(rgyud): @#/ /lus mngon sum du mthong par 'tshal bar 'tshal na/ tshes brgyad dam/ bco lnga'i gdugs la ras dkar po la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
125a2(rgyud): shig sbyin dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /sku gzugs 'dri ba'i ri mo mkhan po yang bslab pa'i gnas brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o//
125a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i g.yon phyogs su dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs su bri bar bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang / bu dang / bu
125a4(rgyud): mo dang / 'khor rnams kyi gzugs bris nas mchis pa'i stan legs par bshams te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas spos mchog dam pa bsregs te gdugs
125a5(rgyud): mtshan rgyun chad pa ma mchis par mar me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyis gus pa'i sems bskyed de dus su mchod
125a6(rgyud): pa bgyis nas sngags gdon par bgyi'o/ /brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /bdag g.yar 'dren pa'i tshe sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/ /na maHshrI kaN+ThA
125a7(rgyud): ya| bud d+hA yA/ na mo bai shra ma NA ya/ ya k+Sha rA dzA ya/ mahA rA dzA+e ya/ a d+hi rA dzA ya/ na maHshrI mahA de bi ye/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+d+ho su
125b1(rgyud): shud+d+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma Ni ka na ka /badzra bai DUR+ya/ muk+ti kA laM kr-i ta/ sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA nAM hi ta kA ma/ bai shra ma Na/ shI ya de bI pra b+hA ya/ e h+ye hi/ mA pi lam+ba/ g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/
125b2(rgyud): par s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma ma a mo ka nA ma s+ya/ dar sha na kA ma s+ya daR+sha naM/ ma ma ma na/ pra la hadA ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi sngags 'don pa'i mi de dang /
125b3(rgyud): gzhan yang de lta bu'i mchod pa rgyas par bgyis pa mthong bar gyur na byams shing sdug pa dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas bdag byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs
125b4(rgyud): sam/ rgan po'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su lus bsgyur nas sug pa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang / gser gyi snod thogs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas lus
125b5(rgyud): kyis gus pa bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod de sngags 'don pa de la khyod kyis bsams pa bzhin du smon pa rnams 'grub par bya'o zhes mchi bar 'gyur
125b6(rgyud): lags so/ /nags tshal gyi nang du ma snang bar 'tshal lam/ rin po che mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug cing bkur bar 'tshal lam/
125b7(rgyud): gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i nor rnams yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lam/ sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'tshal lam/ mngon par shes pa dang / tshe shin
126a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu ring ba dang / longs spyod mchog dam pa yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal na'ang bsam pa bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis par
126a2(rgyud): 'gyur lags so/ /deng bdag gis re zhig dngos po 'di tsam zhig bstan pa lags te/ gal te'ang gzhan dag yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na'ang thams cad ji
126a3(rgyud): ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par 'grub cing rin po che'i gter bas pa ma mchis pa dang / yon tan mthar thug pa ma mchis pa yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
126a4(rgyud): ba lags so/ /gal te nyi ma dang / zla ba dog sa la lhung bar 'gyur yang srid/ sa chen po res 'ga' gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig
126a5(rgyud): 'di ni nam yang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas rtag par yid bzhin gyi bden pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gis mdo
126a6(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa des sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/ ngal ba ma mchis par cho ga rnams myur du
126a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng bdag gis dbul phongs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du
126b1(rgyud): sngags 'di bstan pa phan yon chen po thob nas thams cad phyug cing skyid pa dang / rang dbang dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bdag gis
126b2(rgyud): nam 'tsho'i bar du gang zag de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrungs te gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar bgyid do/ /gzhan yang / gser 'od dam pa mchog
126b3(rgyud): tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yongs su bzung nas spel bar bgyid pa dang / sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la gom pa brgya tshun chad du 'od kyis kun tu
126b4(rgyud): gsal bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag gis gnod sbyin brgya stong ji snyed mchis pa yang rtag par rim gro bgyid cing ji ltar mos pa bzhin du g.yog bgyid pas
126b5(rgyud): yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /bdag gis bden tshig smra ba la mi med pa ma mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig dbang du gyur
126b6(rgyud): cing mkhyen par gyur pa lags so/ /de'i che lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis sngags 'di smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis
126b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis dbul phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba dral nas bde ba thob par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du rgya cher spel ba'i phyir rig sngags
127a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di bshad pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas
127a2(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa gya
127a3(rgyud): nom pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan la mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan zhal ni zla gtsang nya 'dra zhing / /nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bkye dang / /
127a4(rgyud): spyan ni dag yangs pad+ma sngon po 'dra/ /tshems dkar gtams pa dper na dung dang mtshungs/ /bcom ldan yon tan mtha' med rgya mtsho 'dra/ /rin chen gya nom
127a5(rgyud): tshad med bden pa bsags/ /mkhyen pa'i yon tan chab kyis rtag rgyas shing / /ting 'dzin dam pa brgya stong rab tu gang / /zhabs mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan
127a6(rgyud): ni thams cad mdzes/ /lte ba mu khyud rtsibs stong kun rab mnyam/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi dra ba kun brgyan pas/ /ngang pa'i rgyal bzhin mtshan ni phun sum //
127a7(rgyud): bcom ldan sku 'od gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /rnam dag khyad 'phags dpe zla yod ma mchis/ /ri rab bzhin du yon tan kun rgyas pas/ /bcom ldan ri rgyal
127b1(rgyud): khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad mkha' bzhin dpag mi rig /zla ba stong pas lhag par 'od zer bkye/ /smig sgyu rgyu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /thugs
127b2(rgyud): zhen mi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs
127b3(rgyud): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde mchog 'di ni/ /bla med stobs bcu dag gis rab tu gsungs/ /khyed cag rgyal po bzhi yis rab bsrungs la/ /
127b4(rgyud): rab dpa' nur med pa yi sems skyed cig /mdo sde rin chen gya nom zab mo 'di/ /sems can thams cad bde ba sbyin par byed/ /sems can de dag bde bar gyur pa'i
127b5(rgyud): phyir/ /rtag tu 'dzam gling rab tu spel bar 'gyur/ /stong chen 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu/ /sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa/ /yi dwags dud 'gro sems
127b6(rgyud): can dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed/ /'dzam gling 'di gnas pa yi rgyal po dang / /gzhan yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun/ /mdo sde'i
127b7(rgyud): mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing / /nad mang sdug bsngal bsal bas chom kun med/ /yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel ba'i phyir/ /rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa
128a1(rgyud): @#/ /med/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas/ /cho rigs btsun zhing nor ni gnyer ba dang / /yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na/ /sems
128a2(rgyud): la bsams bzhin thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni zlog byed cing / /rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa
128a3(rgyud): 'di yi mthus/ /sdug bsngal mang spong mya ngan 'jigs pa med/ /rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa/ /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar/ /mdo sde'i rgyal
128a4(rgyud): po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rgyal po dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed/ /dper na rab dang chu ni grang mo yis/ /skom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar/ /mdo sde'i
128a5(rgyud): rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/ /bsod nams mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed/ /mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb mdog na/ /longs spyod sems la bsams
128a6(rgyud): bzhin 'byor pa ltar/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/ /bsod nams bsam bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med/ /lha yi bdag po khyod dang lha tshogs kyis/ /mdo
128a7(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po 'di la mchod par gyis/ /gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na/ /shes rab gzi byin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs
128b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni srung dgongs pa/ /klog 'don 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na/ /legs so ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur/ /gang
128b2(rgyud): zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /lus dang sems ni dga' rangs mgu ba skye/ /rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis/ /gang du gnas pa der ni de srung byed/ /'jig
128b3(rgyud): rten khams 'di'i lha ni mang po rnams/ /de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab/ /thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan pas/ /rab dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang
128b4(rgyud): med| / gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na/ /mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan/ /mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas/ /gnod pa rab spong snang pa
128b5(rgyud): 'phel bar byed/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
128b6(rgyud): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma
128b7(rgyud): blags te dus nas lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas lha yi me tog man dA ra ba
129a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / man dA ra ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan
129a2(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas rtag par
129a3(rgyud): gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pas ye shes kyi snang bas yongs su skyob par bgyid do/ /
129a4(rgyud): gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang / don bskyud pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag gis de dag rjes su dran zhing mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad
129a5(rgyud): par du 'phags pa stsal nas yongs su rtogs par bgyid do/ /gzhan yang / mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya
129a6(rgyud): cher spel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med pa snyed
129a7(rgyud): s hes rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongs su bsdus te mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par
129b1(rgyud): gyur pas bstan bcos sna tshogs la rab tu mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas phyir mi ldog par gyur pas myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to//
129b2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
129b3(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos
129b4(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos/ 'das pa'i byang chub
129b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
129b6(rgyud): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang / don gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs
129b7(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba ni/ phyogs dang / gnas ma lags pa/ phyogs dang / gnas ma lags pa'ang ma lags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
130a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches
130a2(rgyud): nas theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /khyed kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang / gnas yod pa'ang ma yin
130a3(rgyud): phyogs dang / gnas med pa'ang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma
130a4(rgyud): yin/ dngos po'ang ma yin/ dngos po ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ rkyen yang ma yin/ rkyen ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ 'du byed kyang ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa'ang
130a5(rgyud): ma yin/ chos skye bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ chos 'gag par 'gyur ba'ang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir de skad du bstan
130a6(rgyud): pa yin te gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam gyi tshul dang / mthu stobs rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon
130a7(rgyud): tan dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams
130b1(rgyud): kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa

130b3(rgyud): lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur
130b4(rgyud): zhing yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas gnas ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin gyi spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos

131a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / bla mar byed cing yo byad sbyin par byed na de ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang
131a2(rgyud): zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / mngon par yid ches par bgyid pa de la 'di

131a7(rgyud): gnas nas yang dag par 'dzin par byed na/ gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi
131b1(rgyud): bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing / ral gri dang / dbyug pa dang / dug dang / chu dang / me dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis
131b2(rgyud): de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
131b3(rgyud): kyi yum dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen
131b4(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bas/

131b6(rgyud): byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ches rab tu mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
131b7(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas
132a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par mos par gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam
132a2(rgyud): par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
132a3(rgyud): mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod
132a4(rgyud): pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 'brug dang / glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
132a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la brtse
132a6(rgyud): ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor mang po dang / tshe dang
132a7(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas rig sngags
132b1(rgyud): mnyan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag legs par nyon cig /'di nas shar phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta zhes bya ba dang /
132b2(rgyud): lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu te kwang zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i

132b4(rgyud): gyur na/ gang zag de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing glo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gang du gnas
132b5(rgyud): pa'i gnas der phyogs bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par gyur na gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang / glog gis 'jigs pa med cing
132b6(rgyud): gdon bgegs dang / gnod pa'i sgrib med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
132b7(rgyud): gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi ni min+d+ha ri in dre s+t+rai lo ka/ lo ka ni/ shi ri sho la ba hi/ ha rak+Sha ha rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas
133a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba dang / 'brug dang / glog dang / thog 'bang ba dang / glo bur 'chi bar
133a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i
133a3(rgyud): n ang du 'dug pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
133a4(rgyud): to| / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang deng lha dang / mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas
133a5(rgyud): bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang ldan zhing smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
133a6(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka
133a7(rgyud): Te| pra t+yar+thi ke / pra ti mai tri/ shud d+he muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA swa re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri kaN+Da ri/ ka pi ri/ ping+ga la ak+Shi da d+hi mu khi rak+Sha
133b1(rgyud): rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba nas glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad bral bar gyur
133b2(rgyud): cig / bdag gis sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong zhing rtag par byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs
133b3(rgyud): rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyis dgongs shing yongs su bsrung bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las
133b4(rgyud): langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang deng lha dang / mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba
133b5(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad
133b6(rgyud): du mi pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o/ /de na gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni na d+ha ri/ mu ni ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ mahA ma ti/
133b7(rgyud): hA hA hA hA ma b+ha ya n+tI ti pA pa/ badzra pA Ni A ha drA bi Ta swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gzungs sngags 'di ni mi pham par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/ skyes pa'am/
134a1(rgyud): @#/ /bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par gzung ste yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mi bskyud cing rjes su dran
134a2(rgyud): p ar bgyid na bdag gdugs mtshan du de la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring
134a3(rgyud): du spong bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom
134a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la'ang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs lha dang / mi rnams la rgya cher phan
134a5(rgyud): 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la rab tu 'tshe ba thams cad yongs su srung bar bgyid pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par
134a6(rgyud): bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swAhA/ brah+ma pU re swAhA/ prah+ma swA re swAhA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swAhA/
134a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gzungs sngags 'di ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongs su srung bar bgyid pas
134b1(rgyud): mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang / sdig pa'i las rnams thag ring du spong zhing / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid do/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang
134b2(rgyud): po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la'ang badzra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs
134b3(rgyud): rig sngags chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel ba/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal
134b4(rgyud): las drangs nas bde ba stsol ba/ lha dang / mi rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te gzungs de bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni ba rA Ni/ ban+d+ha mA dan+ti ma ti ti ti ti/
134b5(rgyud): gau rI gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+DA li/ mA tang+gi/ puk+ka si/ pa ra Na le/ hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni/ ma la ni/ da la mad de/ tsa drA bA kri/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swAhA/ de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam
134b6(rgyud): thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang ci gcar stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar
134b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la'ang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa spyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs
135a1(rgyud): @#/ /sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongs su bskyabs nas bde ba thob par bgyid pa/ tshe 'phel par bgyid cing nad kyi
135a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te gzungs sngags de brjod par bya'o/ /
135a3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe/ su puSh+pe/ d+hu ma pa ri hA re/ AR+ya pra sha ste shAn+ti/ nir muk+te/ maM ga l+ya/ hi raN+ya gar+b+he stu te/ sta bi te swAhA/ de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang
135a4(rgyud): po| 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po nA ga si dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la
135a5(rgyud): sogs pa stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la'ang yid bzhin
135a6(rgyud): gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs glog ma rungs pa 'gog par bgyid pa/ 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang / mi rnams la rgya cher
135a7(rgyud): phan 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba/ thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa/ glo bur du
135b1(rgyud): 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ byad stems dang / sngags dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad
135b2(rgyud): yongs su sel bar bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das la 'bul na thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i
135b3(rgyud): 'gro ba 'di dang bral nas ser sna'i 'dod pa gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i 'dod pa 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug
135b4(rgyud): bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yongs su gcod par 'tshal lags so/ /de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/
135b5(rgyud): a tsa le/ a ma ri/ a mr-i te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye/ puN+yai baR+ya pa te/ sarba pA paM pra sha mA ni ye swAhA/ AR+ya puN+ya so bA ki ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/
135b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di g.yar kha nas brjod par bgyid dam/ yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid
135b7(rgyud): dam/ klog cing 'don par bgyid dam/ gus par mchod par bgyid na/ 'brug dang / glog dang / thog mi 'bab cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal
136a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang / nad dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/ dug dang /

136a3(rgyud): pas kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
136a4(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems la bsams pa'i dngos po rnams
136a5(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do/ /sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs te/ khyed cag the tshom ma za zhig /de nas 'khor

136a7(rgyud): gzung bar gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal pa mdo sde'i rgyal po las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi
136b1(rgyud): pa'o/ / //de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo 'khor mang po nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom
136b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i
136b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do//
136b4(rgyud): gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / tshig gi don bskyud pa zhig mchis na'ang / thams cad dran bzhin legs par khong
136b5(rgyud): du chud par bgyis nas gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal par bgyid do/ /gzhan yang / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i
136b6(rgyud): r gyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher
136b7(rgyud): spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang / bsam pa
137a1(rgyud): @#/ /ma mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas bstan bcos sna tshogs dang / sgyu rtsal rnams la rab tu mkhas pa
137a2(rgyud): dang / 'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do/ /tshe 'di nyid la'ang
137a3(rgyud): tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang /
137a4(rgyud): sems can gzhan yang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman la sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad par 'tshal te/ des de
137a5(rgyud): dag la gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa ci mchis pa dang / dang po btsas pa'i skar ma dang phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /

137a7(rgyud): dang / ro langs dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang / bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi bar bgyid
137b1(rgyud): pas blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyis te des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan ba sum cu rtsa gnyis po/ 'di lta ste/ shu dag gi wa nga dang ni spri ka spos/ /
137b2(rgyud): gla rtsib bla dag dang shi ri sha| |in+d+ra hasta sha ma ka sha mi/ /thang chu dang ni shing tsha gla sgang dang / /a ga ru dang tsan+dan ta ka ra/ /sa la ki dang gur gum ha la sa/ /na tra smig
137b3(rgyud): bcud su ki ma le dang / /thang shing pa tra dang ni on sha la/ /sa la ke dang spra ba gu gul dang / /yungs kar go snyod nA ga ge sa ra/ /sardza ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyi/ /skar ma
137b4(rgyud): rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni/ /spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te/ /sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ su te/
137b5(rgyud): kr-i te/ ka ma ta le/ na le dza na kar te/ had+ka ra te/ in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ra dri/ ba sha de dre/ a brta ka /si ke na ku tra ku ka /kha ke ba bI byo/ bi la ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ shI la

137b7(rgyud): tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/ /don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi/ /ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni/ /steng du me tog kun tu dgram par
138a1(rgyud): @#/ /bgyid/ /gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag /ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang /
138a2(rgyud): skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin bsrung du stsal/ /gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus ni rab brgyan nas/ /so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs/ /der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs
138a3(rgyud): nas ni/ /dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang / /ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldis mdzes par bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor

138a5(rgyud): steng du bzhag / snga ma'i phye ma chab dang sbyar nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhag par bgyi/ /de ltar bkram zhing rnam par bzhag nas ni/ /de nas sngags
138a6(rgyud): bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi/ /mtshams bcad pa yi sngags ni 'di lta ste/ /sAd+ya the dan/ a ka ra ke na ya ni/ hi li mi li gi le/ khi khi le swAhA/
138a7(rgyud): de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad nas/ /dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig chab bsngags te/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi/ /de nas
138b1(rgyud): spos chab dag la ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste/ /ngos bzhir yol bas bskor nas ni/ /dre 'og lus ni bkru bar bgyi/ /chab dang / spos chab la gdab pa'i
138b2(rgyud): sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa ga De bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA/ khrus bgyis lags nas khrus bgyis ba'i chab dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod par
138b3(rgyud): bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba ci mchis pa gtsang po'am/ rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas
138b4(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te/ sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi dam rgya chen po slad du stsal nas
138b5(rgyud): sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang / rkyen des na yid

138b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal nyen/ /sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa/ /khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te/ gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas/ /gdugs mtshan
139a1(rgyud): @#/ /rtag par sems ni mi g.yeng bar/ /rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas/ /nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par zhi bar 'gyur/ /
139a2(rgyud): dbul phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha/ /mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /bkra shis rab bde bsod nams
139a3(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad sel ba bgyi/ /de'i 'og tu lus bsrung ba'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o/ /sngags

139a6(rgyud): pa dA swAhA/ d+ha ra to/ bi tsi te/ prah+mA nu ma n+ya tu swAhA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad nas bcom ldan
139a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
139b1(rgyud): bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel ba dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin

140b1(rgyud): 'dus lhags nas/ /thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags/ /shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod/ /tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin bar gyis/ /

140b7(rgyud): ba ya me/ mahA de be/ pud d+ha sa t+ya na/ d+harma sa t+ya na/ sang+g+ha sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo ke sa t+ya sa t+ye na/ te sha ma sa t+ye na/ sat+ti bad tsa ni ni/ a ba ha ya mi/
141a1(rgyud): @#/ /mahA da be/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bi tsid to/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ mahA dwe ba sa ra swa t+ya/ sid d+h+yan+tu/ man+ta pa
141a2(rgyud): dA ni swAhA/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas bram ze de la 'di skad ces/ kye| skyes bu chen po/ sems can rnams kyi ched du
141a3(rgyud): spobs pa gya nom pa dang / rin po che dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / shes rab yongs su gnyer nas thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te myur du byang chub mngon du byed
141a4(rgyud): par 'dod pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de ltar shes par byas nas cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thog mar kho nar

141a6(rgyud): 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag byas/ /de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin lha dbang dang / /'jig rten
141a7(rgyud): skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gus par phyag byas nas/ /dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag
141b1(rgyud): tu| |skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga gdon/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu/ /ji tsam 'byor pas mchod ba bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnam pa de dag
141b2(rgyud): thams cad la/ /byams dang snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed/ /bcom ldan gser sku shin tu gya nom mtshan/ /g.yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya/ /
141b3(rgyud): bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas/ /dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god/ /de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la/ /stong pa nyid brten rab
141b4(rgyud): tu bsgom par gyis/ /bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni/ /rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na/ /gya nom ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag dang / /gzungs
141b5(rgyud): mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas/ /gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad/ /ljags mtshan
141b6(rgyud): rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas/ /yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba/ /rtse gcig dran na sems
141b7(rgyud): la 'jigs med 'thob/ /bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang / /rtags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas/ /chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsung
142a1(rgyud): @#/ /mdzad pas/ /dper na nam mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra/ /bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams/ /dran pa nyer bzhag

149b5(rgyud): cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te brel zhing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do/ /gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi don ji snyed pa dag la so
149b6(rgyud): sor brtags te/ yid la bsams shing yongs su btsal nas bde bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher spel ba'i slad du sems can gang la la
149b7(rgyud): dag sangs rgyas brgya stong tshad ma mchis ba snyed pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rtag tu thos par 'gyur zhing myur du nub bar mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ @#/
150a1(rgyud): /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis ba snyed du lha dang / mi'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur lags so/ /rtag
150a2(rgyud): par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa gtan du sel bar 'gyur bas skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

150a4(rgyud): gtan du gcod par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mngon par dran lags te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
150a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan
150a6(rgyud): pa zhig byung ste/ bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun te de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang / thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus brtse bar dgongs
150a7(rgyud): par gyur pa'i slad du deng bdag gang du bsams pa'i gnas de dang / gang du bltas pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang / de dag tu sems

150b2(rgyud): dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byu ru dang / 'gron bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs

150b6(rgyud): dus gsum du bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par bgyis nas logs shig tu spos dang / me tog dang / zas mchog rnams kyis bdag la mchod
150b7(rgyud): cing rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid na bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di
151a1(rgyud): @#/ /ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad/ /bdag dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun dang 'bral/ /gos zas ci 'tshal phongs pa ma mchis
151a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'/ /sa yi ro yang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams dus bzhin char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /lha 'khor de dag
151a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis/ /nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing / /'bru rnams thams cad yongs su

151b1(rgyud): gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang phyogs na lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ grong
151b2(rgyud): k hyer de las mi ring ba na me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga' ra ba mchis pa de na gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin po che sna bdun
151b3(rgyud): las mngon par grub pa zhig mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du
151b4(rgyud): 'phel ba dang / bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing 'tshal bas gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de khang pa gcig gtsang mar byas nas ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal
151b5(rgyud): zhal bgyis te/ bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas lus legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas byug pa dam
151b6(rgyud): pas byugs te khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs nas/ bdag gi ched du gdugs re zhing dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang / mdo sde 'di'i mtshan nas brjod

152a2(rgyud): dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dag thogs te phyogs
152a3(rgyud): gzhan du gtor nas 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o/ /yang dag pa'i bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas ci dang /

152a6(rgyud): bar bgyid do/ /de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar bgyis te/ sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de sems
152a7(rgyud): rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud can la phyag

153b7(rgyud): de slan chad mi des g.yar lam na bdag mthong bar 'gyur bas ci dang / ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do/ /grong ngam/

157a3(rgyud): mam/ sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcig tsam mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam mam/ tshig

157a7(rgyud): ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che dang / nor mang bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum
157b1(rgyud): la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
157b2(rgyud): can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na'ang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og
157b3(rgyud): tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir khang khyim
157b4(rgyud): dag rab tu brgyan nas bla re gcig bre bar byed dam/ pa dan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na rgyu de dang / rkyen des lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin
157b5(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur bas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/ so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang
157b6(rgyud): phan tshun lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
157b7(rgyud): pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu dang / rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la
158a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongs su srung zhing skyob par
158a2(rgyud): bgyid na/ rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas chos kyi stan gyi drung du mchis te de'i rkang pa la 'degs par bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde
158a3(rgyud): ' di lta bu 'di ni sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur
158a4(rgyud): ba lags so/ /sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag ni slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed
158a5(rgyud): kyi bar du lha dang / mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
158a6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom
158a7(rgyud): 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang / mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams
158b1(rgyud): cad la bde par bgyid pa mchis te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gis lus yang dag par mngon sum du mthong
158b2(rgyud): bar 'tshal ba des sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do/ /'di lta ste/ nor
158b3(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i gter dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra
158b4(rgyud): pha ma par bgyi ba dang / tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /lus bkrus te gos sar pa gtsang
158b5(rgyud): ma bgos nas rtswa bting ba'i steng du mchis te ring bsrel dang / sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa
158b6(rgyud): bsregs te me tog gtor nas bza' ba dang / btung ba dag gis mchod pa bgyis te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na g.yar 'dren pa'i
158b7(rgyud): sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to Tu to Tu/ ba ha ba ha/ ba ri sha ba ri sha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs sngags

159a6(rgyud): 'di 'don par 'tshal na sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ pA sha ka ti/ ta ti ku kuT+Ti pU ta/ pU de ri/ pU de ri/ Ti Te pa Ti/ ku ku Ti/

159b1(rgyud): na slan chad lus bsrung bar bgyis pas 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par byed na bsams pa rnams
159b2(rgyud): yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ bdag sho be mi mchi ste bdag gi dpang du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum bzhugs pas
159b3(rgyud): med pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags
159b4(rgyud): kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba dag la yongs su bsrung bar byas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rgyu dang / rkyen 'dis khyed bsod nams kyi rnam
159b5(rgyud): par smin pa tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco

159b7(rgyud): mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su/
160a1(rgyud): @#/ /thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par

160a3(rgyud): tshal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ /dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu'ang rung ste yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/
160a4(rgyud): bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas so so nas rang gi lus mi gda'
160a5(rgyud): bar bgyis te ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spangs te rtag par bde
160a6(rgyud): ma myong bar bgyid do/ /skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam
160a7(rgyud): yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid
160b1(rgyud): dam/ mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed
160b2(rgyud): nas gus par rim gro dang / mchod par bgyid na bdag gis yongs su bsrung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis ste sdug bsngal
160b3(rgyud): spangs nas bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag gi ming yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan
160b4(rgyud): 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te bdag gis chos rnams rig pa dang / bdag gis chos thams cad kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ji

160b6(rgyud): rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par
160b7(rgyud): dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes spyod yul
161a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par

161a3(rgyud): d e'i slad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi
161a4(rgyud): spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang / mdangs ba spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /
161a5(rgyud): gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par dran pa thob nas
161a6(rgyud): spa gong ba ma mchis pa dang / de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par
161a7(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /rgyu dang / rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas bsod nams kyi las mngon par
161b1(rgyud): s grub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas sems can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam
161b2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing slad ma'i dus kyi tshe'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag
161b3(rgyud): khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa
161b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi
161b5(rgyud): bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
161b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la gzungs mchis te sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis
161b7(rgyud): bshad par bgyi'o/ /de nas sngags smras pa/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo brah+mA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ya/ na ma sh+tsa turmahA rA dzA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ hi li
162a1(rgyud): @#/ /hi li/ mi li mi li/ gau ri mahA gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ mahA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi Di/ mahA dri mi Di/ daN+Da khu khun+ti/ ha ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi hi/ ho ho ho ho ho/

162b2(rgyud): chab kyis bkang ste bzhag nas byug spos dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / dkyil 'khor

162b6(rgyud): su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /gal te gser dang / dngul dang / gter 'tshal bar gyur tam/ yang na lha'i drang
162b7(rgyud): srong du gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/ lha'i mig gis mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad

163b1(rgyud): nyid kyang yun ring du khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs la gnas par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa dang / thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs
163b2(rgyud): te bdag la rgyal bas chos yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa'i don gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ de nas mi'i rgyal po rnams
163b3(rgyud): chos 'di thos pa'i dbang gis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang / khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs
163b4(rgyud): gtan du bde zhing zhi ba dang / yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la'ang sman par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du

163b6(rgyud): bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon par de nas rgyal po yab kyis mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras
163b7(rgyud): so| |rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lha'i bdag po'i man ngag ces bya ba yod de/ nga sngon spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas yul gyi bdag po byas
164a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i tshe nga'i yab shes pa'i stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas nga la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas
164a2(rgyud): n gas bstan bcos 'di la brten nas lo nyi khri'i bar du yul legs par bskyangs te ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du'ang chos ma yin pa spyad par bya'o
164a3(rgyud): snyam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo / /deng khyod kyang de bzhin du chos ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig /ci'i phyir rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i
164a4(rgyud): bstan bcos zhes bya zhe na/ khyod deng legs par nyon cig dang khyod la deng legs par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog gis
164a5(rgyud): rgyal bu de la tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis yang dag pa'i bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa/ ngas ni sems can bde bya dang / /'jig rten the tshom
164a6(rgyud): bcad pa dang / /nyes dmigs mang po bsal ba'i phyir/ /rgyal khrims bstan bcos bshad par bya/ /lha yi bdag po thams cad dang / /mi yi rgyal po gang
164a7(rgyud): yin pa/ /dga' ba'i sems ni rab bskyed la/ /thal mo sbyar nas ngas bshad nyon/ /sngon byung lha 'khor mang po rnams/ /rdo rje'i ri la 'dus pa na/ /rgyal bzhi
164b1(rgyud): stan las langs nas ni/ /tshangs chen la ni 'di skad zhus/ /tshangs bdag mchog tu gtsor gyur cing / /lha yi nang na dbang phyug che/ /bdag cag la ni brtser
164b2(rgyud): dgongs nas/ /the tshom rnams ni gcad du gsol/ /ji ltar mi yi 'jig rten skyes/ /rgyal po zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rgyu rkyen gang gi slad/ /lha
164b3(rgyud): yi bu zhes bgyi bar gyur/ /ji ltar mir ni skyes pa la/ /gcig pu mi yi bdag po 'thob/ /ji ltar mtho ris gnas dag tu/ /lha yi rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur//
164b4(rgyud): de ltar 'jig rten skyong dag gis/ /tshangs rgyal de la zhus pa dang / /de tshe tshangs pa'i bdag po yis/ /de dag la ni 'di skad smras/ /'jig rten skyong khyod shes
164b5(rgyud): par byos/ /sems can la ni phan bya'i phyir/ /nga la yul skyong chos dris bas/ /ngas bshad khyod kyis legs par nyon/ /sngon gyi las kyi mthu yis ni/ /lhar
164b6(rgyud): skyes rgyal por gyur pa yin/ /gal te mi nang gnas gyur nas/ /dbang sdud mi yi bdag po byed/ /lha rnams lhan cig byin rlabs nas/ /de 'og ma yi mngal
164b7(rgyud): du 'jug / ma yi mngal na gnas pa na/ /lha rnams kyis ni srung bar byed/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes gyur kyang / /gtso mchog gyur phyir lha zhes bya/ /lha rnams
165a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyis ni bsrungs pas na/ /lha yi bu zhes brjod pa yin/ /sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po yis/ /stobs bgos mi'i rgyal gtong bar byed/ /
165a2(rgyud): lha ni mang po thams cad kyis/ /rang dbang stobs ni rab bstangs nas/ /chos min kun ni rab bsal te/ /sdig pa'i las ni skyed mi byed/ /sems can dge ba
165a3(rgyud): sgrub bskul nas/ /mtho ris gnas su skye bar byed/ /mi dang lha min 'khor dag dang / /dri za dang ni srin po dang / /gdol pa la sogs thams cad kyis/ /
165a4(rgyud): stobs kyi phyed ni gtong bar byed/ /pha mas stobs phyed bstangs nas ni/ /sdig spong dge ba sgrub la 'dzud/ /lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas/ /dge
165a5(rgyud): sdig rnam smin ston par byed/ /dge sdig las ni byas gyur na/ /de ltar tshe 'di nyid la ni/ /lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas/ /dge sdig rnam smin ston par
165a6(rgyud): byed/ /yul mis sdig pa'i las byas la/ /rgyal spangs nan tur mi byed na/ /'di ni yang dag rigs pa min/ /chos bzhin chad pas gcad par bya/ /gal te
165a7(rgyud): nyes mthong mi 'gog na/ /chos min rab tu 'phel 'gyur bas/ /rgyal po de yi yul khams su/ /g.yo sgyu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos nyes byed
165b1(rgyud): mthong gyur la/ /gal te zlog par mi byed na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha 'khor rnams/ /thams cad khong khro'i sems skye 'gyur/ /rgyu nges rgyal khrims nyams 'gyur zhing //
165b2(rgyud): g.yo sgyu 'jig rten 'phel 'gyur bas/ /pha rol dgra 'khor dag gis ni/ /yul de bcom nas 'jig par byed/ /gnas pa'i khyim dang yo byad dang / /nor bsags
165b3(rgyud): thams cad stor bar 'gyur/ /g.yo sgyu sna tshogs skyes pa na/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang 'phrog /yang dag chos kyis rgyal thob kyang / /chos bzhin du ni mi
165b4(rgyud): spyod pas/ /yul mi thams cad 'thor 'gyur te/ /glang pos pad+ma'i rdzing brdzis 'dra/ /rlung drag ldang la dus kyang med/ /mi 'phrod char ni dus min 'bab/ /rgyu skar ltas
165b5(rgyud): ngan mang po ston/ /nyi zla gcan zin 'od kyang med/ /rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs pas/ /'bru rnams me tog 'bras bu dang / /lo thog thams cad mi smin cing / /
165b6(rgyud): yul na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs nas/ /sdig chos mi ni ston byed na/ /gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyis/ /mthong nas mya ngan
165b7(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ /lha rgyal 'khor bcas de dag gis/ /'di skad du ni smra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal 'dis chos min rab spyad nas/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pas na/ /rgyal
166a1(rgyud): @#/ /srid yun ring brtan mi 'gyur/ /lha rnams thams cad rab mi dga'/ /de dag khros par gyur pa'i phyir/ /yul de 'jig par 'gyur zhes
166a2(rgyud): zer/ /chos min mi ni rab brten pas/ /'thab rtsod g.yo sgyu mang por 'gyur/ /rims nad sdug bsngal mang po skye/ /lha yi bdag po srung mi byed/ /lha gzhan
166a3(rgyud): thams cad spong bar byed/ /de yi yul ni rang zhig nas/ /rgyal po sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /pha ma chung ma bu rnams dang / phu nu dang ni sring mo rnams/ /
166a4(rgyud): cig car sdug dang bral 'gyur zhing / /tha mar bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ltas ngan skar mda' dag kyang ltung / /nyi ma gnyis ni cig car 'char/ /pha rol
166a5(rgyud): dgra ni nyer 'ongs pas/ /yul mi 'chi dang 'khrug phrad 'gyur/ /yul bkur blon po chen po rnams/ /nyes med glo bur 'chi bar 'gyur/ /glang po rta sogs
166a6(rgyud): gces pa rnams/ /thams cad 'thor zhing stongs par 'gyur/ /yul yul kun tu dgra yod pas/ /mi ni phal cher dus min 'chi/ /'dre srin ma rungs yul
166a7(rgyud): zhugs pas/ /rims nad kun tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yul gyi blon po chen po dang / /nye phan mang po thams cad kun/ /sems ni g.yo rgyu bcas pas na//
166b1(rgyud): thams cad chos min spyod par 'gyur/ /chos min spyod pa mthong gyur na/ /snying du sdug cing bkur bar byed/ /dge chos spyod pa'i mi dag la/ /sdug bsngal nyon mongs
166b2(rgyud): chad pas gcod/ /ma rungs byams shing bkur ba dang / /dge ba chad pas bcad pa'i phyir/ /gza' skar rlung dang char pa rnams/ /thams cad dus su rgyu mi 'gyur/ /

166b4(rgyud): brnyas pas na/ /gzhan yang nyes dmigs rnam gsum 'byung / /dus min sad dang ser ba 'bab/ /mu ge'i sdug bsngal kun tu khyab/ /lo thog 'bras bu mang po
166b5(rgyud): rnams/ /thams cad ro zhim nyams par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni yul khams na/ /sems can phal cher na bar 'gyur/ /de yi yul na ljon shing rnams/ /sngon chad
166b6(rgyud): 'bras bu zhim chags pa/ /de yi dbang gis nyams 'gyur bas/ /kha rtsub ro mchog med par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi kun dga' nags tshal mchog /snying du sdug

167a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /kha zas mang du zos kyang ni/ /'grangs pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur/ /yul khams de na yod pa yi/ /sems can rnam pa ji snyed pa/ /stobs chung dpa' bshor med
167a3(rgyud): pas na/ /bya ba dag ni byed mi nus/ /yul mi phal cher nad thebs pas/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs lus gzir 'gyur/ /'dre srin kun tu khyab bas na/ /thams cad
167a4(rgyud): kun tu srin por skye/ /rgyal pos chos min rab spyad pas/ /mi dge'i grogs po bsten pas na/ /'jig rten rnam pa gsum po kun/ /des na gnod pa sna tshogs
167a5(rgyud): myong / /de 'dra'i nyes dmigs mtha' med pas/ /yul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang / /sdig can mi ni mthong gyur kyang / /yal bor ma bskrad pa las gyur/ /lha rnams

167b7(rgyud): sdig pa mthong na spang bar bya/ /gnod pa'i nang na mchog lci bas/ /rgyal srid gtor las lhag pa med/ /'di kun g.yo sgyu mi las byung / /des na chad pa gcad par bya/ /g.yo

172a2(rgyud): dag ye shes dam pa brnyes/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas thams cad kyis mdo sde gser 'od dam pa

172a7(rgyud): pa gang yin pa des gdon mi za bar sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ri'am/ nags tshal gang yang rung ste gnas de dang / de
172b1(rgyud): dag tu sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /chos nyan pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'du shes spangs nas rna ba blags

172b4(rgyud): phye bshad mthong gyur na/ /de yi phyogs su nyer song nas/ /de yi drung du 'gro bar bya/ /mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /yon tan mang po skyed byed cing / /sdug bsngal
172b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho mtha' med las/ /sems can rnams ni thar bar byed/ /nga yi mdo 'di rnam bltas na/ /thog ma bar dang tha mar dge /shin tu zab pas dpag par dka'/ /dpe
172b6(rgyud): dag gis ni zla byar med/ /gang+gA'i bye ma sa chen rdul/ /rgya mtsho chu dang nam mkha' dang / /ri brag thams cad gang gis kyang / /cha shas tsam yang dpe byar med/ /
172b7(rgyud): chos dbyings zab mor 'jug 'dod na/ /mdo sde sngar ni mnyan par bya/ /chos nyid mchod rten gang na bar/ /zab mo shin tu bde bar gnas/ /mchod rten 'di yi nang
173a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag tu/ /shAkya thub pa nga yis ni/ /yid 'ong sgra dbyangs dam ba yis/ /mdo sde bshad pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas grangs tshad bsam dka'
173a2(rgyud): ba'i/ /bskal pa bye ba snyed du ni/ /lha dang mi yi nang skyes nas/ /rtag tu bde pa mchog myong 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan pa yis/ /bdag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//

180a3(rgyud): d u gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di mnyan du 'ongs pa yin pas chos thos par gyur nas kyang mdo sde 'di la sems kyis gus pa bskyed de bai DUR+ya yongs su dag pa
