180a5(rgyud): gzhan yang / 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe yun ring por yang dag pa spyod pa bsgrubs nas yi dam chen po blangs pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen de'i phyir ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla
180a6(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no/ /de nas shing gi lha mo des bcom ldan 'das
180a7(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon bar yid ches par gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/
180b1(rgyud): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo/ legs par nyon la shin tu
180b2(rgyud): yid la zungs shig dang / lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyu dang / rkyen gang yin pa deng khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ sngon byung ba
180b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
180b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas| rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
180b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i
180b6(rgyud): chos nub par gyur nas gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi tshe rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis pha ma bzhin du mi rnams la rjes
180b7(rgyud): su 'dzin par byed do/ /rgyal po de'i yul na tshong dpon chu 'dzin ces bya ba sman gyi rigs la shin tu mkhas pa shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud pa sems
181a1(rgyud): @#/ /can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi mthun pa las gyur pa thams cad yongs su skyob cing gso bar byed pa zhig yod do/ rigs kyi lha
181a2(rgyud): mo/ de'i tshe tshong dpon chu 'dzin de la bu chu 'bebs shes bya ba byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/ mang po kun gyis mos par blta bar mos pa/ rang bzhin gyi sems myur
181a3(rgyud): ba| gtsug lag rnams legs par rtogs pa/ yi ge dang / ri mo dang / rtsis dang / grangs rnams mngon par mi rtogs pa gang yang med pa zhig yod par gyur to/ /de'i
181a4(rgyud): t she rgyal po de'i yul khams na sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir bar gyur pas tha na dga' ba'i sems cung zad
181a5(rgyud): tsam yang med par gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs sems can brgya stong tshad med pa de dag nad kyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa mthong ba dang / snying rje
181a6(rgyud): c hen po'i sems bskyed nas 'di snyam du sems can tshad med pa 'di snyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nyon mongs par gyur te bdag gi pha tshong dpon sman dpyad la shin tu
181a7(rgyud): mkhas shing shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud de/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa las byung ba'i nad sna tshogs gso bar nus kyang / rgas 'khogs
181b1(rgyud): pas lus kyi nyam chung zhing rmya ba dang / 'khar ba la brten nas gdod 'gro bas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams su song nas nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams yongs su
181b2(rgyud): skyob par byed mi nus la/ deng sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed ni nad tshabs chen pos thebs pas yongs su skyob par nus pa med na deng bdag pa sman pa chen po'i
181b3(rgyud): drung du song la nad gso ba'i sman dpyad gsang ba dris te gal te shes par gyur na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu song la sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna
181b4(rgyud): tshogs gsos te yun ring por bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bus de snyam du bsam nas pha'i thad du song ste rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs nas
181b5(rgyud): phyag byas te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa dag gis pha la 'di skad ces dris so/ /bdag ni sems can bskyab pa'i slad/ /sman
181b6(rgyud): dpyad rnams ni zhu lags na/ /byams pa'i yab kyis brtser dgongs te/ /bdag la bkas ni bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar lus ni 'jig pa na/ /'byung chen rnams ni 'phel 'grib
181b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dus ni gang gi tshe/ /nad mang rnams ni skye 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar zas skom 'tshal 'gyur na/ /bde ba dag ni mang 'gyur zhing / /lus kyi nang na me yi mthu/ /
182a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyams shing gnod par mi 'gyur lags/ /sems can nad ni bzhi mchis te/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / /kun 'dus pa yi nad lags na/ /de
182a2(rgyud): dag ji ltar gso bar bgyi/ /gang gi tshe ni rlung nad ldang / /gang gi tshe ni mkhris nad slong / /gang gi tshe ni bad kan g.yo/ /gang gi tshe ni kun 'dus skye/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bus
182a3(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang / tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ngas de drang srong snying po yi/ /nad gso dpyad la brten nas ni/ /rim bzhin khyod la rab bstan gyi/ /
182a4(rgyud): legs par nyon la sems can skyobs/ /zla ba gsum ni dpyid kyi dus/ /zla ba gsum ni dbyar zhes bya/ /zla ba gsum ni ston gyi phyogs/ /zla ba gsum ni dgun zhes bya//

182a6(rgyud): ni me tog dus/ /gsum dang bzhi ni tsha ba'i dus/ /lnga dang drug pa char pa'i dus/ /bdun dang brgyad pa ston gyi dus/ /dgu dang bcu pa grang ba'i dus/ /phyi ma gnyis ni kha ba'i dus//
182a7(rgyud): de ltar bye brag shes gyur na/ /'gal ba med par sman gtang bya/ /dus ni 'di dag rjes mthun par/ /zas skom legs par sbyor byed na/ /ltor ni myur du 'ju 'gyur bas/ /nad mang
182b1(rgyud): dag ni skye mi 'gyur/ /dus tshigs gal te log 'gyur zhing / /'byung chen bzhi ni 'phos gyur la/ /de tshe gsos sman med gyur na/ /nges par nad kyi sdug bsngal skye/ /sman pas dus

182b4(rgyud): nad yin te/ /g.yo ba'i dus ni shes par bya/ /dpyid ka'i dus ni bad kan g.yo/ /dbyar ni rlung nad skye bar 'gyur/ /ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rgyas/ /dgun ni gsum po

184b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sngon gyi rgyal

186a1(rgyud): @#/ /der khyod kyis ming ji lta ba bzhin du byos shig /de nas chu 'bebs kyis shing gi lha mo la smras pa/ nya 'di dag gi grangs ji tsam zhig yod/ shing
186a2(rgyud): gi lha mos smras pa/ grangs ni stong phrag bcu tshang ba snyed yod do/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bus grangs de snyed yod par thos pa dang / lhag par snying rje'i

186a4(rgyud): sgor zhugs te lus kyis 'gre ldog byas pa na tshong dpon de mthong ba dang / sems la re ba dang bcas mig mi 'dzums par rjes su 'brang zhing blta bar gyur to/ /

186b1(rgyud): y od pa'i gnas su chu bo nas 'bab tu mi ster bas chu dral ba'i gnas de yang shin tu bcos dka' bar gyur pas 'di snyam du gad pa 'di ni shin tu zab cing g.yang sa che
186b2(rgyud): bas mi brgya stong gis zla ba gsum gyi bar du'ang gcod par mi nus na/ bdag gcig pus mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu myur du
186b3(rgyud): rang gi grong khyer du song ste rgyal po chen po'i drung du phyin nas/ mgo bos rkang pa la phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad du/

186b6(rgyud): pas rings po mi thogs par 'gum par 'gyur ba dag mthong lags na/ rgyal po chen po/ byams pa dang / thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te glang po che nyi shu zhig
186b7(rgyud): chab dgal bar skad cig stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis nad pa mang po la srog stsal pa de bzhin du nya de dag gi srog gi skyabs bgyid pa lags so zhes gsol
187a1(rgyud): @#/ /to| |de nas rgyal po chen pos kyang blon po chen po la sman pa'i rgyal po 'di la glang po che byin cig ces bsgo'o/ /de'i tshe blon po chen pos kyang rgyal
187a2(rgyud): po'i bka' khyer nas tshong dpon gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu chen po/ legs so/ /khyod bdag nyid glang po che'i lhas su song ste yid la ji ltar 'dod pa
187a3(rgyud): bzhin du glang po che nyi shu zhig 'dams te khyer la sems can la phan btags nas bde ba thob par gyis shig / de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis dang lhan cig tu glang po che
187a4(rgyud): nyi shu khrid de tshong pa'i khyim nas rgyal ba mang po g.yar te/ chu dral ba'i gnas su phyin nas rkyal pa chus bkang ste glang po che la bkal nas rdzing gi drung du phyin te/
187a5(rgyud): rdzing gi nang du blugs pa dang / snga mkho bzhin du gang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus rdzing gi ngos bzhir 'khor bar bltas pa
187a6(rgyud): dang | de nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang nas 'gram du rgyu bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'di snyam du nya mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi
187a7(rgyud): bzhin 'brang / gdon mi za bar bkres pa'i mes gdungs nas bdag la zas slong ba yin pas bdag gis sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu
187b1(rgyud): chu 'bebs kyis bu la 'di skad smras so/ khyod kyis glang po che mchog tu stobs dang ldan pa zhig blangs te myur du khyim du deng la yab tshong dpon la gsol te khyim na
187b2(rgyud): bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / pha ma za ba'i skal ba dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran mo dang / bran pho'i skal ba ci yod pa thams cad kyang bsdus te khyer la
187b3(rgyud): shog cig / de nas bu gnyis pas bstan pa mnyan nas glang po che mchog la zhon te rings par khyim du song nas/ mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang / dngos po gong ma

188a6(rgyud): kyang mngon par yid ches pa'i sems 'phel bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu 'di snyam du bdag rdzing gi nang du zhugs te nya mang po de dag la chos

195a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba lags na/ rgyu dang / rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di la phyag mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
195a2(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga ni rus pa 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas sngon gyi
195a3(rgyud): drin bsab pa'i phyir deng ngas phyag byas pa yin no/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ngas deng khyod dang / 'khor mang po'i the tshom dang / som
195a4(rgyud): nyi gcod pa'i phyir ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang / rkyen gang yin pa yang dag par bshad kyi/ khyed cag legs par yid la byos la sems rtse gcig tu nyon
195a5(rgyud): cig |tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag cag shin tu thos par mos lags na rnam par phye ste bkas bshad du gsol/ kun dga' bo/ sngon byung
195a6(rgyud): ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yul cig gi rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba/ bang mdzod rgyas pa/ dmag gi dpung rab tu dpa' ba/
195a7(rgyud): mang po kun gyis bkur zhing ngag nyan pa/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba/ mi rnams ngar zhing rgyas pa/ phyir rgol ba'i dgra med pa zhig
195b1(rgyud): yod de btsun mo dam pa byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/ mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod do/ /bu chen po'i ming ni sgra chen po zhes bya'o/ /bu
195b2(rgyud): 'bring po'i ming ni lha chen po zhes bya'o/ /bu tha chung gi ming ni sems can chen po zhes bya'o/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtse zhing ltad mo blta ba'i phyir ri dang / nags
195b3(rgyud): tshal kun tu blta bar chas pa dang / bu gsum po de'ang phyi bzhin du dong ngo / /me tog dang / 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir pha spangs te kun tu 'khyam pa las 'od ma'i
195b4(rgyud): tshal chen po zhig tu phyin te ngal bsos so/ /de na rgyal bu chen pos/ 'di skad du/ deng bdag ni sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na/ nags tshal 'dir gcan
195b5(rgyud): gzan ma rungs pa dag gis bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras so/ /rgyal bu 'bring pos yang / 'di skad du/ bdag ni rang gi lus la dang po nas phangs
195b6(rgyud): pa med na snying du sdug pa 'di dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhig 'byung du dogs so zhes smras so/ /rgyal bu tha chung gis phu bo gnyis la smras pa/ 'di ni lha dang drang
195b7(rgyud): srong 'du ba'i gnas/ /bdag la 'jigs dngangs 'bral ba'i mya ngan med/ /lus sems kun khyab dga' ba skyes pa na/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan 'thob
196a1(rgyud): @#/ /par 'gyur/ /de'i che rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems la ci bsams pa'i dngos po dag smras nas mthar gyis mdun du song ba las
196a2(rgyud): stag mo zhig bu bdun btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa bu rnams kyis bskor ba/ bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir ba/ lus rid cing nyam chung ba
196a3(rgyud): ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang / rgyal bu chen bos/ 'di skad du/ kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdun lon te/ bu bdun
196a4(rgyud): gyis yongs su bskor bas zas btsal ba yang mi khom ste/ bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir bas gdon mi za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras
196a5(rgyud): so| |rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ stag 'di dag rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig za/ rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ stag dang seng+ga 'phar spyad rnams/ /sha khrag
196a6(rgyud): dron mo 'ba' zhig za/ /de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis/ /'di ni nyam chung sel mi nus/ /rgyal bu 'breng pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang 'di skad ces smras
196a7(rgyud): so| |stag mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar rnyed par
196b1(rgyud): dka' ba'i zas dang / skom btsal bar nus/ su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang / srog spangs nas bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed/
196b2(rgyud): rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ spang bar dka' ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med do/ /rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ deng bdag
196b3(rgyud): cag ni so so nas rang gi lus la sred cing mngon par zhen pa dang / shes rab med pas gzhan rnams la phan 'dogs mi nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying
196b4(rgyud): rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed do/ /
196b5(rgyud): gzhan yang / 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med par rul zhing myags te bor bas phan pa ci'ang byas pa med na/ ci'i phyir
196b6(rgyud): deng mchil snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas/ bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo/ /de'i tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag
196b7(rgyud): smras nas so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed de/ stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g.yeng bar bltas nas ring zhig tu bskor te cig char spangs nas
197a1(rgyud): @#/ /dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis lus srog btang ba'i dus ni dang yin te/ di ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag
197a2(rgyud): gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang / /mi gtsang ma nam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong / /yo byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta/ /nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang
197a3(rgyud): ni| |'gyur zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag / rtag tshol dgang dka' bsrung bar rab tu dka'/ /rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni/ /nams kyang bdag 'dor
197a4(rgyud): byas ba'i drin mi shes/ /gzhan yang / lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa/ 'jigs su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba/ mi gtsang bas lud dang
197a5(rgyud): mtshungs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings chen po byas te/ 'khor ba
197a6(rgyud): yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo/ /gzhan yang / 'di snyam du/ gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na 'di nyid 'bras dang / nad ma
197a7(rgyud): rungs pa tshad med pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no/ /lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur mi brtan
197b1(rgyud): pa| |srin bu mang po 'dus pa/ rtsa rgyus dang rus pa phan tshun 'brel pa/ shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas/ de'i phyir deng bdag gis
197b2(rgyud): lus yongs su spangs nas/ bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btsal te/ mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang / mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pha
197b3(rgyud): gtan du spangs nas 'khor ba rgyun bcad de/ nyes pa rnams spangs nas ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas bsod
197b4(rgyud): nams brgya stong mang pos brgyan pa/ thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o/ /thob par
197b5(rgyud): gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshad med pa gtang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' sran dang / smon lam chen po
197b6(rgyud): b tab nas snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems rtas shing 'phel bar gyur kyang phu bo gnyis skrag cing dngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas smon pa mi 'grub
197b7(rgyud): par dwogs pas/ phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis sngar gshegs shig /bdag re zhig slar mchi 'o zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar
198a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas stag mo'i drung du phyin te/ gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du bzhag ste smon lam 'di skad btab bo/ /bdag ni chos
198a2(rgyud): mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir/ /bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na/ /snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed g.yo ba med/ /skye bos phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar
198a3(rgyud): byed| |byang chub nad med gdung ba med pas na/ /blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos/ /khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun/ /deng bdag drangs nas
198a4(rgyud): bde la 'god par shog / de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas stag mo ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te nyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang / snying
198a5(rgyud): rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag mos ci yang byed ma nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong pa dang ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas yang 'di snyam du
198a6(rgyud): stag mo 'di ni nyam chung zhing rmya bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te/ mtshon btsal yang ma rnyed pas 'od ma skam po'i tshal bas
198a7(rgyud): lkog mar khrag phyung ste mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang / de'i tshe ji ltar rlung gis chu bo bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu
198b1(rgyud): g.yos par gyur/ nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang / spos
198b2(rgyud): mchog dam pa'i char yang mngon par phabs pas tshal gyi nang du kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos po de
198b3(rgyud): lta bu mthong ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod de thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs so/ /
198b4(rgyud): legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu chen po/ yongs su skyob pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas/ /bu gcig bzhin du sems can
198b5(rgyud): mnyam par lta/ /rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas/ /lus spang phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'/ /nges par rtag bde gya nom gnas phyin
198b6(rgyud): nas| |'khor ba'i 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong / /ring po mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas/ /nyer zhi bde ba skye med mngon rtogs 'gyur/ /de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa
198b7(rgyud): des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang / khrag bldags te sha ma lus bzos pas rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so/ /de nas rgyal
199a1(rgyud): @#/ /bu chen pos sa g.yos pa mthong ba dang / nub la smras pa/ sa chen ri klung kun kyang rab tu g.yos/ /phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od ma ldan/
199a2(rgyud): lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab pas/ /'di ni nu bos nges par lus spangs rtags/ /rgyal bu 'brir pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang / tshigs su bcad de smras
199a3(rgyud): pa| stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ba/ /bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dwogs mthor nas ni/ /sems can chen po smre ba bdag thos nas/ /nu bos lus btang deng
199a4(rgyud): bdag the tshom 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te dus nas gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung
199a5(rgyud): du phyin te/ nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/ rus pa dang / skra ni kun tu 'thor/ /khrag babs bas ni rdzab tu gyur nas sa gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa
199a6(rgyud): mthong ba dang / brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang gzung ma nus pas rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang / langs nas lag
199a7(rgyud): pa bteg ste rab tu dus nas smre sngags bton pa/ bdag cag nu bo byad sdug mdzes/ /pha ma gnyis ka lhag par byams/ /ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas/ /lus
199b1(rgyud): spangs slar ni ldog ma gyur/ /gal te pha mas dris gyur na/ /bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdab/ /lhan cig srog ni btang sla na/ /rang gi lus ni ci phyir bzhag /de nas rgyal
199b2(rgyud): bu gnyis smre sngags bton te dus nas yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal bu tha chung gis khrid pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams phan tshun
199b3(rgyud): gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so zhes smras par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal bu'i btsun mo dam pa'ang yang thog mthon po'i
199b4(rgyud): steng du nyal ba'i rmi lam na ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba/ 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang / so lhung ba dang / phug ron gyi phru gu gsum thob pa
199b5(rgyud): las gcig ni khras khyer/ gnyis ni dngangs shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to/ /sa g.yos pa'i tshe btsun mo sad de/ sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas
199b6(rgyud): 'di skad du smras so/ /ci phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g.yos/ /chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul/ /nyi ma 'od med g.yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra/ /mig
199b7(rgyud): 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong mi 'dra/ /snying la mdas phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir/ /lus kun rab g.yo bde ba ci yang med/ /bdag gis rmi lam ltas
200a1(rgyud): @#/ /ngan mthong bas na/ /nges par sngon med ltas ngan dngos po yod/ /btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las nu zho zags pa dang 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon
200a2(rgyud): mi za bar ltas ngan gyi dngos po ston pa yin no snyam mo/ /de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do zhes zer ba thos pa
200a3(rgyud): dang | sems la shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes nas pho brang gi nang du song ste btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo/ mkhyen lags sam/ slad rol gyi
200a4(rgyud): mi rnams las kun tu so sor rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so/ /de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang / mya ngan
200a5(rgyud): chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te mig mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha chen po/ bdag gis slad
200a6(rgyud): rol gyi mi rnams las/ 'di skad du/ bdag gis bu sdug tha chung stor ces mchi ba thos lags so/ /rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang / shin tu skrag par gyur pas
200a7(rgyud): brnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du/ kyi hud sdug bsngal lo/ /deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas mchi ma phyis te btsun mo la spro
200b1(rgyud): ba bskyed nas/ 'di skad du/ bzhin bzang ma/ khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /nged deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal par bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po btsun
200b2(rgyud): mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste so sor gyis te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nya
200b3(rgyud): bar mdun du 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ rgyal bu mi bzhugs zhes thos pas thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bu tha chung ni da dung mi
200b4(rgyud): gda' lags so/ /rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang / smre sngags bton nas/ 'di skad du/ kyi hud/ nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to/ /dang po
200b5(rgyud): bu yod pa na dga' ba chung / /phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che/ /gal te nga'i bus srog ni slar thob na/ /nga'i lus shi yang sdug bsngal ci yang med/ /btsun mos
200b6(rgyud): de skad thos pa dang / dper na/ mdas phog pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun tu dkris par gyur pas smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi bu gsum 'khor dang
200b7(rgyud): bcas par ni/ /nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las/ /bu sdug tha chung gcig pu ma 'ongs pas/ /nges par 'bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos yod 'gyur/ /de'i 'og
201a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las rgyal pos blon po de la bu sdug gang na 'dug ces pa smros pa las/ blon po
201a2(rgyud): 'bring pos de yid la bcags te dus pas lkog ma dang / lce yang bskams nas tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang btsun mos 'di skad ces
201a3(rgyud): dris so/ /bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smros/ /bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur/ /myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor/ /bdag
201a4(rgyud): gi brang ni de ring gas snyam byed/ /de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas
201a5(rgyud): pa dang rgyal po dang / btsun mos gtam de thos nas smre zhing mchi mas brnab sa bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i sa phyogs su myur zhing rings par dong ste/ 'od
201a6(rgyud): m a'i tshal byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su btang ba'i gnas su phyin nas rus pa rnams kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang cig car sa la 'gyel te shi ba dang
201a7(rgyud): 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas/ dper na/ rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po bsgyel ba bzhin du sems rmongs shing dran pa stor bas shes pa ci yang med par gyur
201b1(rgyud): to| |de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang rgyal po dang / btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdod dran pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas lag pa bteg
201b2(rgyud): ste 'dug nas smre tshig smras pa/ kye hud/ bu sdug tha chung mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa/ /ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses/ /gal te khyod kyi mdun du
201b3(rgyud): bdag shi na/ /'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur/ /de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang skra long long por gyur te lag
201b4(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas nya skams la 'gre ba bzhin du sa la 'gres te pha bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smre tshig smras pa/ bdag gi bu ni sus gtubs na/ /
201b5(rgyud): rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor/ /bdag gi bu sdug stor bas na/ /mya ngan smre ba rang mi theg /kye hud bu ni sus bsad na/ /mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra mthong / /bdag
201b6(rgyud): snying rdo ni ma yin nam/ /ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur/ /bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis/ /gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang / /so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na/ /deng
201b7(rgyud): ni sdug bsngal chen po myong / /phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni/ /gcig ni khras khyer mthong bas na/ /deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas/ /ltas ngan ston la mi bden
202a1(rgyud): @#/ /med| |de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang / bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bar btugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i
202a2(rgyud): tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go / kun
202a3(rgyud): dga' bo/ khyod kyis 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par bya'o/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon
202a4(rgyud): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i
202a5(rgyud): skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu'ang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyabs nas phan btags te nges par 'byung ba thob par byas na/ da ltar nyon
202a6(rgyud): mongs pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag ma med de/ lha dang / mi yi ston par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas sems can re re'i phyir
202a7(rgyud): yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal ba dang / gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang / nyon
202b1(rgyud): mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba 'thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcang
202b2(rgyud): de bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /bskal pa grangs med tshad med snyed/ /res 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas/ /rtag par sbyin pa che ba btang / /shin tu phangs
202b3(rgyud): ba'i lus btang nas/ /'khor ba las ni nges byung ste/ /byang chub dam pa phyin par smon/ /sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni/ /yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya/ /rgyal bu
202b4(rgyud): dpa' bo zhes bya ba/ /rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med/ /de la phu bo gnyis yod de/ /sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba/ /gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste/ /mthar gyis ri dang
202b5(rgyud): nags tshal phyin/ /stag mo bkres pas nyen mthong nas/ /'di 'dra'i sems ni skyes par gyur/ /stag mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang / /gzhan bzar rung ba ci yang
202b6(rgyud): med| |skyes chen 'di 'dra mthong nas ni/ /de yis bu ni zos dogs phyir/ /chags med lus ni rab btang nas/ /bu skyabs rmas pa med par byas/ /sa chen dang ni ri
202b7(rgyud): rnams kyang / /dus gcig thams cad rab tu g.yos/ /chu klung rgya mtsho shin tu 'khrugs/ /rlabs drag chu ni gyen du 'bab/ /gnam sa 'od ni stor bas na/ /mun nag ci yang mthong ba
203a1(rgyud): @#/ /med/ /nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan gzan rnams/ /'phur rgyug rnams ni yongs su spangs/ /bu gnyis ci'i phyir ma log ces/ /mya ngan brtse ba'i sdug
203a2(rgyud): bsngal skyes/ /g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni/ /nags tshal kun tu yongs su btsal/ /spun gnyis lhan cig rab 'grogs te/ /ri gzar nags su phyin nas ni//
203a3(rgyud): phyogs bzhir bltas kyang ci ma mthong / /stag mo mthong ba'i nags stong du/ /ma dang bu bdun bcas par ni/ /thams cad khrag gis kha bskus dang / /rus pa lhag ma skra
203a4(rgyud): rnams ni/ /sa la kun tu 'thor ba mthong / /gzhan yang khrag gi zags pa rnams/ /'od ma'i tshal kun sbags pa dag /phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni/ /sems la 'jigs
203a5(rgyud): skrag chen po skyes/ /gnyis ka brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/ /'khrugs myos ci yang mi dran pas/ /sa rdul dag gis lus kun gos/ /rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams/ /rgyal
203a6(rgyud): bu g.yog ni mang po rnams/ /de tshe sems la mya ngan skyes/ /chu gtor dran pa thob nas kyang / /lag bteg skad cher phyung ste dus/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus btang tshe/ /
203a7(rgyud): byams pa'i ma ni pho brang na/ /bud med lnga brgya rnams dang ni/ /lhan cig longs spyod myong ba las/ /btsun mo dam pa'i nu ma gnyis/ /rang gi nu zho zags gyur pas/ /
203b1(rgyud): lus kun khab kyis phug pa bzhin/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rab tu byed/ /bu stor 'du shes skyes pas na/ /mya ngan zug rngu sems la zug /rgyal po chen po zhes byas nas/ /
203b2(rgyud): sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad/ /cho nges smra ba mi bzod pas/ /brtse ba'i skad kyis rgyal po la/ /rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod/ /deng bdag sdug bsngal chen po
203b3(rgyud): skyes| |nu bo gnyis ni rang byung bas/ /bkag kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub/ /khab kyis lus kun phug pa bzhin/ /mya ngan brang ni gas la thug /bdag ni g.yar lam snga
203b4(rgyud): ltas ngan/ /nges par bu sdug stor bar gyur/ /lhas ni bdag gi srog skyobs la/ /du ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod/ /g.yar lam phug ron gsum mthong ba/ /chung ngu
203b5(rgyud): de ni bu sdug lags/ /khras ni phrogs te 'tshal bas ni/ /mya ngan rdzogs par gsol bar dka'/ /deng bdag mya ngan mtshor bying bas/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba ring mi
203b6(rgyud): thogs/ /bu srog mi gson blo ba chung / /myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol/ /gzhan yang slad rol mi rnams las/ /bu chung ma rnyed thos pas na/ /deng bdag sems
203b7(rgyud): ni rab mi bde/ /lhas ni bdag la brtse bar mdzod/ /btsun mos de skad smras nas ni/ /lus btegs sa la rab tu brdabs/ /rab tu brtse bas sems brgyal
204a1(rgyud): @#/ /myos| |rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med/ /nang 'khor bud med btsun mo de/ /brgyal te sa la 'gyel mthong nas/ /skad cher phyung ste rab tu dus//
204a2(rgyud): mya ngan sngangs skrag gnas kyang stor/ /rgyal pos tshig de thos pas na/ /mya ngan rang nyid gzung ma nus/ /blon po thams cad bkug nas ni/ /bu sdug tshol ba yongs
204a3(rgyud): su bkye/ /thams cad grong khyer phyir byung ste/ /de dag de dag kun tu btsal/ /ngus nas mi ni mang po la/ /rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras/ /da ltar gson nam 'on te
204a4(rgyud): shi |gang du song ba su yis shes/ /ji ltar byas na mthong gyur nas/ /bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kun/ /rgyal bu de ni shi zer
204a5(rgyud): bas| |thos pa thams cad rab tu gdung / /smre sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dka'/ /de tshe rgyal po shing rta che/ /cho nges smras nas stan las langs/ /btsun mo'i drung
204a6(rgyud): du nyer song ste/ /de yi lus la chus kyang gtor/ /btsun mo chus ni gtor bas na/ /ring zhig lon nas dran pa thob/ /rab smras rgyal po la zhus pa/ /bdag bu de ltar
204a7(rgyud): gang na mchis/ /rgyal pos btsun mo la bsgo ba/ /ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste/ /phyogs bzhir rgyal bu tshol bcug na/ /da dung gtam skyel yong ma 'ongs/ /rgyal
204b1(rgyud): pos btsun mo yang bsgo ba/ /khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par/ /re zhig rang nyid bde bar byos/ /lhan cig phyir byung btsal bar bya/ /de nas rgyal po btsun mo bcas/ /bzhon pa
204b2(rgyud): zhon nas mdun du chas/ /smre ba'i skad kyis cho nges btab/ /gdung sems me ni 'bar ba 'dra/ /ya rabs ma rabs brgya stong rnams/ /rgyal po'i rjes su grong khyer byung / /
204b3(rgyud): brtse ba'i ngu sgra mi chad par/ /so sor rgyal bu yongs su btsal/ /rgyal pos bu sdug btsal ba'i phyir/ /mig gis phyogs bzhir bltas pa las/ /skra bshig khrag gis
204b4(rgyud): lus bskul te/ /lus kun rdul gyis gos pa dang / /dus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba yi/ /mi zhig kyang ni mthong bar gyur/ /rgyal pos ltas ngan de mthong nas/ /lhag par
204b5(rgyud): mya ngan skyes par gyur/ /rgyal pos lag pa gnyis bteg nas/ /brtse bas dus te bkag ma nus/ /thog mar blon po chen po zhig /rings brtabs rgyal po drung 'ongs
204b6(rgyud): nas| |rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol/ /lha yi thugs brtse sras bu de/ /da dung rnyed par ma gyur kyang / /ring por mi thogs phyin par
204b7(rgyud): mchi| |lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol/ /rgyal po yang ni song ba las/ /blon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong / /blon po rgyal po drung 'ongs nas/ /dus te rgyal la 'di skad
205a1(rgyud): @#/ /smras| |rgyal bu gnyis ni bzhugs pa yang / /mya ngan zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs/ /rgyal bu tha chung gang lags pa/ /de ni mi rtag pa yis
205a2(rgyud): med| |bu btsas stag mo ltogs pa zhig / bu 'tshal snyam pa gzigs nas ni/ /rgyal bu sems can chen po yis/ /thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ /bla med
205a3(rgyud): lam ni gnyer ba dang / /mang po thams cad bzla ba'i slad/ /byang chub mchog la 'du shes bcings/ /shin tu zab yangs rgya mtsho bzhin/ /ri mtho rtse la 'dzegs nas
205a4(rgyud): ni| |stag mo ltogs mdun sku yang bor/ /nyam chung 'tshal rngo ma thogs nas/ /'od mas mgur du khrag phyung bas/ /rgyal bu'i sku ni 'tshal bas nas/ /sku gdung
205a5(rgyud): lhag ma tsam zhig lus/ /de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas/ /de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur/ /sems ni mya ngan mtshor bying ste/ /nyon mongs me yis rab tu /
205a6(rgyud): blon pos tsan+dan chu dag gis/ /rgyal po btsun mo gtor bas na/ /cig car langs nas rab tu dus/ /lag bteg brang dag la yang brdungs/ /blon po chung ngu 'ongs
205a7(rgyud): nas ni| |rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /bdag gis rgyal bu gnyis po ni/ /tshal na brgyal bar gyur pa mthong / /bdag gis chab grang gtor bas na/ /dran pa
205b1(rgyud): cung zad thob par gyur/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu gzigs pa ni/ /rab tu 'bar me kun khyab 'dra/ /skad cig bzhengs kyang slar yang 'gyel/ /cho nges bdag nyid 'dzin mi spyod/ /
205b2(rgyud): phyag bteg brtse ba'i tshig dag gis/ /gcung gi ya mtshan bsngags par mdzad/ /rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang / /mya ngan me yi lhag par btsos/ /btsun mos rab tu dus nas
205b3(rgyud): ni| |skad cher phyung ste 'di skad smras/ /bdag gi bu sdug lhag par byams pa de/ /mi rtag srin po dag gis med par gyur/ /da ltar bu gnyis lus par gyur pa yang / /mya ngan
205b4(rgyud): me yis rab bsregs nyon yang mongs/ /bdag deng ri drung dag tu myur song la/ /spro bskyed srog gi lhag ma bsrung bar bya/ /de nas bzhon zhon lam du myur zhugs nas/ /rtse
205b5(rgyud): gcig sems kyis lus spangs brag drung song / /bu gnyis yid bcags brang brdungs spyod tshul nyams/ /'gro bzhin ngu ba dag dang lam du phrad/ /pha mas pang blangs mya
205b6(rgyud): ngan smre sngags bton/ /cig car lus btang ri dang nags su dong / /byang chub sems dpas lus spangs nags phyin nas/ /lhan cig 'dus nas rab ngus sdug bsngal
205b7(rgyud): che| |rgyan phreng bkrol te snying tshims dus nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rus bu lhag ma bsdus/ /skye bo mang pos lhan cig mchod pa byas/ /rin chen sna bdun mchod
206a1(rgyud): @#/ /rten brtsigs nas ni/ /ring bsrel de ni sgrom gyi nang du bzhag /mya ngan bcas bzhin slar ni grong khyer dong / /kun dga' la ni bka' stsal
206a2(rgyud): pa| |sngon byung sems can chen po ni/ /shAkya thub pa nga yin pas/ /gzhan yin snyam du bsam mi bya/ /rgyal po zas gtsang yab yin te/ /btsun mo nga yum sgyu 'phrul
206a3(rgyud): yin| |rgyal bu chen po byams pa yin/ /rgyal bu 'bring po 'jam dpal yin/ /stag mo skye dgu'i bdag mo yin/ /bu lnga dge slong lnga po yin/ /gcig ni maud gal chen
206a4(rgyud): po'i bu/ /gcig ni shA ri'i bu yin no/ /ngas ni khyed cag thams cad la/ /sngon gzhan phan btags pa yi gtam/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bshad/ /sangs
206a5(rgyud): rgyas 'grub rgyu 'di slob byos/ /byang chub sems dpas lus btang tshe/ /smon lam rgya chen 'di skad btab/ /bdag lus rus pa lhag ma yis/ /ma 'ongs sems can
206a6(rgyud): phan 'dogs shog / 'di ni lus btang gnas yin te/ /rin chen sna bdun mchod rten de/ /lo ni tshad med bar du gnas/ /de nas sa 'og bying bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi
206a7(rgyud): smon lam mthu stobs kyis/ /rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can zlos/ /lha mi kun la phan gdags phyir/ /sa las 'phags te byung ba yin/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
206b1(rgyud): kyis sngon gyi rgyud 'di bstan pa na lha dang / mi'i skye bo'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa snyed yongs su gdung ba dang / dga' ba chen po skyes te/ sngon chad nam yang 'di lta
206b2(rgyud): bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la yang
206b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni drin lan glan pa'i phyir gus pas phyag byas pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par bsdus pa dang / mchod rten de yang
206b4(rgyud): slar sa'i 'og tu bying bar gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //
206b5(rgyud): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag
206b6(rgyud): khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed so so nas rang gi zhing khams nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas yan lag lnga sa la
206b7(rgyud): gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom
207a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog ldan/ /'od zer kun gsal gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /rnam dag rab mnyen pad+ma dag dang mtshungs/ /mtshan
207a2(rgyud): mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan te/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs/ /'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yong
207a3(rgyud): ma mchis/ /dri bral dper na rnam dag zla nya 'dra/ /gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom pas/ /seng+ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad/ /dam pa rnam brgyad
207a4(rgyud): dbang po mthun mdzad pas/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas/ /'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs
207a5(rgyud): mi mnga'/ /mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra/ /yon tan rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs/ /yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang //
207a6(rgyud): rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad/ /nyon mongs sred pa'i bag chags kun bsal bas/ /chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi 'chad/ /thugs brtses
207a7(rgyud): sems can dag la phan 'dogs pas/ /da ltar slad ma'i dus kyi bde ba stsol/ /rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas/ /yang dag rab dben mya ngan
207b1(rgyud): 'das la 'god/ /bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i chos mchog rab bstan nas/ /bdud rtsi'i gya nom don ni stsol mdzad pas/ /bdud rtsi'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas/ /bdud
207b2(rgyud): rtsi'i 'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god/ /rtag par 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho chen po dang / /sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar bar mdzod/ /de dag bde ba shul du rab
207b3(rgyud): btsud de/ /yid bzhin bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab stsol/ /bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs/ /dpe ni mang po dag gis rig mi 'gyur/ /rtag par kun la
207b4(rgyud): thugs rje cher gzigs pas/ /thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyun mi 'chad/ /bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du
207b5(rgyud): ni| |lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsam kyang / /cha shas tsam yang rig par yang mi 'gyur/ /bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las/ /thigs pa 'ga'
207b6(rgyud): zhig bsngags pa brjod pa yi/ /bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsgos nas/ /thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur thob smon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
207b7(rgyud): sems dpa' mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems
208a1(rgyud): @#/ /can la phan 'dogs shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas sdig pa rnams yongs su byang nas bsod nams tshad med pa
208a2(rgyud): snyed skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod
208a3(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ /pus
208a4(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thub
208a5(rgyud): pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rdzogs shing / /yon tan tshad ma mchis pas sku rab brgyan/ /rnam dag rgya chen sems can lta mos pas/ /nyi ma stong bzhin 'od
208a6(rgyud): kyis snang bar mdzad/ /kha dog mtha' yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas/ /rin chen pad+ma'i phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes/ /dper na gdugs shar nam mkha' snang
208a7(rgyud): bzhin bgyid/ /kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gnon/ /gser gyi ri bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas/ /zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab/ /
208b1(rgyud): sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas/ /bde ba dam pa mtha' yas stsal bar mdzad/ /mtshan rnams phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas/ /sems
208b2(rgyud): can lta mos skyo ba yongs ma mchis/ /dbu skra rab mnyen kha dog me tog bsdus pa 'dra/ /dgyes dang btang snyoms chen po dag pas brgyan/ /byams dang thugs rje
208b3(rgyud): dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dam pa rab mdzes pa/ /byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags/ /bcom ldan bsod nams phan yon mang
208b4(rgyud): btang bas/ /de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob/ /yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab rgyal bas/ /'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong snang bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'od zer
208b5(rgyud): shin tu rdzogs pas na/ /dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra/ /bcom ldan ri rab bzhin du yon tan ldan/ /phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par
208b6(rgyud): mdzad| |bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes/ /tshems dkar gtams pa dung gi kha dog 'dra/ /bcom ldan zhal mdzes dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /smin
208b7(rgyud): mtshams ba spu rtag par g.yas su 'khyil/ /'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs/ /dper na zla nya nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra/ /bcom
209a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
209a2(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa yin pas/ thams cad la phan gdogs par 'gyur zhing / gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun
209a3(rgyud): par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog
209a4(rgyud): gis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
209a5(rgyud): 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan rnam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal/ /rnam dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal/ /chos min spong ba'i blo la gus
209a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal/ /kye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod/ /kye ma mthong dka' u dum bA ra 'dra/ /kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i ri rgyal 'dra/ /kye ma ngo mtshar bde
209a7(rgyud): gshegs 'od tshad med/ /kye ma ngo mtshar kha bsgyur smon lam che/ /kye ma ngo mtshar shAka rigs nyi ma 'dis/ /'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas
209b1(rgyud): bshad nas/ /brtse bas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam 'jog pas/ /rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs/ /
209b2(rgyud): rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas/ /rab dben spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo rab dben bzhugs pas na/ /nyan thos slob ma lus kyang
209b3(rgyud): de bzhin stong / /chas rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas/ /sems can thams cad kyang ni stong zhing dben/ /bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid/ /bdag ni rtag tu
209b4(rgyud): bcom ldan mthong bar mos/ /bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na/ /rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang mjal/ /bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis
209b5(rgyud): nas| |rtag par zhal lta sems kyis mi spong smon/ /rab tu gdung sems bar chad ma mchis par/ /rtag par rim gro bgyid kyang skyo mi bgyid/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs
209b6(rgyud): ni rab bskyed nas/ /mdangs ldan zhal ni bdag gis rtag mthong mdzod/ /bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas/ /rtag par lha mi dag ni bsgral bar smon/ /sku
209b7(rgyud): ni rang bzhin rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi zla ba mtshungs/ /bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas/ /yon tan phung po thams cad skyed par
210a1(rgyud): @#/ /smon| |bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang / /bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul ngas ma mi lus/ /nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar
210a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing / /drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i dpog mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas/ /thugs rje chen po'i sku ni rtag mthong
210a3(rgyud): smon| |las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni/ /myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa
210a4(rgyud): brjod nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo/ khyod kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi brdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i
210a5(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod nas/ bdag dang / gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bsod
210a6(rgyud): nams 'dis khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor
210a7(rgyud): bsgom par 'gyur la gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par
210b1(rgyud): rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po stan las langs
210b2(rgyud): te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
210b3(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa sku yang dag par gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ mgur dung gi dbyibs dang / zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu/ spyan pad+ma sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ sgros dmar
210b4(rgyud): zhing bzang ba/ chu shel gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ /shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur pa/ tshems dkar zhing thags bzang bas
210b5(rgyud): me tog ku mu da dang mtshungs/ 'od kyis kun tu snang bar mdzad pas nyi ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa/ 'od kyi kha dog kun tu khyab pas 'dzam bu'i gser dang 'dra ba/
210b6(rgyud): tshig gsung ba la nor zhing 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/
210b7(rgyud): thugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa'ang de bzhin du gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / spyod yul rnams rtag par rnam par dag
211a1(rgyud): @#/ /par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa spangs pas gshegs shing bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul ba mi mnga' ba/ lo drug dka' ba mdzad
211a2(rgyud): nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bskor ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa/ sku'i mtshan yongs
211a3(rgyud): su rdzogs pa n+ya gro d+ha'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas phrin las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mnga' ba/ thams cad mkhyen
211a4(rgyud): pa dang ldan pas bdag dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa/ gang ci gsung yang rung ste rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pas
211a5(rgyud): don ma mchis par mi gsung ba/ shAkya'i rigs kyi nang nas seng ge chen por gyur pas rab tu brtan cing dpa' pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par
211a6(rgyud): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /deng bdag gi nyams kyis ci tsam lcogs pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags
211a7(rgyud): pa brjod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sbrang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang bsod nams de'i dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan
211b1(rgyud): du spangs nas bla na med pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms
211b2(rgyud): pa las spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas/ ded nga'i yon tan rgya cher bsngags pa brjod pa legs so/ /legs so/ /'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos

211b4(rgyud): tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
211b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed rnams dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ngas
211b6(rgyud): bskal ba chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de thob pa'i chos shin tu zab pa/ byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni/
211b7(rgyud): byed la yang dag par bstan zin na/ khyed cag las su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs

212a5(rgyud): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na'ang lus dang / srog la phangs pa ma mchis par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher spel te/ yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na

212b1(rgyud): rje chen po'i go man bas nas/ /thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs/ /da dung thugs rje de stobs kyis/ /mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/ /bsod nams tshogs ni yongs

217b6(rgyud): bas mtho ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan mchog thob dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'
217b7(rgyud): sprin chen chos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags dga' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa mtha' med ston dang / byang
