290a7(rgyud): mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs
290b1(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston to/ /chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ 'gro ba 'ang med/ 'ong ba 'ang med do/ /sems can rnams
290b2(rgyud): yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du dmigs pa'ang med do/ /chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do/ /'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba 'ang med/ skye
290b3(rgyud): ba 'ang med do/ /chos thams cad la rnam par rtag pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams gang du 'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
290b4(rgyud): 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa rnams kyis ni byang chub kyi sems las ni
290b5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong dang / dge slong tshad med pa rnams kyis ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang
290b6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i rgyun gcod dam
290b7(rgyud): chos 'di/ /zab cing phra la blta dka' ste/ /'dod pas bsgribs pa'i dmus yong dag /de ma mthong bas sdug bsngal len/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs te bcom ldan
291a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
291a2(rgyud): 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / ston cing gnas pa der bdag cag thams cad mchis nas chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te de la phan pa dang / bde ba stsal cing lus dang /
291a3(rgyud): sems bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis sems rtse gcig tu gyur par mchod par bgyi'o/ /nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i yul
291a4(rgyud): der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mu ge ya nga bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / skye bo mang pos rgyas shing yongs su dar bar bgyi'o/ /chos
291a5(rgyud): 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi brdzi zhing gtsang mar bgyi'o/ /de
291a6(rgyud): ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas 'di ni mchod rten lags pa'i slad du gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lhab lhub kyis
291a7(rgyud): yongs su mchod par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis kyang rtag tu bsrung zhing bskyabs te nyams pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus
291b1(rgyud): ba de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di sgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig dang / dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig rten 'dir yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//
291b2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs
291b3(rgyud): kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs
291b4(rgyud): pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba gang
291b5(rgyud): dag sngar 'gyur gang byung dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na'ang gang 'tsho ba/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /thub dbang zhi zhing
291b6(rgyud): rab zhi rnam par dag / sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsungs snyan te/ /tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung / /bung
291b7(rgyud): ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni ring zhing
292a1(rgyud): @#/ /mthon mthing dri ma med/ /ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing leb la pad+ma'i mdog /pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra/ /zhal gyi
292a2(rgyud): mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra/ /bai DUR+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil/ /thub pa'i sku ni zla ba phra 'dra zhing / /zla ba zad 'dra spyan bkrag bung ba bzhin/ /zhal mtho shangs ni rtag
292a3(rgyud): tu lhang nge ste/ /'jam zhing sa yi gser ltar kha dog bzang / /rtag par rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags/ /spu yi bu ga nas ni re
292a4(rgyud): ro skyes/ /spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ /mthon mthing 'dra bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/ /rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ /bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang
292a5(rgyud): bar bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang / /'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/ /bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim/ /sems dmyal
292a6(rgyud): 'gro dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang / /yi dwags lha gnas mi yi gnas rnams su/ /sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/ /ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi/ /kha dog bzang
292a7(rgyud): ba gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/ /bder gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ /'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/ /gzhon nu btsas
292b1(rgyud): 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam/ /seng+ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog /phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste/ /sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /'dom gang 'od
292b2(rgyud): 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong / /nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhang nge'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po sku mchog dri ma med/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas 'od ni
292b3(rgyud): rnam par lhang nge bas/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang / /mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang po dag /de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyi
292b4(rgyud): ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /sangs rgya nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong /
292b5(rgyud): bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/ /glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i sku/ /phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma
292b6(rgyud): med| |sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/ /phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed 'byung ba dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs
292b7(rgyud): pa yi| |rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dwang ba'i/ /ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang / /spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang / /dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag
293a1(rgyud): @#/ /'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dge gyur pa/ /snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/ /bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/ /
293a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni/ /lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ /bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams
293a3(rgyud): cad kyi/ /yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/ /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/ /skra yis rtse mos
293a4(rgyud): dpag par nus srid kyi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rab dwang ba yis/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas//
293a5(rgyud): bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang / /des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig /de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ /rgyal po
293a6(rgyud): 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang / /gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na/ /rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rda mthong zhing / /der
293a7(rgyud): ni bshags pa 'di 'dra thos par shog / rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ /tshe rabs de dang der ni rnyed gyur cig /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med
293b1(rgyud): dang | |gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba/ /de dag rmi lam na yang thos par shog /nyin gyur tshe yang de dag ston gyur cig /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar byed
293b2(rgyud): shog |pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bgyis nas/ /phyin chad byang chub bla med thob par shog /bdag gi zhing ni 'gran zla med gyur cig /rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras
293b3(rgyud): bu dang / /rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/ /shAkya thub dbang mngon du mthong bar shog /der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig /gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang

293b5(rgyud): cing | |skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dang / /de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/ /skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog /sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par
293b6(rgyud): byed gyur cig / bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog /sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod gyur cig /gser 'od dam pa yi ni
293b7(rgyud): bshags pa yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog /bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig /bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog /bdag gi bsod
294a1(rgyud): @#/ /nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog /yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor
294a2(rgyud): 'gyur bar shog / byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs/ /gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog /bdag gi byang
294a3(rgyud): chub snang ba rnam dag gyur/ /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog /bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum na khyad

294a5(rgyud): par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/ /de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba//
294a6(rgyud): yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing / /ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog /mdzes pa'i tog gis shes par byos/ /rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gis//
294a7(rgyud): sngon tshe smon lam 'di btab ste/ /de nyid da ltar khyod yin no/ /sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis ni/ /gser gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od/ /de nyid dngul tog dngul 'od ces/ /
294b1(rgyud): ngas ni de tshe lung bstan to/ /'khor mang de dag 'di thos nas/ /kun gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /da ltar ma 'ongs dus dag tu/ /rtag par bshags pa 'di byed shog /gser 'od

295a2(rgyud): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod cing sems rtse gcig pas phyag 'tshal la de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams

295a5(rgyud): nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yang pa'i dpal

297a3(rgyud): ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza' bar bya'o/ /de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang gzod dkyil 'khor de nas byung bar byas te mi de ni

297a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i
297b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad
297b2(rgyud): de| |de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya/ /sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/ /chos rnams thams cad shes par
297b3(rgyud): mi nus te/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ /sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / /sems can 'byung bya'i
297b4(rgyud): phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / /thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/ /mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/ /lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ /dbang po rnams ni
297b5(rgyud): dmag dang chom rkun 'dra/ /de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi/ /de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/ /mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug /rna ba'i dbang
297b6(rgyud): po sgra la rnam par dpyod/ /sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog /lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug /lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug /yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam
297b7(rgyud): par dpyod/ /dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/ /rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin/ /dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de/ /ji
298a1(rgyud): @#/ /ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang / /dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin/ /ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing / /dbang po'i spyod
298a2(rgyud): yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ /de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te/ /dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang / /
298a3(rgyud): ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ /sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/ /dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa//
298a4(rgyud): dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ /yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung / /grong
298a5(rgyud): stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/ /grong gzhan gnas de phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/ /dper na sbrul gdug gnas
298a6(rgyud): gcig ji bzhin te/ /rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/ /khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang / /gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro /phyogs dang
298a7(rgyud): phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ /khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur
298b1(rgyud): ba yin/ /me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ /ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis/ /sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas
298b2(rgyud): nas dong / /lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/ /ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ /bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na/ /lus ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis
298b3(rgyud): gang | |mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ /dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur/ /lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ /'di la sems can gang zag
298b4(rgyud): gang zhig yod/ /chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi
298b5(rgyud): 'byung ste/ /gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las 'byung ba yin/ /ma
298b6(rgyud): rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad de/ /'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang / /skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang / /sred dang len dang
298b7(rgyud): de bzhin srid pa dang / /skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag /ma byung ba las byung dang
299a1(rgyud): @#/ /mi 'byung dang / /tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / /bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par bgyis/ /ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya
299a2(rgyud): mo brtol/ /phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos/ /byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun
299a3(rgyud): tu bstan/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/ /ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog
299a4(rgyud): kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ /ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal/ /ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan
299a5(rgyud): dam pa bsgreng / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/ /ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag /sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa/ /rten med
299a6(rgyud): gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag / srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ /gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas/ /
299a7(rgyud): 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/ /lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / /yan lag mchog
299b1(rgyud): dang bu sdug bu mo dang / /nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/ /bai DUR+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang / /stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang / /rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang //
299b2(rgyud): nags tshal dag dang sa las ni/ /'khrungs pa thams cad gcad gtubs te/ /de dag thams cad phyer brlags nas/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
299b3(rgyud): ji tsam par/ /phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/ /'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus/ /sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams/ /stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /
299b4(rgyud): sems can kun gyi shes pa gang / /de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/ /shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ /phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/ /sems can kun las rab 'phags pa/ /ye
299b5(rgyud): shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / /skad cig cig la 'jug pa yang / /bskal pa
299b6(rgyud): bye ba du mar ni/ /gang du 'ang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
299b7(rgyud): lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos nas dga' ba dang / rangs pa skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
300a1(rgyud): @#/ /gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bstan pa zab mo
300a2(rgyud): 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te/ /'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ /
300a3(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul/ /bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol/ /rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la the tsom ci yod pa/ /'dri ba'i don de zhus shig
300a4(rgyud): dang | |rnam par phye ste bshad par bya/ /de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ /byang chub sems
300a5(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i/ /byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
300a6(rgyud): lha mo/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas te byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la
300a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka'
300b1(rgyud): stsal pa/ lha mo/ de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do/ /phung po lnga'ang brjod du med pa/ phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med
300b2(rgyud): pa ste| de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro/ /gal te phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te mtshan ma gnyis dang bral ba/ mtha'
300b3(rgyud): gnyis la mi gnas pa/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang / mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ phung po lnga las chos kyi
300b4(rgyud): dbyings su ji ltar gdags zhe na/ phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang / rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de'ang gal te rgyu dang / rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na ni skyes zin pa skye 'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/
300b5(rgyud): gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni rgyu dang / rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rigs so/ /gal te ma skyes pa skye na ni skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i
300b6(rgyud): chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste rgyu dang / rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin
300b7(rgyud): no| |rigs kyi lha mo/ dper na/ rnga'i sgra ni shing dang / ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da ltar byung ba'ang
301a1(rgyud): @#/ /stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de ni shing las kyang ma byung / ko ba dang / lag pa las kyang ma byung / dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste gang mi skye ba de ni
301a2(rgyud): mi 'gog pa'o/ /gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o/ /gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du'ang mi 'gro ba'o/ /gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang / chad pa ma
301a3(rgyud): yin pas gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
301a4(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no/ /
301a5(rgyud): gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'ang / mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur
301a6(rgyud): zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni
301a7(rgyud): 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no/ /de bas na phung po lnga de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang /
301b1(rgyud): rkyen gyis bskyed pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu dang / rkyen med pas bskyed pa'ang ma yin pa/ tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang / mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang / rkyen med pa/ dpes
301b2(rgyud): bstan du med pa/ thog ma dang / tha mar dben pa/ rang gi ngang gis stong pa ste de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan du spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o/ /de bas na
301b3(rgyud): phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi lha mo/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
301b4(rgyud): chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang / gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i rang
301b5(rgyud): bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
301b6(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
301b7(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar
302a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag
302a2(rgyud): po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so/ /lha mo/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu
302a3(rgyud): bsgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur/ de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa'i
302a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te 'phags pa rnams
302a5(rgyud): kyi spyod yul bas mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o/ /bdag ni chos 'di la brten te bde bar gnas pa thob bo/ /gal te tshig de bden pa lta na snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi
302a6(rgyud): khams 'di dag ni tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes ba 'ang
302a7(rgyud): ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing bde ba tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi char 'bab cing
302b1(rgyud): lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byung pa'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog cig ces smras ma thag tu snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems
302b2(rgyud): can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa 'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma
302b3(rgyud): l a 'dug cing bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pa na ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna
302b4(rgyud): tshogs bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i me tog gi char bab pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs
302b5(rgyud): spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro 'ang bud med kyi lus las tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go /byang chub sems dpa'
302b6(rgyud): rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po/ chu'i zla ba
302b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa
303a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /de skad ces bshad
303a2(rgyud): pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ khyod don gang la gnas te tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po/
303a3(rgyud): chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing rgyu dang / rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang bla
303a4(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /smras pa/ skyes bu khyod/ ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ byis pa 'ang gzhan/
303a5(rgyud): mkhas pa 'ang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa 'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol pa 'ang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa 'ang gzhan ma yin mod kyi/ tshangs pa chen
303a6(rgyud): po| chos de dag thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid do/ /de so so ma yin pa/ yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa/ 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa la mngon
303a7(rgyud): par chags shing 'dzin to/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan dang / de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur ba zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor/ sa dang / bye ma
303b1(rgyud): dang | shing dang / rtswa dang / lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te sgyu ma sprul pa/ 'di lta ste/ rta dang / glang po che'i tshogs dang / dmag dang / shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs dang /
303b2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang / mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to/ /de la sems can byis pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong
303b3(rgyud): na sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang / glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang / thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing phyis kyang de
303b4(rgyud): la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do/ /de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas thos pa dang / mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du
303b5(rgyud): sems te rta dang / glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste rta dang / glang po che dang / bang mdzod
303b6(rgyud): la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de bdag gis mthong ba dang / thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la phyis zhib tu brtags na 'ang brdzun pa slu
303b7(rgyud): ba'i chos su shes so/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa 'ang
304a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang / tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas yang dag pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma
304a2(rgyud): yin no snyam mo/ /yang tshangs pa chen po/ byis pa so so'i skye po 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa rnams kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de
304a3(rgyud): bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/ gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen
304a4(rgyud): te chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so/ /de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed dang /
304a5(rgyud): 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par mi zhen te 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed kyi ma yin pa'i chos kyang
304a6(rgyud): mi bden pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du mi grub pa
304a7(rgyud): ste 'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas yang dag pa bden pa'i don de ston par byed do/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po/ gang 'phags pa rnams ni 'phags
304b1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste kun rdzob tu ming dang / mtshan
304b2(rgyud): ma sna tshogs la brten nas gzhan la ston par byed do/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems can ji snyed cig gis chos zab
304b3(rgyud): mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po/ gang sprul pa mang po'i sems dang / sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de snyed kyis
304b4(rgyud): shes so/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na de dag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings
304b5(rgyud): yod pa 'ang ma yin med pa 'ang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis zab mo de'i don shes par nus so/ /de nas tshangs pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
304b6(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de
304b7(rgyud): bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po/ de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shig dang / mi skye
305a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang / tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag
305a2(rgyud): p a gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te tshig
305a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so/ /deng skyes bu chen po khyed dang phrad cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos bar gyur pa ngo mtshar che lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa
305a4(rgyud): chen po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rin po che'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag
305a5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston
305a6(rgyud): pa| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par
305a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul med rdul dang
305b1(rgyud): bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems
305b2(rgyud): las phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab ba bla
305b3(rgyud): na med pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed de so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas bla na med pa'i mchog
305b4(rgyud): dam pa'i sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
305b5(rgyud): su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ /tshangs pa chen po/ dge slong de dag gis bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas bskal pa chen po dgu
305b6(rgyud): bcu 'das pa na 'khor ba las yongs su 'das ba'i shes pa skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed bskal pa
305b7(rgyud): grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur te bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i
306a1(rgyud): @#/ /'od ces bya bar dus cig tu kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste de dag kun kyang mtshan smon
306a2(rgyud): lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /gzhan yang / tshangs pa chen po/ gser 'od dam
306a3(rgyud): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na/ gang la la zhig gis thabs dang mi ldan pas
306a4(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs
306a5(rgyud): bam du bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung bo snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phong
306a6(rgyud): pa nas grangs su bgrang ba dang / dper bsgrun par yang mi bzod do/ /tshangs pa chen po/ de lta bas na khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing nan tan du bsgrub pa dang / gzung
306a7(rgyud): zhing gzhan la 'ang yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo
306b1(rgyud): g.yul ngor lus dang / srog la mi lta ba bzhin du ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan la 'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston
306b2(rgyud): pa la thogs pa med par gyur to/ /tshangs pa chen po/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar rin po che sna bdun yang med par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /
306b3(rgyud): gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa chen po/ de ltar de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig
306b4(rgyud): rten na gnas kyi bar du bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nam med pa na gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na mdo sde'i
306b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / lus dang / srog la mi blta bas
306b6(rgyud): ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o//
306b7(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te tshangs ba'i 'khor grangs med ba dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams
307a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das

307a3(rgyud): pa'i tshe bgegs dang / bar chad kun bsal te dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang / mthu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus
307a4(rgyud): dang | sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de'ang mu ge dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma
307a5(rgyud): yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na 'ang bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs pas de dag bde zhing skyid pa dang / gnod pa rnams ma 'byung bar gyur na/ de dag kyang bdag
307a6(rgyud): cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi 'o/ /gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod
307a7(rgyud): cing rim gro bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po
307b1(rgyud): las sogs pa rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di 'ang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa dang /
307b2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
307b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
307b4(rgyud): po las/ stong pa nyid la brten nas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /

307b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
308a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs
308a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te rjed pas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can
308a3(rgyud): thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams
308a4(rgyud): cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi yang ba thams cad
308a5(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi
308a6(rgyud): bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag
308a7(rgyud): par rab tu bshad na chos mnyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag
308b1(rgyud): cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu'ang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa
308b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po bzhi ni che ba dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
308b3(rgyud): dang | lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi
308b4(rgyud): byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du
308b5(rgyud): ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ /
308b6(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes ming du chags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha
308b7(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i ya nga ba 'am/ nad kyi ya nga ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis
309a1(rgyud): @#/ /gtses par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong

309a3(rgyud): bskul ba na/ yul gang dang / gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs

309a5(rgyud): slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mi'i rgyal pos
309a6(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te de thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs
309a7(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i

310a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so/ /legs so/ /'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs

310a3(rgyud): yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i

310b1(rgyud): na rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis lha dang / lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin rnams pham par
310b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/

310b6(rgyud): ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod

311a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid ngam/

311a4(rgyud): pa bzhi dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang
311a5(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung
311a6(rgyud): dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis te da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/
311a7(rgyud): pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa
311b1(rgyud): dang | rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
311b2(rgyud): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
311b3(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o//
311b4(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid
311b5(rgyud): ba de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu
311b6(rgyud): yul der song ste yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus
311b7(rgyud): dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/
312a1(rgyud): @#/ /yul du gza' dang / nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam dgra zla 'dab nye
312a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag
312a3(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang
312a4(rgyud): na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung
312a5(rgyud): dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul tu zhugs pa las kyang de
312a6(rgyud): nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ /brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyang bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na
312a7(rgyud): yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so/ /legs so/ /rgyal
312b1(rgyud): po chen po dag khyed yang legs so/ /khyed bskal ba grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir mi'i
312b2(rgyud): rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
312b3(rgyud): gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor
312b4(rgyud): de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /yul de dag
312b5(rgyud): kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig /dzam+bu'i gling thams cad
312b6(rgyud): na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'tshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed
312b7(rgyud): bzhis dzam+bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des
313a1(rgyud): @#/ /mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi
313a2(rgyud): las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyis mi
313a3(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nam dzam+bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag nang phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems
313a4(rgyud): dang | phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'tshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang
313a5(rgyud): g.yog tu bcas pas khyed bzhis dzam+bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang byin can du 'gyur/ dus
313a6(rgyud): dang | zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'ang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar
313a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/
313b1(rgyud): longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar
313b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag /gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por 'gyur la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
313b3(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du byed/

313b5(rgyud): pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gis lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang
313b6(rgyud): rnam par 'phel lo/ /khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang skyed do/ /khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin
313b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la'ang mchod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
314a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la'ang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
314a2(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po chen po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs

314a4(rgyud): thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par

314a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/

314b1(rgyud): la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
314b2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang nyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal

314b7(rgyud): mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po
315a1(rgyud): @#/ /des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis
315a2(rgyud): te mnyan par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o/ /der mchis
315a3(rgyud): nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri
315a4(rgyud): mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ /phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ /mi'i
315a5(rgyud): rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos sar pa/ mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis stan rab tu dma' ba
315a6(rgyud): gding bar bgyis te stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ /dar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang /
315a7(rgyud): dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de la'ang ston par 'du
315b1(rgyud): shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug
315b2(rgyud): pa dang / phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad
315b3(rgyud): la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim
315b4(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang / bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen pos dga'
315b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
315b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dag /de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes par bgo bar bya'o/ /spud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan
315b7(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /gdugs dkar po 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la
316a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
316a2(rgyud): phrag dag gis 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa de snyed bor ba de snyed du
316a3(rgyud): tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal

316a5(rgyud): phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/
316a6(rgyud): brjod pa shin tu rgya cher bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing
316a7(rgyud): rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas
316b1(rgyud): pa mchog tu ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs
316b2(rgyud): su gzung bar 'gyur te rgyal po chen po dag/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du'ang bsu

316b6(rgyud): par 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par
316b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par
317a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par
317a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis brgya byin
317a3(rgyud): nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

317a5(rgyud): bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
317a6(rgyud): thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags

317b2(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim
317b3(rgyud): gror byed/ mchod par byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na mi'i rgyal
317b4(rgyud): po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel
317b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la rgyal ba'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro//
317b6(rgyud): phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag
317b7(rgyud): gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong
318a1(rgyud): @#/ /ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid
318a2(rgyud): cing rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la bdag cag rgyal po chen po
318a3(rgyud): bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing bdag dang / lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom
318a4(rgyud): ldan 'das/ dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /
318a5(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang /

318b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig
318b2(rgyud): yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
318b3(rgyud): yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu
318b4(rgyud): bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste spos
318b5(rgyud): dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang bar 'byung
318b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
318b7(rgyud): to| |rgyal po chen po dag / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma
319a1(rgyud): @#/ /zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag /mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs
319a2(rgyud): de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na pog snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de dag skad cig thang
319a3(rgyud): cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba
319a4(rgyud): phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye
319a5(rgyud): ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha
319a6(rgyud): bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang /
319a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang /
319b1(rgyud): bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar

324a1(rgyud): @#/ /cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar
324a2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos
