324a4(rgyud): tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog ches khyad par du
324a5(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
324a6(rgyud): du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi
324a7(rgyud): slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so/ /ci nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas
324b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra
324b2(rgyud): ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur
324b3(rgyud): ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar
324b4(rgyud): bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang
324b5(rgyud): g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag
324b6(rgyud): cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci
324b7(rgyud): nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang /
325a1(rgyud): @#/ /mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur
325a2(rgyud): ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
325a3(rgyud): 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag
325a4(rgyud): t hams cad da lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag
325a5(rgyud): pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags
325a6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas
325a7(rgyud): c hes 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi don du gser
325b1(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang
325b2(rgyud): dag dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
325b3(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /btsun pa
325b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ mchod
325b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas
325b6(rgyud): gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig /
325b7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dag /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig/
326a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang | de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
326a2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
326a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par
326a4(rgyud): rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /
326a5(rgyud): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
326a6(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu
326a7(rgyud): ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis bsrung zhing bskyabs pas de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te bde bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsod nams dang / ye
326b1(rgyud): shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA rA dzA ya/
326b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ mahA bi kA raM/ mahA bi kA raM/ mahA kA la/ mahA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarba satwA nAny+tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan
326b3(rgyud): 'das/ sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te de ltar lan bdun byas nas dpung pa la btags na don de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de
326b4(rgyud): nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te spos gu gul dang / tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / du ru ska dang / a ga ru dang / spos dkar po las sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par
326b5(rgyud): sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA d+hA na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rwa ya/ A kaR+Sha/ a pa ra dzi ta/ tsaN+De shwa rwa/
326b6(rgyud): pa ra ma/ ka ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa/ hi ta tsin+t+ra/ ma ma d+hA na bar+d+ho/ paR+ye sha swa yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ /sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sngags 'di 'don
326b7(rgyud): pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing
327a1(rgyud): @#/ /nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed
327a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba
327a3(rgyud): NA ya| mahA rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ saM dA ya/ At+ma nAM/ ni ta t+yan/
327a4(rgyud): an+d+har+d+hA tu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ d+hA na dA ya swAhA/ na mo ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci bas dkyil
327a5(rgyud): 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te bshos ci dang / ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o/ /spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas sngags
327a6(rgyud): k yi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis de'i gan du mchis te
327a7(rgyud): nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do/ /de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol gyi stsol cig ces smos shig /de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has
327b1(rgyud): yab la gsol pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol ba dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Ni
327b2(rgyud): brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par shes te gnas dben par bdag gcig bu spos bsregs la nyal khar sngas su dri'i
327b3(rgyud): za ma tog gcig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o/ /de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor ci 'byung ba las nor de de'i nyin bar dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me
327b4(rgyud): tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs par sbyar ba dang / brel zhing phongs pa rnams la'ang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo/ /khro ba dang / 'tsho ba'i
327b5(rgyud): bsam pa bskyed na de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
327b6(rgyud): gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la rtag par bsam zhing bstod pa dang / bsngags pa bya'o/ /rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu
327b7(rgyud): dang | bsod nams mngon par 'phel par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs
328a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas 'ong zhing de la bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do/ /sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang /
328a2(rgyud): bgegs dang / bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsams
328a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na'ang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/
328a4(rgyud): sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang sbyar ba'i mtshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis
328a5(rgyud): brgyan pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
328a6(rgyud): bu bdag bu smad dang / 'khor du bcas par bris te gnas der bkram nas me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan
328a7(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o/ /sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /na maHshrI kaN+ThA ya/ bud+d+ha ya/
328b1(rgyud): na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ mahA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na maHshrI mahA de byai/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+ho su shud+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma ni ka na ka/ badzre bai DUR+ya/ muk+ti ka/
328b2(rgyud): a laM kriM ta sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA hi ta kA ma/ be shra ba NA shrI ya de bI pra b+ha ya/ e hi e hi/ mA bi lam+ba/ g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/ pa ra s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma mA/ daR+sha na kA ma s+ya/ daR+sha naM/ ma ma ma na/ pra la ha
328b3(rgyud): dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas bdag byams pa dang / dga' pa'i bsam pa skyes nas bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon
328b4(rgyud): nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas lus kyi
328b5(rgyud): gus pa ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /khyod ci dang / ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod
328b6(rgyud): pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa'am/ gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/
328b7(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o/ /bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs
329a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod pa na'ang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste rin po che'i gter mi zad pa
329a2(rgyud): dang | bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dper na/ nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di
329a3(rgyud): ni nam yang slu bar mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig
329a4(rgyud): 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa'ang rung sngags 'di sgrub pa'ang rung ste tshegs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can dbul zhing
329a5(rgyud): phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas de phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang / phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis
329a6(rgyud): kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing
329a7(rgyud): rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyi snang bar byas te bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bsgo zhing
329b1(rgyud): mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go / bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus sngags de
329b2(rgyud): skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so/ /legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad
329b3(rgyud): bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang / mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas rgyal
329b4(rgyud): p o chen po bzhi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bo'i phyag btsal te de'i tshe
329b5(rgyud): mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku/ /rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ /rgyal
329b6(rgyud): ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ /rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis
329b7(rgyud): gang | |ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang / /rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste/ /khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong / /phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas sbras pa ste/
330a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/ /gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/ /rgyal dbang dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal/ /yon tan thams cad ri
330a2(rgyud): dbang 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra/ /nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta
330a3(rgyud): bur chags med pa/ /rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu
330a4(rgyud): dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas
330a5(rgyud): bskyang bar bya/ /'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu'i
330a6(rgyud): gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ /'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / /sems can dmyal ba'i sems
330a7(rgyud): can rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin/ /'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis/ /rab
330b1(rgyud): tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ /chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ /gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang / /shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing /
330b2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang / /sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ /'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ /yul la dga' dang bdag bde
330b3(rgyud): dga' ba dang / /rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /mdo sde'i dbang po mchog tu dge bar byed/ /pha rol dgra ni
330b4(rgyud): yang dag zad par byed/ /pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge bar byed/ /mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed/ /dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes
330b5(rgyud): pa| |yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/ /rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ /dper na chu grang skom pa sel
330b6(rgyud): byed pas/ tsha bas nyam thag tshe ni rnyed par ltar/ /yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /dper na rin chen thams
330b7(rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/ /mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /'di
331a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni lha mi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa/ /mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas/ /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ /bzhi po
331a2(rgyud): dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad
331a3(rgyud): pa na| / sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ /rab tu
331a4(rgyud): dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
331a5(rgyud): pa| |lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/ /gzi brjid dang ni stobs
331a6(rgyud): dang brtson 'grus thob/ /gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus/ /shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la
331a7(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig tu ngus
331b1(rgyud): nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan
331b2(rgyud): 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas
331b3(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
331b4(rgyud): 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dag /chos smra ba de la bsrung pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu
331b5(rgyud): dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na'ang bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed
331b6(rgyud): pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs
331b7(rgyud): su rgyas par byed pas/ nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de
332a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/
332a2(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /gser
332a3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/
332a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
332a5(rgyud): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
332a6(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
332a7(rgyud): gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don de gang lags/ de skad ces
332b1(rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang /
332b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas
332b3(rgyud): shing | chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos
332b4(rgyud): po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba'ang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ chos
332b5(rgyud): gang gi skye ba'ang ma yin/ 'gog pa'ang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas
332b6(rgyud): kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos
332b7(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/
333a1(rgyud): @#/ /shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
333a2(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi
333a3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs
333a4(rgyud): pa| bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ legs
333a5(rgyud): so| |legs so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang
333a6(rgyud): la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la
333a7(rgyud): bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang la la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par
333b1(rgyud): byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san+d+ha
333b2(rgyud): ra Ni| ud d+hA ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ su nA ya/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya la/ sat+t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ut+pa da ni/ a ba nA ba ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ su niH
333b3(rgyud): shri ta| ba hu gu b+ha/ a b+hi ba dA swAhA// //shA radwa ti'i bu/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang /
333b4(rgyud): par gzung ba byas nas 'chang bar byed pa de la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang smon lam zad
333b5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis chugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sprul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ chags
333b6(rgyud): pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/
333b7(rgyud): chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa
334a1(rgyud): @#/ /phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
334a2(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
334a3(rgyud): las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
334a4(rgyud): 'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
334a5(rgyud): las| chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
334a6(rgyud): kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad
334a7(rgyud): kyi zungs shig / kun dga' bo/ shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ lho phyogs na skang brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/
334b1(rgyud): nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi
334b2(rgyud): ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas
334b3(rgyud): gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ drA bi Da'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/
334b4(rgyud): ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum las phyogs 'dir glog thams cad la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang
334b5(rgyud): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
334b6(rgyud): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Te/
334b7(rgyud): ni ka Te/ pra t+ya r+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sA re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri kaN+ka ri/ ka pi li/ piM ga la/ ak+Shi da d+hi mu
335a1(rgyud): @#/ /khi| dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid
335a2(rgyud): kyis| bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
335a3(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig
335a4(rgyud): rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha ri mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ mahA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyi ma 'jigs shig ces lag na
335a5(rgyud): rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi Da swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de bdag gis rtag par
335a6(rgyud): rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/
335a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad
335b1(rgyud): du| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzugs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swAhA/ prah+ma pU re swAhA/ brah+ma swa re swAhA/ brah+ma bi
335b2(rgyud): su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su
335b3(rgyud): skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
335b4(rgyud): de| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod
335b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni ba rA Ne/ ban+d+ha mA dan+te ma ti ti/ ti ti gau rI/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mA tang+gi/ par+Na le| hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni ma la ni/ da la mad de/ tsakra bA krA+ai/ sha ba ri/
335b6(rgyud): sha ba ri swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa/
335b7(rgyud): dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang /
336a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
336a2(rgyud): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos
336a3(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ d+hu ma pa ri hA re/ AR+ya pu sha ste/ shAn+ti/ ni rmuk+te/
336a4(rgyud): mang+ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he stu ste/ sta bi te swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung pa 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes
336a5(rgyud): bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tsha skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /
336a6(rgyud): de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom
336a7(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi bsrung ba chen/
336b1(rgyud): po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang
336b2(rgyud): byad stems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / se
336b3(rgyud): sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te/ sems ser snas bskor
336b4(rgyud): ba lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ AR+ya dze/ a ma ri/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye/ pu N+yai/ baR+ya ba te/ sarba pA paM/ pra sha ma nI ye swAhA/ AR+ya pu n+ya sau pA kI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom

336b6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag /gzhan yang / yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid
336b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
337a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang | 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzang dag /khyed skye bo mang po la phan
337a2(rgyud): pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su bzung ba'i phyir drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa
337a3(rgyud): legs so/ /legs so/ /phyogs rnams ni gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
337a4(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha
337a5(rgyud): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
337a6(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bla gos phrag pa
337a7(rgyud): gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
337b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs pa nye bar
337b2(rgyud): bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser
337b3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos
337b4(rgyud): smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang / yi ge thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems
337b5(rgyud): can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can
337b6(rgyud): du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis
337b7(rgyud): mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma
338a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchis par rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal par 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu

338a3(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/
338a4(rgyud): gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug long dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log
338a5(rgyud): 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang / sngags
338a6(rgyud): ni| 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi wang spr-i ka dang / /sha mya sha myi shI ri shA/ /in+d+ra hasta skal ba che/ /dzA ma shing tsha a ga ru/ /shi ri bista sra rtsi pog /gu gul ra sa sha
338a7(rgyud): la ki |rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / /tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang / /gi wang dang bcas ru rta dang / /gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang / /dbyi mong sug smel na la dang / /
338b1(rgyud): na ga ge sar u shi ra/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/ /skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi/ /phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/ /lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi//
338b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ su te kr-i te/ ka ma ta li/ na le dza na ka ra te/ haM ka ra te/ in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ra dri pa shad dri/ a brta ka /se ken ku tra ku/ ka bi la/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la
338b3(rgyud): ma ti| shI la ma ti/ san+d+hi/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi ta swAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/ /me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/ /gser gyi snod
338b4(rgyud): dang dngul snod du/ /mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/ /skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/ /bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi/ /rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/ /bum pa thogs pa
338b5(rgyud): gzhag par bgyi/ /rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/ /sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ /lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/ /bar bar
338b6(rgyud): dag tu me long gzhag / mda' dang mdung rtse sna sprad gzhag /de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi/ /de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/ /sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis//
338b7(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/ /sAd+ya the di na/ a ka ra ke /na ya ne/ hi le mi le/ gi le/ khi khi le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus
339a1(rgyud): @#/ /bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA/ phyogs bzhi
339a2(rgyud): dag na gang gnas pa'i/ /rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig /btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / /phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang / /'byung po'i khams rnams
339a3(rgyud): 'khrugs bgyid pa/ /'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sa me bi sha me swAhA/ sa ga Da/ bi ga De swAhA/ bi ga De ba te swAhA/ sA ga ra saM bud+d+hA ya swAhA/ skan+d+ha mA tA ya swAhA/
339a4(rgyud): nI la kat+thA ya swAhA/ a pa ra dzi ta/ biR+ya ya swAhA/ hI ma ban+d+ha saM bud+d+ha ya swAhA/ a ni bi la bak+t+rA ya swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ prah+mA Ne/ na ma swa ra swa t+yai/ mahA de byai sad+d+h+yan+tu maM/
339a5(rgyud): man+t+ra pa dA/ ta ra tu bi tsitaM/ prah+ma nu ma nu t+ya swAhA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus
339a6(rgyud): kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams
339a7(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par
339b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med
339b2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren
339b3(rgyud): gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can
339b4(rgyud): khyod| skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyi sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshigs 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs
339b5(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze
339b6(rgyud): kauN+Di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/ /rtser gnas mdzes
339b7(rgyud): ma dUr ba rtswa yis gos bskus pa/ /dUr ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon spang pa gcig gis gnas/ /lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ /sems can rnams la
340a1(rgyud): @#/ /dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod/ /s+yad ya the da na/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ hing+gu le/ ming+gu le/ ping+ga la ba ti/ mung+ga She/ ma ri ts+yai/
340a2(rgyud): swa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ta ma grI/ ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi ri tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ ma ri ts+yai/ pra na bri ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+The/ lo ka shreSh+The/ lo ka pre ya/ sid+d+hi pra te/ b+hI ma mu
340a3(rgyud): khi| shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ mahA na mu tsi/ mahA de byi/ pra ti grI hA/ na maska rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig /bstan
340a4(rgyud): bcos dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyu dang / sde snod dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ mahA pra b+ha be/ hi
340a5(rgyud): li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /kA ra te/ ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma te/ hi li mi li/ hi
340a6(rgyud): li mi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par
340a7(rgyud): bya'o| |gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi
340b1(rgyud): li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
340b2(rgyud): grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu chen po/
340b3(rgyud): khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs
340b4(rgyud): shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzungs
340b5(rgyud): 'di dang por su 'don pas/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag btsal te/ /'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang
340b6(rgyud): dam chos dang / /byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang / /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang / /rim gro gus
340b7(rgyud): par bsam byas te/ /zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la/ /mchod pa rgya chen bsham par bya/ /skye bo'i
341a1(rgyud): @#/ /rigs ni mang po la/ /snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya/ /bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing //
341a2(rgyud): bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis/ /dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i/ /de yi tshig don legs bsams te/ /stong nyid bsgrub la'ang gnas par byos/ /bcom
341a3(rgyud): ldan thams cad mngon sum du/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang / /gzugs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
341a4(rgyud): dpal mgur gsung chos kyis/ /dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul/ /ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing / /so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston//
341a5(rgyud): de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa la/ /rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di/ /smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes/ /chos
341a6(rgyud): rnams med par ston mdzad pa/ /ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la/ /de bsams smon lam tshad med 'grub/ /gang zhig
341a7(rgyud): dbyangs can mngon mchod dam/ /yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin/ /lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa/ /bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ye
341b1(rgyud): shes mchog sgrub ba'ang / /rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di zungs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing / /nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs/ /gang zhig nor
341b2(rgyud): sgrub nor dang ldan/ /khe dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnam grol bar/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /yon tan mang po tshad med
341b3(rgyud): dang | |bsam pa bzhin du kun grub pas/ /'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te/ /dkyil
341b4(rgyud): 'khor ci ran byas pa der/ /bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste/ /dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod/ /ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bre/ /phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan//
341b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod/ /lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du/ /zhag bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de/ /gal te lha de
341b6(rgyud): ma mthong na/ /bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas/ /de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na/ /gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te/ /tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la/ /

342a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na/ /zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ /yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na/ /mngon shes drug la
342a2(rgyud): sogs pa'ang thob/ /de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas 'di skad ces bshad pa thos nas dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad
342a3(rgyud): ces smras so/ /lha dang / mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la

342a5(rgyud): par| |sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas/ /de phyir bdag gis khyod la bstod/ /dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang / /thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa/ /
342a6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin/ /rtag tu dpal la brtson chen spyod/ /g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal/ /snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed/ /gshin rje'i
342a7(rgyud): sring mor lung ston cing / /rtag tu dar gos sngon po mnabs/ /mdzes dang mi mdzes kun sten cing / /sbyan mig sus mthong dwang ba skyed/ /spyod pa tshad med 'jig
342b1(rgyud): rten 'das/ /skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin/ /bar 'ga' ri dang brag la gnas/ /bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram/ /yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su/ /gnas de dag

342b6(rgyud): rgyal| |yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas/ /bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi/ /bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang / /rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas/ /drang
342b7(rgyud): srong lha mi dbang brnyes pas/ /sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed/ /lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang / /rgya mtsho ltad bzhin nges par 'du/ /gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams
343a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyis| |kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus/ /mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog /'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs/ /rgyal bo'i gnas na'ang
343a2(rgyud): pad+ma bzhin/ /chu bo la yang gru dang gzings/ /zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/ /mang du thos ldan rten yang byed/ /ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags/ /bsam pas

343a7(rgyud): cing | |'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang / /khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas/ /de las mchog pa'i sems can med/ /gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas//
343b1(rgyud): me yi dong du lhung gyur tam/ /chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las/ /'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad/ /rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang / /yang na dgra yis bsad par

343b6(rgyud): yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/ /dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir/ /mchog rab dag
343b7(rgyud): gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / /yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang / /dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang /

344a4(rgyud): rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang / /dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang / /lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas

344a6(rgyud): dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol/ /dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/ /yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/ /nang par langs nas gtsang
344a7(rgyud): mar brjod par bya/ /bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/ /dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la
344b1(rgyud): legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan

344b4(rgyud): med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med
344b5(rgyud): pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de des shing gus pa'i sems kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
344b6(rgyud): lo| |chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa dang /

345a2(rgyud): dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing gsung pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo / /bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste dzam+bu'i gling dang / rgyal
345a3(rgyud): chen bzhi dang / stong gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad

345b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo//
345b7(rgyud): don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod/ /bdag gis bsam
346a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa ci mchis pa/ /thams cad myur du grub par mdzod/ /nad med rtag tu bde ba dang / /tshe ring ba yang thob par shog /rig pa'i gnas
346a2(rgyud): la mkhas pa dang / /byang chub lam la brtson pa dang / /skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod/ /re ba thams cad myur du skongs/ /bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang / /
346a3(rgyud): bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa/ /dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni/ /bdag gi don de grub par mdzod/ /lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol/ /bdag gi tshig
346a4(rgyud): la thogs med mdzod/ /lus dang ngag dang myur zhugs shing / /yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag gi lce yi dbang po la/ /bde gshegs spobs
346a5(rgyud): pa ldan par mdzod/ /tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni/ /sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/ /bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa/ /don de thams cad grub
346a6(rgyud): par shog / tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing / /byed pa thams cad chud ma gzon/ /nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/ /don de grub par ma gyur na/ /lha
346a7(rgyud): mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni/ /thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra
346b1(rgyud): bcom pa dag dang / /byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang / /shA ri'i bu dang maud gal dang / /bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste/ /de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang / /thams
346b2(rgyud): cad bdag la grub par shog / sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang / /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drang gi/ /bdag gi re ba bskang ba'i phyir/ /thams cad myur du
346b3(rgyud): gshegs par mdzod/ /yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa/ /thams cad slu ba med par shog /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad
346b4(rgyud): dang | |tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang / /tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang / /stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang / /mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo
346b5(rgyud): dang | |de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing / /brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod/ /
346b6(rgyud): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang / /byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang / /'thang
346b7(rgyud): bral gyi ni lha rnams dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang / /gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang / /sa chu me rlung lha dag
347a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang | |ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang / /chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang / /de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / /zur phud lnga can nor rgyas
347a2(rgyud): dang | |nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / /'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas/ /de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad/ /sdig pa'i
347a3(rgyud): las la ma mos pha/ /sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma/ /bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams/ /dri za dang ni lha ma yin/ /gzhan
347a4(rgyud): yang mi'am ci dag dang / /lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams/ /kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni/ /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs rjes brtse ba'i
347a5(rgyud): dgongs pa yis/ /bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed/ /lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyi/ /gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams/ /kun gyi mthu yis byin

347b1(rgyud): po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing
347b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs shing ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

347b4(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de skad smras pa dang / bram ze kauN+Di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te thal mo sbyar
347b5(rgyud): ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo/ khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su srung
347b6(rgyud): zhing yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa

349b1(rgyud): so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha mo/ khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams

353a7(rgyud): don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos smra
353b1(rgyud): bde dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na
353b2(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang /
353b3(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa
353b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/ gzi byin dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs
353b5(rgyud): chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i '+dzam+bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po gzi byin
353b6(rgyud): dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ rgya chen
353b7(rgyud): por yang 'gyur ro/ /sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba dag
354a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan
354a2(rgyud): dang | gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang /
354a3(rgyud): 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa sa las 'byung ba sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu
354a4(rgyud): des na sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
354a5(rgyud): bsti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe
354a6(rgyud): sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
354a7(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi
354b1(rgyud): khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du/ 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so/ /de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis
354b2(rgyud): mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo / /bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so/ /deng bdag cag
354b3(rgyud): gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul las yongs su
354b4(rgyud): thar te/ deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes
354b5(rgyud): gtam zer bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim tha dad pa gnas par 'gyur ba de dag sems can gzhan dag la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig
354b6(rgyud): tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming
354b7(rgyud): ngam| de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par
355a1(rgyud): @#/ /bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
355a2(rgyud): gang dang / gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la
355a3(rgyud): gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam rgyud brjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang /
355a4(rgyud): shin tu snum par 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs de dang / de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par
355a5(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /nor che ba dang / longs spyod
355a6(rgyud): che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sa'i lha
355a7(rgyud): mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sa'i lha mo/ sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan
355b1(rgyud): na| de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris kyi nang du lha'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i lha mo/ sems can gang la
355b2(rgyud): la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir gnas de dag legs par brgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam /
355b3(rgyud): ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo/ rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i
355b4(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten
355b5(rgyud): 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun
355b6(rgyud): bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo
355b7(rgyud): brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos
356a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi ston gyi 'og logs kyi sa phyogs de dang / de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
356a2(rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
356a3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
356a4(rgyud): phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i
356a5(rgyud): dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
356a6(rgyud): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba
356a7(rgyud): de'i rkang pa yan lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi'o/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la sngags
356b1(rgyud): kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang / mi thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis
356b2(rgyud): bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang / nor dang / nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / sman bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa
356b3(rgyud): dang | phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te khrus byas gos sar pa bgos te/ rtswa
356b4(rgyud): bting ba'i steng du 'dug nas sku gzugs ring bsrel can gyi mdun nam/ mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / zhal zas sna tshogs
356b5(rgyud): kyis mchod de skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i tshes brgyad la sems rtse gcig gis gzungs sngags 'di bzlas pas spyan drangs par 'gyur te/ sngags la/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li
356b6(rgyud): tsi li| tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu/ to Tu to Tu/ ba ha ba ha/ ba ri she/ ba ri she swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis bdag spyan drang
356b7(rgyud): ba'i phyir sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag de'i gan du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang la la zhig bdag dang
357a1(rgyud): @#/ /mjal zhing smra bar 'tshal na/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ any+tsa ni kya li k+Sha ni/ shi shi
357a2(rgyud): d+ha ri| ha ha/ hi hi/ ku ru ba re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na de'i mdun du lus bstan te
357a3(rgyud): nges par bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /gang sngags 'di zlos par 'dod pas/ sngar lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod do/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ bA
357a4(rgyud): sha ka ti/ ta ti/ kuT+Ti/ pU ta/ pU te ri/ pU te ri Ti Te/ ba Ti ku ku Ti/ ka ba tsi li swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe tshon skud sna lnga la sngags
357a5(rgyud): lan re gdab cing mdud pa re re bcing ngo / /de 'dra ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsal te
357a6(rgyud): lus bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas na/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi tshig 'di mi slu bar ni sangs
357a7(rgyud): rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams bdag la mngon du gzigs shing dgongs par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan
357b1(rgyud): 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /gang khyod kyis bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang / chos smra ba de la bsrung
357b2(rgyud): ba byas pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /de'i phyir khyod kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
357b3(rgyud): rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
357b4(rgyud): po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
357b5(rgyud): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/
357b6(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam /
357b7(rgyud): pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur bar der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
358a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman
358a2(rgyud): ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang /
358a3(rgyud): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am

358a7(rgyud): kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rigs
358b1(rgyud): de dag dang / khyim de dag dang / grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de dag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar
358b2(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa

358b4(rgyud): kyis mngon sum lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to/ /chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to/ /chos thams cad khong
