358b6(rgyud): pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rigs gang dag lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
358b7(rgyud): 'das/ chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ye shes kyi gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis
359a1(rgyud): @#/ /mi khyab bo/ /ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul
359a2(rgyud): 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongs su brtags
359a3(rgyud): pa dang / yang dag pa yongs su 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par rnam par blta ba dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
359a4(rgyud): bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan par bgyi
359a5(rgyud): ba'i slad du spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
359a6(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi slad du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gser
359a7(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od
359b1(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur
359b2(rgyud): ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam
359b3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
359b4(rgyud): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal
359b5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du de'i spu'i bu ga rnams su gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de'i lus la mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed
359b6(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o/ /de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /de cher spro bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
359b7(rgyud): chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la gzungs sngags shig mchis pa 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
360a1(rgyud): @#/ /snying brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o/ /sngags la/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo
360a2(rgyud): d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo brah+ma ya/ na mo in+d+ra ya/ na maHtsa tu ra NAM/ mahA rA dzA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ gau ri/ mahA gau ri/ san+d+ha ri/ /
360a3(rgyud): mahA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi Di/ mahA dri mi Di/ daN+Da khu khun+ta/ ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi/ hu hu hu hu/ ha lo d+ha me/ gu d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tsa/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu tsu/ tsaN+De shwa ra/
360a4(rgyud): shi kha ra/ shi kha ra/ ut+ti Sh+Thi he b+ha ga bAn/ saM bid dz+nyA ya swAhA/ gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bdag gis de la 'tsho ba'i yo byad
360a5(rgyud): bsod snyoms dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nor dang / rin po che la sogs pa thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig bu pho mo
360a6(rgyud): smos pa dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan la sogs pa'i yo byad 'dod na'ang bdag gis de la yid bzhin
360a7(rgyud): du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir gang gsang sngags 'di zlos pa'i tshe/ bdag myur du de'i gan
360b1(rgyud): du mchis te ci'ang thogs pa med par 'grub par bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ thog mar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyis
360b2(rgyud): gzugs/ srid chags bzhi pa'am/ lnga pa lag na dgra sta thogs pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i grwa bzhir sbrang rtsi'am/ bu ram chus
360b3(rgyud): gang ba'i bum pa bzhi zhogs la/ byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug pa bsreg cing me tog gi phreng bas kyang mchod par bgyi'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun
360b4(rgyud): du sbyin sreg gi thab khung brkos pa la dud pa med pa'i nang du mar dang / yungs kar du bsres la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing thab de'i nang du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
360b5(rgyud): de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pa dang / bdag de la lus mngon par ston te/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags grub pa des kyang ci 'dod pa de
360b6(rgyud): la smos shig dang / ci 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /gang gser dngul 'dod pa dang / gter tshol bar 'dod pa dang / lha'i drang srong 'dod pa'ang
360b7(rgyud): 'grub ste nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /gzhan yang / lha'i mig dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed
361a1(rgyud): @#/ /do| |sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang bsgyur zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyun bcad de rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur
361a2(rgyud): ro| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod spyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la legs so zhes bka' stsal te legs so/ /legs so/ /gang khyod
361a3(rgyud): kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras pas bsod nams
361a4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste
361a5(rgyud): bcu dgu pa'o/ / //de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba de 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
361a6(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas / thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang yul 'khor na mi'i rgyal po byed pas
361a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos mi spyod na/ yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang / rang gi lus rgyal thabs mthon po'i sa na yun ring por gnas
361b1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das/ thugs rje dang ldan pas rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par gsol/ de thos
361b2(rgyud): pas mi'i rgyal po rnams chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang / yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag
361b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang yongs su bde par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i tshogs kyi nang na sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sa'i
361b4(rgyud): lha mo| khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon cig / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya
361b5(rgyud): ba de| spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ yab mchog gi rgyal po dbang po'i tog las blangs pa/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i
361b6(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des lo nyi khri'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te tha na sems kyi skad
361b7(rgyud): cig gcig tsam gyis tshod kyang sngon chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so/ /bu| rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig
362a1(rgyud): @#/ /ces bya ba de gang zhe na/ de nas/ rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya bas bu rgyal po mdzes
362a2(rgyud): pa'i tog la rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /sems can
362a3(rgyud): kun la phan byed pa/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/ /nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/ /rgyal po thams
362a4(rgyud): cad so so nas/ /dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la/ /lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun/ /thal mo sbyar te nyan par byos/ /rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang
362a5(rgyud): 'dir/ /lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na/ /tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs/ /khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste/ /khyod ni lha
362a6(rgyud): rnams dbang phyug lags/ /khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod/ /bdag cag dogs pa bcad du gsol/ /mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la/ /ji lta bur ni lha zhes
362a7(rgyud): bgyi| |gang gis rgyus na rgyal po la/ /lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur/ /gal te lha ni ji lta bur/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes shing / /mi bdag gyur te
362b1(rgyud): mi rnams la/ /rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur/ /'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la/ /de skad yongs su dris pa dang / /lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des/ /'jig rten
362b2(rgyud): skyong la 'di skad smras/ /de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis/ /de ltar bdag la dris pas na/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bstan bcos dam pa kho bos
362b3(rgyud): bstan/ /mi yi gnas su skyes pa ni/ /rgyal po rnams kyi skye bo dang / /rgyu gang gis na yul rnams su/ /rgyal bor 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /lha dbang rnams kyi
362b4(rgyud): byin brlabs kyi/ /ma yi rum du 'jug gyur te/ /lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas/ /phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni/ /mi yi
362b5(rgyud): dbang por gyur ba yin/ /lha las skyes par gyur pas na/ /de ni lha yi sras zhes bya/ /khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis/ /rgyal po'i
362b6(rgyud): skal ba byin nas ni/ /mi rnams la ni dbang por sprul/ /nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa/ /chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang / /sems can legs byed dgod pa
362b7(rgyud): dang | |lha yi gnas su dgye ba'i phyir/ /mi yi dbang po mi shas dang / /lha yis shas dang dri za'i shas/ /gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyis/ /nyes par byed
363a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa zlog par byed/ /legs par bya ba byed rnams la/ /mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas/ /rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /lha yi rgyal
363a2(rgyud): por byin gyis brlabs/ /tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang / /nyes pa byas pa'i las rnams kyi/ /rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /lha yis rgyal por byin
363a3(rgyud): gyis brlabs/ /yul ni nye byas gnas pa dag /gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing / /sdig pa can gyi skye bo la/ /mthun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing / /nyes par
363a4(rgyud): byed pa yal bor ba/ /de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel/ /'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang / /yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir 'byung / /sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na//
363a5(rgyud): lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur/ /yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag /gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/ /de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad pa/ /drag po rnams kyis yul
363a6(rgyud): 'joms 'gyur/ /pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su/ /yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig /longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig /gang gi nor bsags
363a7(rgyud): yod pa yang / /g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis/ /phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/ /bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid/ /bya ba de ni mi byed na/ /glang chen dbang
363b1(rgyud): pos rdzing bu bzhin/ /rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig /ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing / /ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs
363b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rgyal pos yal bar bor na der/ /sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras/ /legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing / /mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yul na nyes
363b3(rgyud): byed gnas pa dag / gang tshe rgyal pos yal por na/ /de tshe lha rnams khang pa na/ /yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha rgyal dbang po de dag kun/ /rgyal de chos dang mi
363b4(rgyud): ldan de/ /chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes/ /phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par/ /lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur/ /
363b5(rgyud): lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas nas/ /de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig /yul du chos min 'byung gyur zhing / /mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /g.yon rnams
363b6(rgyud): dang ni 'thab mo dang / /nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha dbang rnams ni rab khros shing / /lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor/ /yul 'khor de ni
363b7(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur/ /rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed/ /spun nam yang na bu yang rung / /sdug pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral/ /yang na
364a1(rgyud): @#/ /bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur/ /skar ma dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung / /pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang / /
364a2(rgyud): mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yis glang po phangs pa dang / /blon po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rnga mo ni/ /phangs pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur//
364a3(rgyud): khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang / /phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/ /yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis/ /phan tshun du ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /'thab mo dag
364a4(rgyud): dang rtsod dang g.yo/ /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing / /mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung / /de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas
364a5(rgyud): kyang | |chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/ /de yi 'khor dang blon po yang / /chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/ /chos dang mi ldan skye bo la/ /de yi 'og tu mchod
364a6(rgyud): byed 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la/ /rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ /chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur/ /chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na/ /
364a7(rgyud): der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung / /rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur/ /chos min skye bo bzung bas na/ /dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs/ /sems can
364b1(rgyud): mdangs dang sa yi bcud/ /dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig /skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing / /skye bo dam ba smad pas na/ /'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang / /rnam pa
364b2(rgyud): gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur/ /'bras bu lo tog ro dang mdangs/ /de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/ /sems can nad pa mang po dag /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar
364b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag /yul rnams na ni yod pa yang / /kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang / /chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur/ /rtse dang dgod dang dga' ba
364b4(rgyud): dang | |sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag / dga' ba nyams shing mi dga' 'gyur/ /nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs/ /lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi/ /
364b5(rgyud): snum dngos khu ba zad pas na/ /lus dang khams dang dbang po la/ /de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams ni mdog ngan cing / /mthu chung shin tu rid
364b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/ /tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang / /de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/ /sems can
364b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus nyams pa dag / yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi/ /sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /srin po sna
365a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshogs las gyur ba'i/ /gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos min phyogs la rab gnas te/ /rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas//
365a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na/ /khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te/ /nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/ /
365a3(rgyud): 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha dbang rnams kyis dgos gang phyir/ /rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /rgyal po nyid
365a4(rgyud): ni mi byed cing / /nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni/ /legs par byas pas sems can rnams/ /lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye/ /nyes par byas pas yi dwags
365a5(rgyud): dang | |sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye/ /gang tshe rgyal po'i yul rnams na/ /nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas/ /nyes
365a6(rgyud): par byas pas ltung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na/ /de ni bu yang ma yin la/ /lha yi rgyal po pha rnams kyi/ /gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur/ /
365a7(rgyud): g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas/ /gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba/ /de phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis/ /mi'i gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/ /nyes
365b1(rgyud): par byas pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /legs par byed la 'jud pa ste/ /tshe 'di la ni sems can la/ /yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin/ /legs byas
365b2(rgyud): dang ni nyes byas kyi/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras/ /rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir/ /byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang / /
365b3(rgyud): yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /lha tshogs rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs/ /lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang / /yul 'khor dag na skye bo ni/ /sdig can g.yon can
365b4(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / /yul gyi don gyi chos kyi phyir/ /srog kyang rgyal srid rnams kyang btab/ /chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing / /shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni/ /yul
365b5(rgyud): na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ /de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /ji ltar g.yo rnams 'byung ba la/ /g.yo byed chad par ma bcad na/ /yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /
365b6(rgyud): g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /glang chen rnams kyis rdzing chen bzhin/ /yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig /lha dbang rnams kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /lha yi
365b7(rgyud): gnas ni rnam par 'jig / yul du dngos po thams cad ni/ /ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na/ /de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams/ /nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar
366a1(rgyud): @#/ /bya| |chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang ba bya/ /chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya/ /srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing / /nyes mgon bya bar mi bya'o//
366a2(rgyud): skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan/ /yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la/ /rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya yi/ /phyogs su lhung bar gyur ta re/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan
366a3(rgyud): pa yi| |grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na/ /lha yi dbang po dgar gyur te/ /dzam+bu'i gling na nged kyi bu/ /'di ltar chos ldan
366a4(rgyud): rgyal po yin/ /chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas/ /legs par 'byung la skye bo bkod/ /rgyal po de ni legs byed pas/ /skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de/ /
366a5(rgyud): lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/ /lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo/ /chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas/ /rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'/ /lha dbang rab tu dwang
366a6(rgyud): gyur pas/ /mi yi rgyal po de la srung / /nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du/ /rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ /rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing / /char yang dus su 'bab
366a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du/ /yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed/ /lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/ /lha yi gnas rnams gang bar byed/ /de
366b1(rgyud): lta bas na rgyal po yis/ /bdag gi phangs pa'i srog btang gi /gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur ba/ /dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste/ /yon tan rnams kyis gang
366b2(rgyud): brgyan pa/ /chos dang ldan pa bsten par bya/ /rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba/ /rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs/ /chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/ /chos kyang yang
366b3(rgyud): dag bstan par bya/ /legs par byed la sems can dgod/ /nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya/ /gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams/ /tshul bzhin gdul bar byed pa'i
366b4(rgyud): tshe| |yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing / /rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong / /gser
366b5(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //bam po dgu pa/ de
366b6(rgyud): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang che 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa
366b7(rgyud): rnams dang / /gling bzhir rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang / /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ /gang sngon yid
367a1(rgyud): @#/ /du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi/ /dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med/ /bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang / /ji ltar sngon gyi bskal
367a2(rgyud): pa bsam yas na/ /rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i/ /bstan la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal
367a3(rgyud): po byung / /de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur/ /rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston/ /rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na/ /de tshe rgyal po
367a4(rgyud): dam pa gnyid kyis log / rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos/ /chos smra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na/ /rnam pa lhang nger mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/ /
367a5(rgyud): rab tu 'chad cing 'dug ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sad/ /de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/ /mgu nas rgyal po
367a6(rgyud): khab nas sngon byung ste/ /nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnas su song / /rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing / /'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni
367a7(rgyud): rin chen sogs/ /yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces/ /chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris/ /de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni/ /phug
367b1(rgyud): gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la/ /kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug /dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de/ /phun
367b2(rgyud): sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing / /phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur pa/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan/ /'di na chos smra rin chen sogs pa 'di/ /rgyal
367b3(rgyud): po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste/ /gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston/ /rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag btsal te/ /rgyal po
367b4(rgyud): legs par byung bas 'di skad smras/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal/ /zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol/ /rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid
367b5(rgyud): la| |rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na/ /stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de tshe mi yi dbang po sa
367b6(rgyud): phyogs ni/ /gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der/ /rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btab/ /me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas/ /rgyal pos
367b7(rgyud): khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / /dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan/ /rgyal pos khri der tsan+dan dam pa dag /rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par
368a1(rgyud): @#/ /gtor/ /lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci/ /gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye ches/ /lha yi me tog man dA ra ba'i char/ /khri de
368a2(rgyud): la ni mngon par rab tu phab/ /chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong / /bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa/ /rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na//
368a3(rgyud): sa la me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor/ /chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang / /shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos te/ /khri der nye bar song bar
368a4(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang btsal/ /lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams/ /bar snang 'dus nas me tog man dA ra'i/ /char pa 'bebs shing
368a5(rgyud): sil snyan brgya stong phrag / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs/ /rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des/ /phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong /
368a6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas/ /de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par gyur/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni/ /snying rje'i sems kyang
368a7(rgyud): yang dag bskyed byas te/ /rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni/ /de yi tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te/ /rgyal po thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su/ /tshig gcig gis ni
368b1(rgyud): rjes su yi rang ste/ /chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung / /de yi lus la dga' bas khyab par gyur/ /mdo sde 'di las chod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /de tshe rgyal po legs
368b2(rgyud): par byung ba yis/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs/ /sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang / /gang yang
368b3(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams/ /bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor bu rin po che'i/ /char pa de ring 'dzam bu'i gling du phob/ /de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang / /
368b4(rgyud): dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog /de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang / /gling bzhi dag tu rab tu bab par gyur/ /rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling
368b5(rgyud): du| |rin chen char pa bab pa de mthong nas/ /gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni/ /rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
368b6(rgyud): pa nga | |rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur/ /gling bzhi dag na rin chen gang bcas kyi/ /sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang / /gang gis rgyal po legs par
368b7(rgyud): byung de la/ /de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to/ /ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos
369a1(rgyud): @#/ /shing | |tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/ /ngas ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang / /chos nyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas/ /gser gyi
369a2(rgyud): mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/ /blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes la/ /lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa/ /skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu
369a3(rgyud): thob| |bskal pa de ni bye ba brgya stong phrag / dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'khor los bsgyur rgyal gyur/ /bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang / /ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po
369a4(rgyud): myong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de yin no/ /gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i/ /
369a5(rgyud): stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas/ /ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang ba/ /bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang / /bsam pa ji bzhin ngas
369a6(rgyud): ni byang chub thob/ /chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa
369a7(rgyud): gcig pa'o/ / //dpal ldan lha mo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang / da ltar byung ba'i
369b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing 'das pa dang /
369b2(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
369b3(rgyud): dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der des gdon mi za bar
369b4(rgyud): g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid
369b5(rgyud): 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing / /
369b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ /zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pa/ /gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam/ /gang na gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde'i dam pa 'di ston
369b7(rgyud): pa| |sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya/ /mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las/ /sems can thams
370a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad thar bar byed/ /mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang / /dbus dang de bzhin mtha' ma mthong / /mdo sde dbang po rab zab ste/ /'di la dpe ni yod ma
370a2(rgyud): yin| |gang gA dang ni sa rnams dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la/ /gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung / /dper bya bar ni mi nus so/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa
370a3(rgyud): yis| |de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/ /chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni/ /zab mor rab bstan gang yin pa/ /mchod rten de yi dbus na ni/ /rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong / /
370a4(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston/ /grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par/ /lha dag dang ni mi rnams
370a5(rgyud): kyi| |bde ba dag ni rjes su myong / /gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa/ /de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po bsam yas bsgrub snyam du/ /de tshe des ni de ltar
370a6(rgyud): shes/ /mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yis/ /dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing / /tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas/ /mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa/ /gtsug
370a7(rgyud): lag khang ngam gnas khang du/ /zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/ /sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur/ /rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar gnod
370b1(rgyud): pa dang / /byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang / /zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/ /thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni/ /rmi lam bstan pa ci
370b2(rgyud): 'dra ba/ /der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri/ /de lta bu yang bshams par bya/ /khri de la ni 'dug nas su/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan/ /yi ger bris pa bklag par bya/ /

370b4(rgyud): smra ba yi gzugs su yang / /des na res 'ga' snang bar gyur/ /res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/ /res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang / /res 'ga' kun

371a1(rgyud): @#/ /zlog par byed/ /pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms/ /g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed/ /rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed/ /sdig pa

371a3(rgyud): gang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par

371b1(rgyud): dag |thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang / /phan tshun du ni smre byed pa/ /bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag /bsags
371b2(rgyud): pa de dag kun la bltos/ /gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di/ /nyan pa'i don du 'dir lhags pa/ /mi de dag ni rab sbyangs pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhags so/ /

373b3(rgyud): brgyar ni tshang ba yi/ /'og tu sa yi bcud song ste/ /de ni phyir yang log nas su/ /sa yi steng dag snum par byed/ /mdo sde mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /lha rnams

374b6(rgyud): rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang / gang bgyis shing bsags pas skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
374b7(rgyud): gnas nas lhags te bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i

375a2(rgyud): du snang ba zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
375a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha
375a4(rgyud): dang | mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /ji
375a5(rgyud): tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs
375a6(rgyud): de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ste de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs
375a7(rgyud): p a de'i mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
375b1(rgyud): gser dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
375b2(rgyud): dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs
375b3(rgyud): p a de'i mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
375b4(rgyud): 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
375b5(rgyud): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od zer du snang ba'i
375b6(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de
375b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi
376a1(rgyud): @#/ /brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri bo de dag ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po cher yang ma gyur/ sngon pha rol
376a2(rgyud): tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyad skad kyang mi gda'/ rkang pa dang / mig dang / lag pa dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo phangs
376a3(rgyud): pa dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
376a4(rgyud): byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / rin po che rnams sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang /
376a5(rgyud): mal cha dang / stan dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/
376a6(rgyud): glang po che dang / ba lang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran pho dang / bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
376a7(rgyud): b ye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung bstan pa ma
376b1(rgyud): t hob kyi bar du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du
376b2(rgyud): ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dag dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bgyis/ yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba'i

376b5(rgyud): dang | byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram rnams yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su btang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang /

377a1(rgyud): @#/ /bgyid/ rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs par bgyis nas bde ba 'bum phrag mang po'ang 'byor par 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom
377a2(rgyud): ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag bcom
377a3(rgyud): l dan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa

377a5(rgyud): n a med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
377a6(rgyud): khri 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang /

378a1(rgyud): @#/ /yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te de'i phyir lung bstan pas rjes su ston to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
378a2(rgyud): bsags pa 'di dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag /da ltar bla na med pa yang dag

378b2(rgyud): pa na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba/ chos can chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis rgyal srid skyong gi /chos ma yin pas ma yin te yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
378b3(rgyud): kyi pha mar gyur pa lta bu zhig byung ngo / /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba/ sman pa gso bar byed pa khams

378b7(rgyud): dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na sems can 'bum phrag du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing / nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir te sdug bsngal mi

380a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bgyi/ /gang gis mi la gnod gyur pas/ /rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo/ /gang gi dus na mkhris pa g.yo/ /bad kan gang gis dus na g.yo//

380b1(rgyud): su de bzhin 'dus pa ste/ /bad kan shas che'i nad ni dpyid ldang ngo / /dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa skyur ba'i ro/ /ston ni mngar dang snum dang bsil bag go /dgun ni mngar dang skyur

382a2(rgyud): de sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams dag kyang byed de tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la'ang tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig /

382b2(rgyud): der rgyug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang / sbyang ki nas/ bya'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyam mo/ /de nas yang 'di snyam
382b3(rgyud): du sems te bdag khyi dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / khwa dang / bya rnams phyogs gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi lha mo//
382b4(rgyud): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song nas 'brog khong khong na rdzing zhig ga la yod pa der phyin to/ /rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig
382b5(rgyud): gnas te des der nya brgya phrag mang po zhig chu dang bral bar mthong nas des de la snying rje ba'i sems skyes pa dang / de na lha mo shing las lus phyed tsam phyung
382b6(rgyud): ba zhig mthong ste lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes
382b7(rgyud): bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu byin cig / rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste gang chu 'bebs pa dang / gang chu sbyin pa'o/ /de bas na rang

383a2(rgyud): mos smras pa nya khri tha ma pa'o/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs cher mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes so/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe
383a3(rgyud): ' brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing bu chen po de na chu'i lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te de nas nya khri 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug
383a4(rgyud): cing rnam par rgyug go / rigs kyi lha mo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir rgyugs pa dang / nya khri po de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u
383a5(rgyud): chu 'bebs gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de logs su chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar ba lta'o/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis
383a6(rgyud): phyogs bzhir brgyugs te chu btsal kyang der chu ma snyed nas phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / des ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang
383a7(rgyud): p o zhig mthong nas shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te shing gi yal ga rnams bcad nas shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste
383b1(rgyud): phyin pa dang / shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i gri ba mar byas so/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs
383b2(rgyud): rdzing der chu 'bab pa tshol te gang nas chu 'bab ces de phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang chu ma rnyed nas der myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi srol du song ste/ rigs kyi lha mo/
383b3(rgyud): 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing der chu 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i chu klung chen po de las der chu 'bab pa'i klung de'ang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems
383b4(rgyud): can zhig gis nya khri po de dag gi phyir ci nas kyang nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur bu de lta bu'i phyogs kyi grog po chen por klung de phab bo/ /des de mthong

384a2(rgyud): r dzing zhig mchis pa de na nya khri zhig gnas pa chab dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdugs shing mchis te ji ltar mi rnams la stsal ba ltar ci nas dud

384b1(rgyud): rgyab tu chu bkal te myur ba myur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu

384b6(rgyud): gi khyim du myur ba myur bar song ste mes po tshong dpon la/ kye mes po/ chu 'bebs kyi mchid nas khyim 'di na pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / bran pho dang /

385a1(rgyud): @#/ /shig ces mchi'o zhes de skad gyis shig /de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che de la zhon nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu

385b6(rgyud): kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/

391a3(rgyud): blo gros ldan rnams phyir zhing rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni/ /spro brtan mos dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong

391a5(rgyud): bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag tshol cig /de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag btsal to/ /de nas
391a6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams
391a7(rgyud): cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa lags na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas
391b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ rus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag
391b2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang /
391b3(rgyud): stobs du ma dang ldan pa/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de sgra chen po dang / lha
391b4(rgyud): chen po dang / snying stobs chen po'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la
391b5(rgyud): chags shing me tog 'dod pas phan tshun du rgyu ste nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams
391b6(rgyud): kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun du dong ste kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis
391b7(rgyud): la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis bsad du 'ong gi tshur shog /lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa /
392a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni ma mchis na skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/ /snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags
392a2(rgyud): khrod dben pa 'dir/ /bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/ /shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/ /bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur//
392a3(rgyud): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la

392a7(rgyud): sha sar pa dang / khrag dron mo yod na de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/ /lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs
392b1(rgyud): ma 'di bkres pa dang / skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad gcig lus te rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi
392b2(rgyud): nus na 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu / sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye/ rang gi lus yongs
392b3(rgyud): su btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o/ /snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang / lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya
392b4(rgyud): dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lags so/ /

392b6(rgyud): kyis ni/ /'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis gtse/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas
392b7(rgyud): nas song ngo / /de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te da ni bdag gis lus 'di yongs su btang ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes

394b1(rgyud): tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang / /za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste lam

395b1(rgyud): ba lta zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyi bzang mo/ mya ngan ma byed cig /der gzhon nu tshol ba la

406a7(rgyud): mnyan par byed na ni/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags kun gyi gnad pa dang / /shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba/ /de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur//

406b2(rgyud): rany+dza nar gnas pa dang / /'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang / /sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang / /klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni/ /
406b3(rgyud): mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang / /de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams/ /sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang / /bcas te de dag der lhags nas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo
406b4(rgyud): mi g.yel bar/ /de dag la ni srung bar byed/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /bskal ba bya bar rnyed dka' ba/ /mdo 'di rab tu
406b5(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang / /gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang / /gang su rjes su yi rang dang / /gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams/ /de dag lha dang klu
406b6(rgyud): dag dang / /mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ /bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/ /srog chags bsod nams med pa rnams/ /de dag
406b7(rgyud): bsod nams phung po ni/ /mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin zab mor
407a1(rgyud): @#/ /sbyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /rab tu gzung bar 'gyur pa yin/ /gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/ /
407a2(rgyud): dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing / /byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ /g.yel ba med par mchod par bya/ /rang gi sems ni dri med cing / /rgya che bar yang
407a3(rgyud): rab byed la/ /sems kyang shin tu dwang byed kyis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni/ /de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs/ /mi yi

407a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // yang de'i

407b1(rgyud): gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas de'ang 'di snyam du sems te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang

409b3(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ /

409b6(rgyud): sku tshe'i tshad mi nus/ /gal te la las nam mkha' la/ /sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang / /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /rdzogs
409b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs/ /bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces/ /grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo / /gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni/ /

413b7(rgyud): bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //nub
414a1(rgyud): @#/ /gcig g.yel ba med par yang / /bdag gis rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ /thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od//
414a2(rgyud): nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar/ /kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste/ /phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur/ /kun tu rin chen shing drung na/ /rin chen bai DUR+ya dag gi/
414a3(rgyud): khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ /brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/ /'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong / /bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig /rnga chen
414a4(rgyud): rab tu brdung ba mthong / /de yis de la brdungs pa dang / /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung / /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stong gsum 'jig
414a5(rgyud): rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad
414a6(rgyud): 'di yis ni/ /'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig /ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs
414a7(rgyud): dang bral bar shog / ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan
414b1(rgyud): lag gi / yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas
414b2(rgyud): byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog / chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos
414b3(rgyud): kyang ston gyur cig / nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig /sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas
414b4(rgyud): te| |rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog /sems can
414b5(rgyud): kun gyis che rabs brgya dag dang / /skye ba stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing / /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog /
414b6(rgyud): rnga po che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog /bya ba dge ba rnams
414b7(rgyud): ni spyod gyur cig / mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag
415a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cig /sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar/ /

415a3(rgyud): can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog /rten med dpung gnyen
415a4(rgyud): med pa dang / /skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag /de rnams la ni skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig /sangs rgyas rkang
415a5(rgyud): gnyis dam pa dag / thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol//
415a6(rgyud): bdag gi sngon chad sdig pa'i las/ /shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par
415a7(rgyud): bgyi| |pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang / /dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa/ /
415b1(rgyud): phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang / /bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis

415b4(rgyud): sems dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang / /mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang / /nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /

421b1(rgyud): bcings pa dkrol bar shog / sdug bsngal rnams las myur du thar gyur cig /sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / /gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams ni/ /

421b6(rgyud): pos rtag tu de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas
421b7(rgyud): ma yin/ /gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
422a1(rgyud): @#/ /las| bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa
422a2(rgyud): chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i

422a5(rgyud): rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag /sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams
422a6(rgyud): kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung / /bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung
422a7(rgyud): ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/ /ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing

428b6(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i

429a1(rgyud): @#/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po'i yul de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung

429a3(rgyud): pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa

431b1(rgyud): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od

435b1(rgyud): la 'ang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par
435b2(rgyud): bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang / bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen pos
435b3(rgyud): dga' bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka'

442a1(rgyud): @#/ /par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi mjed kyi

442b1(rgyud): par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su
442b2(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun
442b3(rgyud): tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o//
442b4(rgyud): yul de'ang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig
442b5(rgyud): mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po de dge slong dang / dge slong
442b6(rgyud): ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ mchod
442b7(rgyud): pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim
443a1(rgyud): @#/ /gro mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi bskyed/
443a2(rgyud): bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
443a3(rgyud): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
443a4(rgyud): gis yul de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha rnams kyis yul
443a5(rgyud): de yal bar bar bor na yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can
443a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ rdzogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul
443a7(rgyud): du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba
443b1(rgyud): de'ang nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang / zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod
443b2(rgyud): pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang sgra 'byin par grag par
443b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms
443b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
443b5(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar
443b6(rgyud): bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i
443b7(rgyud): rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /bde ba thams
444a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar
444a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid
444a3(rgyud): bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/
444a4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
444a5(rgyud): nam| dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gro bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
444a6(rgyud): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus
444a7(rgyud): 'di dag gi gzi chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo
444b1(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs
444b2(rgyud): ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis
444b3(rgyud): sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag las ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags
444b4(rgyud): pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
444b5(rgyud): du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
444b6(rgyud): rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so/ /ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
444b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na
445a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnod pa dang / dgram mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de
445a2(rgyud): dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
445a3(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron me chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad
445a4(rgyud): lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma
445a5(rgyud): dang | 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po
445a6(rgyud): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la
445a7(rgyud): gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang /
445b1(rgyud): mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
445b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
445b3(rgyud): lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de lta na
445b4(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs
445b5(rgyud): rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na
445b6(rgyud): med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
445b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling
446a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag
446a2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
446a3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad
446a4(rgyud): do| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par
446a5(rgyud): bgyi| gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
446a6(rgyud): to| |de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim
446a7(rgyud): gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dang / dge slong dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
446b1(rgyud): bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs
446b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo
446b3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems
446b4(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
446b5(rgyud): bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab par bya/ yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
446b6(rgyud): 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
446b7(rgyud): stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgros nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i
447a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba zla ba dri
447a2(rgyud): ma med pa'i sku/ /rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ /rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshoms/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho
447a3(rgyud): lta bu ste/ /rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang / /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang / /rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor
447a4(rgyud): lor bris pa ste/ /khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong / /phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/ /zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/ /gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu
447a5(rgyud): gda'/ /rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po/ /yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nya ba
447a6(rgyud): 'dra| |nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa/ /rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
447a7(rgyud): po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten skyong
447b1(rgyud): khyed cag rnams kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/ /'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sems can rnams
447b2(rgyud): la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ /'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / /sems
447b3(rgyud): can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang / /'dzam bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad
447b4(rgyud): kyis| |rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ /chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ /gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang / /shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga'
447b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / /'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang / /sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ /'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ /yul na dga' dang bdag
447b6(rgyud): bde dga' ba dang / /rgyal srid rnam par 'byor ba dga' ba des/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa/ /pha rol dgra tshogs zlog
447b7(rgyud): pa dge byed pa/ /mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel byed pa/ /mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o/ /ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa/ /yon tan kun 'byung
448a1(rgyud): @#/ /khyim na yod pa ltar/ /rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ /ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel
448a2(rgyud): byed pa/ /tshabs nyam thag tshe na rnyed pa ltar/ /yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rin chen thams cad
448a3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/ /mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /'di ni lha
448a4(rgyud): yi tshogs kyi mngon mchod pa/ /mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po la/ /bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ /phyogs
448a5(rgyud): bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes
448a6(rgyud): brjod pa byin/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ /rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /mdo sde'i dbang
448a7(rgyud): po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ /mdo
448b1(rgyud): sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/ /gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob/ /gzi brjid chen po yi ni lha yi lus/ /shin
448b2(rgyud): tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du
448b3(rgyud): byung bar gyur dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig dus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'dar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba
448b4(rgyud): dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor mngon par gtor to/ /gtor/ mngon
448b5(rgyud): par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
448b6(rgyud): sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re'ang gnod sbyin lnga
448b7(rgyud): brgya lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
449a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa
449a2(rgyud): gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
449a3(rgyud): to| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ /gzungs kyang
449a4(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
449a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'di las tshig gam/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang /
449a6(rgyud): yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du gser
449a7(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa
449b1(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la
449b2(rgyud): tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna
449b3(rgyud): tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /
449b4(rgyud): bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang / sman
