464a6(rgyud): bya| |lha dbang rnams kyis byin rlabs kyis/ /ma yi rum du 'jug 'gyur te/ /lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas/ /phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/ /mi yi
464a7(rgyud): 'jig rten skyes kyang ni/ /mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin/ /lha las skyes par gyur pas na/ /de ni lha yi sras zhes bya/ /khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes/ /sum cu rtsa
464b1(rgyud): gsum lha dbang gis/ /rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni/ /mi rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul/ /nyes pa byas pa rnam 'gog pa/ /chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang / /sems can
464b2(rgyud): legs byed dgod pa dang / /lha yi gnas su dgye ba'i phyir/ /mi yi dbang po mi shes dang / /lha yi shas dang dri za'i shas/ /gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyis/ /nyes
464b3(rgyud): par byed pa zlog par byed/ /legs par bya ba byed rnams la/ /mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shes/ /rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/ /tshe
464b4(rgyud): 'di'i legs par byas pa dang / /nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi/ /rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/ /yul na nyes byed gnas pa
464b5(rgyud): dag / gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing / /sdig pa can gyi skye bo la/ /mthun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing / /nyes par byas pa yal bor pa/ /de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel//
464b6(rgyud): 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang / /yul 'khor de ni phyir phyir 'byung / /sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na/ /lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur/ /yul na nyes byed gnas pa
464b7(rgyud): dag| gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/ /de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad pa/ /drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur/ /pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su/ /yul 'khor de ni
465a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnam par 'jig /longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig /gang gis nor bsags yod pa yang / /g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis/ /phan tshun
465a2(rgyud): du ni 'phrog par gyur/ /bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid/ /bya ba de ni mi byed na/ /glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin/ /rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig /ma rungs pa yi rlung
465a3(rgyud): ldang zhing / /ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur/ /rgyal pos yal bar bor na der/ /sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras//
465a4(rgyud): legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing / /mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yul na nyes byed gnas pa dang / /gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/ /de tshe lha rnams khang pa na/ /
465a5(rgyud): yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha rgyal dbang pos de dag kun/ /rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te/ /chos min phyogs la gnas pa zhes/ /phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur/ /
465a6(rgyud): rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par/ /lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur/ /lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na/ /de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig /yul du chos min
465a7(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur zhing / /mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /g.yo rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang / /nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha yi dbang po rab khros
465b1(rgyud): shing | |lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor/ /yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed/ /spun nam yang na bu yang rung / /sdug pa rnams dang bral bar
465b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang bral/ /yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur/ /skar mda' dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung / /pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs
465b3(rgyud): dang / /mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi blon po phangs pa dang / /glang po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rda mo ni/ /phangs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
465b4(rgyud): khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang / /phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/ /yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis/ /phan tshun dag tu 'debs bar 'gyur/ /'thab mo dag
465b5(rgyud): dang rtsod dang g.yo/ /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing / /mi bzad pa yin da kyang 'byung / /de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang / /chos dang
465b6(rgyud): ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/ /de yi 'khor dang blon po yang / /chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/ /chos dang mi ldan skye bo la/ /de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan
465b7(rgyud): pa'i sems can la/ /rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ /chos dang mi ldan skye ba bkur/ /chos ldan chad pas gcad pa na/ /der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung / /rnam gsum
466a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur/ /chos min skye bo bzung bas na/ /dam chos ngo yi snying po mdangs/ /sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud/ /dngos
466a2(rgyud): po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig / skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing / /skye bo dam pa smad pas na/ /'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang / /rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur/ /'bras
466a3(rgyud): bu lo tog ro dang mdangs/ /de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/ /sems can nad pa mang po dag /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu
466a4(rgyud): dag |yul rnams na ni yod pa yang / /kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang / /chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur/ /rtse dang rgod dang dga' ba dang / /sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag /dga'
466a5(rgyud): ba'i nyams ni mi dgar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs/ /me tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi/ /snum dngos khu ba zad pas na/ /lus dang khams dang
466a6(rgyud): dbang po la/ /de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams ni mdog ngan zhing / /mthu chung shin tu rid par 'gyur/ /kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/ /tshim par
466a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / /de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/ /sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag /yul rnams su ni 'byung
466b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi/ /sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i/ /gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos min
466b2(rgyud): phyogs la rab gnas te/ /rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na/ /khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang tshe rgyal po'i phyogs
466b3(rgyud): gnas te/ /nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/ /'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag /yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dgos pa khang phyir lha dbang gis/ /rgyal po byin gyis
466b4(rgyud): brlabs pa yi/ /rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing / /nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni/ /legs par byas pas sems can rnams/ /lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye/ /nyes par byas
466b5(rgyud): pas yi dwags dang / /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye/ /gang tshe rgyal po yul rnams na/ /nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas/ /nyes
466b6(rgyud): par byas pas ltung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na/ /de ni bu yang ma yin la/ /lha yi rgyal po pha rnams kyis/ /gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur/ /g.yo ni shin tu mi
466b7(rgyud): bzad pas/ /gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur pa/ /dre phyir lha yi dbang po yi/ /mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/ /nyes pa byas zhi bya ba'i phyir/ /legs par byed la
467a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dzud pa ste/ /tshe 'di la ni sems can la/ /rnam smin bskyed pa rgyal po yin/ /legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa'i
467a2(rgyud): 'bras/ /rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir/ /byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang / /yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /lha tshogs rnams kyi
467a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs/ /lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang / /yul 'khor rnams na skye bo ni/ /sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang / /yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /srog
467a4(rgyud): dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang / /chos ma yin pas bzod byed cing / /shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni/ /yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ /de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma
467a5(rgyud): yin| |ji ltar g.yo rnams byung ba la/ /g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na/ /yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /glang chen rnams
467a6(rgyud): kyi rdzing chen bzhin/ /yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig /lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur/ /lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig /yul du dngos po thams cad ni/ /
467a7(rgyud): ma rungs par yang 'gyur pas na/ /de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams/ /nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya/ /chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/ /chos ma yin pa
467b1(rgyud): spyad mi bya/ /srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing / /nye 'khon bya bar mi bya'o/ /skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan/ /yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la/ /rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya
467b2(rgyud): yi| |phyogs su lhung bar gyur ta re/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi/ /grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste/ /sum cu gsum gyi gnas rnams na/ /lha yi dbang po dgar 'gyur te//
467b3(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling na nged kyi bu/ /'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin/ /chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas/ /legs par byed la skye bo bkod/ /rgyal po de ni legs byed pas/ /
467b4(rgyud): skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de/ /lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/ /lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo/ /chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas/ /rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'/ /lha dbang
467b5(rgyud): rab tu dang gyur pas/ /mi yi rgyal po de la bsrung / /nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du/ /rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ /rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing / /char pa'ang dus su 'bab
467b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du/ /yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed/ /lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/ /lha yi gnas rnams gang bar byed/ /de lta bas na
467b7(rgyud): rgyal po yi/ /bdag gis phangs pa'i srog btang gi /bdag gis 'jig rten bder 'gyur ba/ /dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste/ /yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa/ /chos
468a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang ldan pas bsten par bya/ /rang gis skye bo rtag dga' ba/ /rtag tu sdig pa rnam par spangs/ /chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/ /chos kyang
468a2(rgyud): yang dag bstan par bya/ /legs par byed la sems can 'god/ /nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya/ /gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams/ /tshul bzhin 'dul bar byed pa'i tshe//
468a3(rgyud): yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing / /rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong / /gser 'od dam pa mdo
468a4(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //gang tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
468a5(rgyud): rgyal por gyur/ /de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams btang / /gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang / /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo/ /chos kyi sku de yongs
468a6(rgyud): su btsal ba'i phyir/ /gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi/ /dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med/ /bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang / /ji ltar sngon gyi bskal
468a7(rgyud): pa bsam yas na/ /rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i/ /bstan la legs byung zhes pa'i rgyal po byung / /de
468b1(rgyud): ni gling bzhi'i dbang po'i 'khor los bsgyur/ /rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston/ /rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na/ /de tshe rgyal po dam pa gnyid kyis log /
468b2(rgyud): rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos/ /chos smra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na/ /rnam par lhang nger mdo sde'i dbang po 'di/ /rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar
468b3(rgyud): gyur| |rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sad/ /de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/ /mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas mngon byung ste/ /nyan thos dge 'dun mchog
468b4(rgyud): gi gnas su song / /rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing / /'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen song / /yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces/ /chos
468b5(rgyud): smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris/ /de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni/ /phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la/ /kha ton
468b6(rgyud): byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug / dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de/ /phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing / /phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur
468b7(rgyud): pa| |de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan/ /'di na chos smra rin chen sogs pa 'di/ /rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste/ /gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi/ /mdo sde'i
469a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston/ /rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag btsal te/ /rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras/ /gser 'od dam pa
469a2(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal/ /zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol/ /rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid la/ /rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na/ /stong gsum pa
469a3(rgyud): yi 'jig rten thams cad du/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe mi yi dbang pos sa phyogs ni/ /gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der/ /rin
469a4(rgyud): chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btab/ /me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas/ /rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / /dar yug stong phrag du mas
469a5(rgyud): legs par brgyan/ /rgyal pos khri der tsan+dan dam pa dag /rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang mngon par gtor/ /lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci/ /gnod sbyin dbang dang mkha'
469a6(rgyud): lding lto 'phye ches/ /lha yi me tog man+dA ra ba'i char/ /khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab/ /chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong / /bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur
469a7(rgyud): pa| |rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na/ /sA la'i me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor/ /chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang / /shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i
469b1(rgyud): gos bgos te/ /khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang btsal/ /lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams/ /bar snang 'dug nas me tog man+dA ra'i/ /
469b2(rgyud): char ba 'bebs shing sil snyan brgya stong phrag /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs/ /rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des/ /phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong / /
469b3(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas/ /de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par byung / /sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni/ /snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas
469b4(rgyud): te| |rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni/ /de ni tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te/ /rgyal pos thal mo sbyar byas btud nas su/ /tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/ /chos kyi shugs
469b5(rgyud): kyis mig nas mchi ma phyung / /de yi lus ni dga' bas khyab par gyur/ /mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis/ /yid bzhin nor bu
469b6(rgyud): rin chen rgyal po blangs/ /sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang / /gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams/ /
469b7(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor ni chen po yi/ /char pa dre ring 'dzam bu'i gling du phob/ /de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang / /dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas
470a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang skom dang gos rnams kyang / /gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur/ /rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du/ /rin chen char pa
470a2(rgyud): 'bab pa de mthong nas/ /gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni/ /rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga / /rgyal po
470a3(rgyud): legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur/ /gling bzhi dag ni rin chen gang bcas kyi/ /sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang / /gang gis rgyal po legs par byung nga la/ /de
470a4(rgyud): tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /rin chen sogs pa chos smra'i dge slong de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to/ /ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing / /
470a5(rgyud): tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/ /nga ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang / /chos nyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas/ /gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan//
470a6(rgyud): blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes la/ /lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa/ /skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag /
470a7(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los bsgyur rgyal gyur/ /bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang / /ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar gyur/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi
470b1(rgyud): khyab brgya byin gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no/ /gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i/ /stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni brnyes par byas/ /ngas gang mdo
470b2(rgyud): thos rjes su yi rang ba/ /bsod nams phung po da ltar tshad med mang / /bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob/ /chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo/ /gser 'od dam pa
470b3(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //dpal ldan lha mo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
470b4(rgyud): dad pa can gang la la zhig/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu
470b5(rgyud): rgyas shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod
470b6(rgyud): yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher
470b7(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan
471a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang
471a2(rgyud): zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/ /zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas/ /gtsug lag khang ngam
471a3(rgyud): gnas khang ngam/ /gang na gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa/ /sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya/ /mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha'
471a4(rgyud): yang yas/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las/ /sems can thams cad thar bar byed/ /mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang / /dbus dang de bzhin tha ma mthong / /mdo sde'i dbang po
471a5(rgyud): rab zab ste/ /'di la dpe ni yod ma yin/ /gang gA dang ni sa rnams dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la/ /gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung / /dper bya ba ni mi nus
471a6(rgyud): so| |chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yi/ /de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/ /chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni/ /zab mo rab brtan gang yin pa/ /mchod rten de yi dbus na
471a7(rgyud): ni| |rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong / /yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston/ /grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa bye ba ji
471b1(rgyud): snyed par/ /lha yi dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /bde ba dag ni rjes su myong / /gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa/ /de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po bsam yas bsgrub snyam
471b2(rgyud): du| |de tshe des ni de ltar shes/ /mes gang 'obs kyi sa bskor ba yi/ /dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing / /tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas/ /mdo sde mnyan par gang nus pa/ /
471b3(rgyud): gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du/ /zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/ /sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur/ /rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang / /
471b4(rgyud): byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang / /zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/ /thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni/ /rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar/ /der
471b5(rgyud): ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri/ /de lta bur yang bsham par bya/ /khri de la ni 'dug nas su/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan/ /yi ger bris pa bklag par bya/ /de bzhin yongs su chub
471b6(rgyud): par bya/ /khri de las ni babs nas su/ /yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang / /khri de la ni yod pa yi/ /cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur/ /chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang / /
471b7(rgyud): de ni res 'ga' snang bar 'gyur/ /res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/ /res 'ga' byang chub sems dpar yang / /res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang / /de bzhin 'jam
472a1(rgyud): @#/ /dpal gzugs su ste/ /res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang / /khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang / /
472a2(rgyud): res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur/ /yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas/ /de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur/ /thams cad du

472a4(rgyud): byed/ /pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms/ /g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed/ /rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig /sdig pa thams
472a5(rgyud): cad rab zhi byed/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du/ /grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni/ /
472a6(rgyud): shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /g.yul ngo'i rtse las rnam par rgyal/ /dgra dang bral zhing

485b5(rgyud): b dag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos zab mo'ang bshad la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug

485b7(rgyud): do| |kha cig ni smod do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis de'i tshe rdzing der rkang pa gnyi ga'i pus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
486a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod do/ /
486a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nga'i ming thos pa de dag de
486a3(rgyud): nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad btab bo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud

486b3(rgyud): su gyur pa de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o/ /des na dus gzhan zhig
486b4(rgyud): na tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro ste mal na nyal ba dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur te mtshan mo de 'das pa dang / nya khri
486b5(rgyud): po de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /skyes ma thag tu de dge 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa
486b6(rgyud): skyes te bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyam mo/ /de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling de
486b7(rgyud): na nya khrir gyur te bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa las tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis chu mang po dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te bdag cag la
487a1(rgyud): @#/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
487a2(rgyud): tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pas dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang / rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyi bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba
487a3(rgyud): der dong ste phyin nas de la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
487a4(rgyud): kyi khyim du lhags te de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag/ mu tig gi se
487a5(rgyud): mo do khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yas logs su bzhag/ mu tig gi so mo do khri ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste pus mo nub tsam du me tog man
487a6(rgyud): dA ra ba'i char chen po'ang phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas des 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyang sad tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyang sad do/ /de

487b1(rgyud): ' babs shing dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po phab ste de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang

491b7(rgyud): 'ong gi tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/ /sems can chen pos smras pa/ thub
492a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/ /bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/ /shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/ /bdag gi
492a2(rgyud): snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na stag mo bu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa zhig bu lngas bskor
492a3(rgyud): te bkres shing skom pa'i nyam smad nas lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o/ /nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas

492a5(rgyud): can chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'di ltar gang sha sar pa dang / khrag dron po yod na de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge

492a7(rgyud): lus te rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi nus na 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgra
492b1(rgyud): chen pos smras pa/ kye/ rang gi lus yongs su btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o/ /sems can chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang / lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams
492b2(rgyud): la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni dka' ba ma lags so/ /yang / snying brtse
492b3(rgyud): snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag / lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/ /gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni/ /'gyur ba med par
492b4(rgyud): 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis rtse/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo / /de nas sems can chen po 'di
492b5(rgyud): snyam du sems te da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtong ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'gyed mtha' ngan pa/ /rnag can lus
492b6(rgyud): 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang / /bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang / /snga med rang gis rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med/ /yang thams cad du mi gtsang
492b7(rgyud): bar gyur bas na de'i 'tsho ba med kyi/ da bdag gis de las bzang po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/ /
493a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang / snying po med lus dbu pa 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gzon pa/ /'bras 'dra ba yi srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di
493a2(rgyud): btang ste/ /mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis/ /kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par
493a3(rgyud): bya| / de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brtul nas khyod gnyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du nags stug po bcu
493a4(rgyud): gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga
493a5(rgyud): la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ /gzhan gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying
493a6(rgyud): rjes sbyin/ /bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog /bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum
493a7(rgyud): po bsgral bar bya/ /zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
493b1(rgyud): stag mos ci'ang ma byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas/ kye ma'o/ /'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang
493b2(rgyud): mtshon cha ma rnyed nas des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag
493b3(rgyud): tu chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do/ /lha'i
493b4(rgyud): spos dang / phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod
493b5(rgyud): 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/ /mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'dir btang bas na/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba gnas kyi
493b6(rgyud): mchog / zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/ /de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bldags nas
493b7(rgyud): yud tsam gyis sha dang / khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so/ /de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de dag la bsams nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
494a1(rgyud): @#/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la/ /me tog char pa bab
494a2(rgyud): cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na/ /da gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag /lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smra la/ /bkres dang
494a3(rgyud): ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa/ /shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang / /za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya
494a4(rgyud): ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams
494a5(rgyud): ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig
494a6(rgyud): lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgreng ste nyam thag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / /de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung
494a7(rgyud): ba'i ma/ /pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyod kyi gar bzhag ces/ /ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur/ /kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ /shi na
494b1(rgyud): legs kyi gson na de lta ma yin no/ /sems can chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/ /pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis
494b2(rgyud): kyis snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por dus nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro ba rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang / gcig
494b3(rgyud): gis gcig mthong nas gzhon nu ga re/ gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o/ /de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa/ 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad
494b4(rgyud): pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phru gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar mthong ngo / /de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying dngangs te mod la sad nas sems
494b5(rgyud): pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/ nyi ma 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar ston/ /nga yi
494b6(rgyud): lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa/ /nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram ge /de nas de snyam bsams pa
494b7(rgyud): dang bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon nu tshol zhing mchis na jo co stor ces gda'o/ /de skad ces thos ma thag
495a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang / gdong mchi mas gang ste rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/ /
495a2(rgyud): rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud/ bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzhon
495a3(rgyud): nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyi bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig / der gzhon nu tshol ba la zhugs pa na skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur te de nas ring por ma lon par
495a4(rgyud): rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud/ bu dang
495a5(rgyud): bral ba lta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba/ /mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no/ /'jig rten na ni gang
495a6(rgyud): dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am/ /mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/ /de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa
495a7(rgyud): bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo / /de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/ /me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las/ /bdag gi
495b1(rgyud): bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na/ /bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chungs de ga re/ /de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes gzhon nu
495b2(rgyud): gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste rkan dang / mchu dang / kha dang / so skams nas cang mi zer ro/ /btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i
495b3(rgyud): bu sdug tha chung de ga re/ /kho mo'i snying 'di gsal thug gyur cing / /lus ni mi bzad rab tu gzir gyur te/ /kho mo 'drin pa nyams gyur myur du smros/ /de nas gzhon nu de
495b4(rgyud): gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu smras so/ /de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo myos par 'gyur te myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo //
495b5(rgyud): de nas rgyal po dang / btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing skra phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas shing rlung gis btab pa
495b6(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyel to/ /de nas nye phan dang / blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas chu dang / rim la ya'i tsan+dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i lus bsil bar
495b7(rgyud): byas so/ /de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed nas rgyal po langs te snying rje rje slad du 'bod pa/ kye ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba/ /'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir de
496a1(rgyud): @#/ /myur song / /'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs/ /nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung / /btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas skra gzhig
496a2(rgyud): cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing ma he be'u stor ba dang / rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du ngu'o/ /kye ma sdug
496a3(rgyud): cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di/ /su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor/ /yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/ /bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de ring
496a4(rgyud): sa 'dir bcom/ /kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na/ /lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pas/ /bdag gi snying 'di
496a5(rgyud): lcags ni yin yang dag / de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad/ /so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/ /
496a6(rgyud): bdag gis thi ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/ /bdag gi bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/ /
496a7(rgyud): kye ma ho sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smra zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas
496b1(rgyud): skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus bu la mchod pa byas nas gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go / kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu
496b2(rgyud): sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can
496b3(rgyud): chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe'ang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug
496b4(rgyud): bsngal las ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can
496b5(rgyud): re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par spro zhing skye bo 'khor ba las rnam par bsgral lo/ /sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa
496b6(rgyud): sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub mchog 'di yongs su
496b7(rgyud): tshol ba na/ /bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste/ /ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang / /sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes
497a1(rgyud): @#/ /dran te/ /shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung / /de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa/ /sems can che zhes bya ba dam pa yod/ /de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod
497a2(rgyud): de| |ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po/ /dpung tshogs de dag nags tshal stug por dong / /de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong / /di la sems can mchog de snying rje
497a3(rgyud): skyes| |stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas na/ /bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis/ /de ltar bdag lus da ni gtang bar bya/ /shing rta che bu sems can che/ /stag
497a4(rgyud): mo bkres mthong stag phrug rnams/ /thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis/ /ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa dang / /sa ni ri dang bcas su gsol/ /bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par
497a5(rgyud): 'thor/ /ri dwags tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di/ /mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur/ /de yi phu bo sgra chen dang / /de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis/ /nags mchog
497a6(rgyud): chen po der bltas na/ /sems can chen po ma rnyed nas/ /shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying / /dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu/ /nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing / /gdong la mchi
497a7(rgyud): zag nags khrod rgyu/ /sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis/ /stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba/ /der ni nye bar song ba dang / /stag mo dang ni stag
497b1(rgyud): phrug gi / stag gi mchu la khrag chags mthong / /sgra dang rus pa cung zad cig /sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong / /de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/ /nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur/ /rgyal
497b2(rgyud): po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis/ /khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong / /rab tu brgyal te sa de la/ /'gyel nas yid ni nyams par 'gyur/ /lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos/ /dran dbang
497b3(rgyud): nyams shing sems kyang myos/ /de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang / /snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non/ /de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing / /lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing gnas/ /de ni
497b4(rgyud): 'gyel ma thag tu yang / /btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma/ /bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang / /pho brang nang na bder 'dug pa/ /nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas/ /'o ma
497b5(rgyud): khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag / de yi lus dang yan lag kun/ /khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha/ /snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang / /bu bral mya ngan drag mangs phog /rgyal
497b6(rgyud): po'i gan du nyer song ste/ /mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'/ /snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing / /rgyal po shing rta che la smras/ /mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/ /bdag
497b7(rgyud): lus mya ngan me yis tshig / bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas/ /'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung / /bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bzhin tsha/ /bdag gi snying yang gas la thug/
498a1(rgyud): @#/ /ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni/ /phyin cad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas/ /bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog stsol/ /de
498a2(rgyud): ring bdag gi rmi lam na/ /thi ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na/ /bdag gi thi ba phrug gu ni/ /sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa/ /der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni/ /thi ba phrug gu de
498a3(rgyud): khras 'tshal/ /bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra ba'i/ /mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs/ /sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas/ /bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum/ /bdag
498a4(rgyud): gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog stsol/ /de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog /brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur/ /dran pa'i dbang po
498a5(rgyud): rnam par nyams/ /sems kyang stor zhing dran pa med/ /btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang / /snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu du/ /btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur
498a6(rgyud): te| |sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/ /de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de/ /bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non/ /blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang / /gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir
498a7(rgyud): dong | |grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag / tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod/ /ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag /lam khar sems can che de 'dri/ /gson nam 'on te shi 'am
498b1(rgyud): ci| |sems can chen po de gar song / /bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam/ /yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'/ /de'u re mi snyan thos 'gyur zhing / /yul 'dir mya
498b2(rgyud): ngan mi bzad rlung / /sgra mi phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas/ /drag po'i sgrar bcas ldan zhig gam/ /rgyal po shing rta che langs te/ /mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/ /btsun mo dam
498b3(rgyud): pa sar 'gyel la/ /bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'thor/ /ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur pa/ /de srid du ni chu yis gtor/ /bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces/ /zhum
498b4(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras/ /blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang / /gzhon nu rnams ni tshol phyir
498b5(rgyud): dong | |khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing / /rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed/ /de ltar shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te/ /rgyal po pho brang nang byung nas/ /mya
498b6(rgyud): ngan non cing brgyal bzhin du/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/ /yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan/ /srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang / /ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin
498b7(rgyud): rgyug / rgyal pu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung / /rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang / /rgyal po shing rta chen po
499a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni| |grong khyer nas byung de ma thag /sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir/ /rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas/ /mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags
499a2(rgyud): shing | |lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la/ /gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du/ /'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni/ /shing rta chen po'i snying la yang / /rab tu mi bzang mya
499a3(rgyud): ngan gnas/ /ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag /lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug /de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni/ /rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ong / /'ongs nas mi dbang
499a4(rgyud): rgyal po ni/ /shing rta che la 'di skad smras/ /mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis/ /ring por mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni/ /sras
499a5(rgyud): mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang / /de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs/ /rdul chags dri ma can gyi
499a6(rgyud): gos gyon cing / /mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad ces/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni/ /mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas/ /rgyal po
499a7(rgyud): khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'/ /sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /stag mo bu byung ring bor ma lon pa/ /rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong / /
499b1(rgyud): de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ches/ /snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ /byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol
499b2(rgyud): bar bya/ /byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/ /ma 'ongs dus na bdag gis reg par bya/ /sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs/ /stag mo bkres pas non pa de
499b3(rgyud): langs te/ /yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas/ /rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus/ /ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/ /sa
499b4(rgyud): la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur/ /mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad 'bar/ /'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni/ /ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang / /chus
499b5(rgyud): 'thor lag pa bsgreng ste rab tu ngu / /blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni/ /bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag /nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur cing / /sa
499b6(rgyud): la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas/ /dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni/ /bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar
499b7(rgyud): bar mthong / /yud tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gyel/ /snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don/ /rtag par lag pa bsgreng ste gnas nas ni/ /nu bo de yi bsngags
500a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa rab tu brjod/ /rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing / /bu bral mya ngan non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/ /mya ngan rab tu gdungs shing smre sngags
500a2(rgyud): 'don/ /rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems/ /bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni/ /sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /bdag gi bu ni gnyis

535a2(rgyud): kyi dbang / /rin chen 'od 'phro ri rab mu khyud 'od dpag med/ /rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu bzung na ni/ /'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin non par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang

535a4(rgyud): gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas/ /gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
535a5(rgyud): rjes su dran na ni/ /mtshon cha de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing 'brul/ /gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang / /lag pa chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur//

542a3(rgyud): nas su/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa la/ /dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi/ /bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang / /de las de ni blangs nas su/ /ston pas dug ni bsad nas
542a4(rgyud): gsol/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/ /zas ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog /rnam par gzigs pa lha gang dang / /gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang / /log par dad pa
542a5(rgyud): sel ba la| / stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang / /gser dang dpal ldan 'od srung dang / /shAkya yi ni seng ge la/ /rab dad lha yi dbang po dang / /tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang
542a6(rgyud): phyug dang / /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /nor bu bzang dang dbang phyug che/ /srin mo nag mo chen mo dang / /de bzhin gdol ma gtum mo dag /me tog dang ni bdug pa
542a7(rgyud): dang | / bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig /de dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas/ /bdag gis kha zas byang bar mdzod/ /zas lnga dag dang 'dres pa yang / /bdag la ma 'dres
542b1(rgyud): mdzad du gsol/ /kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang / /zas de kun ni bza' bar bgyi/ /sa bon dag gis tshogs kun la/ /sa yi bcud ni zhugs pa yi/ /kha zas 'dres pa thams
542b2(rgyud): cad kyang / /bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol/ /ji ltar skud pa bcad bsregs pa/ /de lta bu yang slar 'byor pa/ /de ltar zas rnams 'dres pa yang / /ma 'dres par yang bdag la
542b3(rgyud): mdzod/ /s+yAd ya the da na/ kha kha me/ kha kha kha kha/ khu khu me/ shi me shi me/ shi hu me/ shi me/ shi me/ swa sti swa sti swa sti swa sti/ ma ma shAn+te/ shA rA gre/ kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa
542b4(rgyud): yang | |ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du/ /gang gis ji ltar skud bsregs pa/ /de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ ka la ka/ ka la le/ ba la ni/ ka ru ta/ A la ye/
542b5(rgyud): ag+ne/ /saM krA ma Ne swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can/ /bde gshegs kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sel dang / /gser thub 'od srung shAkya thub pa gau ta ma//
542b6(rgyud): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku rnams la/ /me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi/ /lus dang ngag dang rab
542b7(rgyud): tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de dag rnams la skyabs su nye bar mchi bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa de dag la/ /lha gang mngon par rab tu dang ba yod pa yi/ /lha
543a1(rgyud): @#/ /de mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dgar gyur nas/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
543a2(rgyud): nas| dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //
543a3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas
543a4(rgyud): gtan la phab pa/ /slar yang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis chos rje chag lo'i rgya dpe dang bstun nas zhus dag par bgyis so// //
